original: Put the plot into motion by sending an ultimatum to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
translation: 将密谋付诸行动，下达最后通牒给[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]。

original: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] receives a letter.
translation: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]收到了一封信。

original:
I have decided to [From.GetPlot]. The vassals in the realm have studied the legal documents presented in this case and the majority of them have deemed my demand justified. Either step down peacefully or I will be forced to take what is mine by military means.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我已经决定[From.GetPlot]。领地中的封臣都研究过这个情形中的法律文件，其中的大多数领主都认为我的要求是公正合理、童叟无欺的，你要么乖乖地和平下台，要么就不得不让我采取军事手段捍卫我的合法权利了。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and hand my title over to you. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免内战分裂国土的危险，我决定同意你的请求并把头衔交给你。但是我永远不会忘记这种背信弃义的讹诈行为……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Excellent!
translation: 妙极了！

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [FromFrom.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has agreed to step down and let me [FromFrom.GetPlot]. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[FromFrom.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]已经同意下台并让我[FromFrom.GetPlot]。你在此次冲突中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

Sincerely，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Good
translation: 很好

original:
Your shameful attempt at blackmail has not succeeded. No matter how many corrupted souls you have enticed to help carry out your plan I will not give in without a fight. What is rightfully mine is mine!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你这可耻的敲诈企图绝不会得逞。无论你收买了多少腐败的卑鄙小人来支持你的阴谋，我绝不会不战而降。我的就是我的，你休想夺走！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Then war it is!
translation: 那就让战争来裁决吧！

original: These characters are promised to each other and cannot marry anyone else unless the betrothal is broken. They have agreed to marry matrilineally, meaning any children born to the couple will be of the bride's dynasty.
translation: 这些角色已经许配给对方，他们不能与其他人结婚除非婚约被毁弃。他们同意缔结入赘婚姻，这意味着这对夫妇所生下的所有孩子都随母姓。

original: While children are not allowed to marry, they can get betrothed. The betrothal will last until the characters get married, one of them should die, or it is explicitly broken.
translation: 儿童不得结婚，但他们可以订立婚约。所订立的婚约有效至双方成婚，一方去世，或是婚约被撕毁。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$ATTACKER$§! due to their war on the rebelling vassal §Y$VASSAL$§!.
translation: 因为§Y$ATTACKER$§!和他们叛变的封臣§Y$VASSAL$§!之间的战争而与之§Y敌对§!。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$OTHER$§! due to the war on the other rebelling vassal, §Y$VASSAL$§!.
translation: 因为§Y$OTHER$§!和另外一个叛变的封臣§Y$VASSAL$§!之间的战争而与之§Y敌对§!。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$VASSAL$§! due to the war on their liege, §Y$LIEGE$§!.
translation: 因为和§Y$VASSAL$§!的领主§Y$LIEGE$§!之间的战争而与之§Y敌对§!。

original: §YHostile§! towards §Y$ATTACKER$§! due to their war on the nominal liege, §Y$LIEGE$§!.
translation: 因为§Y$ATTACKER$§!和他们名义上的领主§Y$LIEGE$§!之间的战争而与之§Y敌对§!。

original: There are no friendly units here to attach to.
translation: 此地无友军可跟随。

original: The following units are attached.
translation: 锁定跟随单位。

original: Attach to always follow $NAME$.
translation: 锁定跟随$NAME$。

original: Detach from following $NAME$.
translation: 停止跟随$NAME$。

original: None of §Y$REVOLTER$'s§! holdings are occupied by §Y$OUTSIDER$§!.
translation: 任何§Y$REVOLTER$§!的领地均未被§Y$OUTSIDER$§!占领

original: Next county on route is §Y$TARGET$§W.
translation: 路线上的下个省份是§Y$TARGET$§W。

original: Andalusia
translation: 安达卢西亚

original: Brittany
translation: 布列塔尼

original: Breton
translation: 布列塔尼

original: Aquitaine
translation: 阿基坦

original: Aquitanian
translation: 阿基坦

original: Aquitanian
translation: 阿基坦

original: Asperg
translation: 阿斯佩格

original: My Child
translation: 我的孩子

original: De Jure Claim on [Title.GetBaseName]
translation: 对[Title.GetBaseName]的法理宣称

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$ De Jure War over $OTHER_TITLE$
translation: $ORDER$ $FIRST_ADJ$-$SECOND_ADJ$争夺$OTHER_TITLE$法理战争

original: You need to hold at least §Y$DUCHIES$§! Duchy titles.
translation: 你需要持有至少§Y$DUCHIES$§!个公爵头衔。

original: This title cannot be created normally.
translation: 该头衔无法正常创建。

original: Creating this title would give you §G$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige and cost you §R$GOLD$§!¤ and §R$PIETY$§! $PIETYNAME$.
translation: 创建此头衔将会给您带来§G$PRESTIGE$§!威望，花费 §R$GOLD$§!¤ 和 §R$PIETY$§! $PIETYNAME$。

original: You must hold the §Y$TITLE$§!.
translation: 您必须拥有§Y$TITLE$§!头衔。

original: I find tasty mud on ground. Eat some. While eat, young girl come to me. She ask, 'Are you stupid or something?'
translation: 我在地上找到美味的泥巴，于是大快朵颐。正吃得开心，一个年轻的女孩子向我走来。她问我，「你是个白痴还是咋地？」

original: I smart. Girl stupid.
translation: 我很聪明，姑娘很笨。

original: Stupid is as stupid does.
translation: 笨人做笨事。

original: Practise with sword on field today. Noticed hand was red when practise over. Held sword by wrong end whole time! Hahaha.
translation: 今天在操场练剑，练完发现手红红的。原来我全程握在了剑刃上！哈哈哈。

original: YOW!
translation: 哎呦！

original: Horse strange today while riding. Head missing and only moved backwards. Rode this way into [Root.Location.GetName] where stable boy said,
translation: 骑马时感觉今天的马儿很奇怪。它的头不见了，一直往后倒行。就这样一路骑到了[Root.Location.GetName]，马夫说，

original: Oops. I done bad...
translation: 哎呀。我错了……

original: Riding my way better.
translation: 按我的骑法更好。

original: Forgot to put on pants this morning. Much shouting, many upset. I not understand.
translation: 今天早上忘了穿裤子了。很多人尖叫，很多人烦恼。俺不明白这是为啥。

original: Calm down! Simple mistake!
translation: 淡定！简单的错误！

original: Today I stumbled upon a painting of the most wretched, hideous creature I had ever laid eyes on. This affront to nature left me chilled to the bone. The crooked teeth, the ears... [Root.GetHerHis] oversized nose alone was enough to make me nauseous! A nearby courtier then asked what I thought of my new portrait.
translation: 今天我偶然发现了一幅画，画着我这辈子见过的最邪恶、最狰狞的生物。这种对于自然的亵渎使我不寒而栗。且不提那交错的牙齿，丑陋的耳朵……光是[Root.GetHerHis]超大鼻子就足够让我恶心！这时附近一个廷臣问我，对自己的新画像是否满意。

original: I need a mirror...
translation: 我需要一面镜子……

original: The poor light deceived me. That nose has character!
translation: 这昏暗的光线误导了我。这鼻子还是挺有型的嘛！

original: I learned today that mothers in [Root.Location.GetName] keep their daughters in line by threatening to marry them off to someone as hideous as... me.
translation: 我今天得知[Root.Location.GetName]的母亲，为了让她们的女儿平时乖乖的，就威胁把她们嫁给一个最最可怕的人……我。

original: I should spend more time indoors...
translation: 我得多花点时间呆在家里……

original: They could do worse!
translation: 她们还能做得更糟！

original: Vicious rumors that I am a witch have been spreading in [Root.Location.GetName] due to my... unique appearance. At least my station prevents the peasants from acting on these baseless accusations.
translation: 流传在[Root.Location.GetName]的恶毒传言说我是一个邪恶的巫师，因为我……独特的外表。至少我的军队防止了那些农民针对这些毫无根据的指控采取进一步行动。

original: The wretches will soon find someone uglier to pester.
translation: 那些坏人很快会找到些更丑的人去骚扰。

original: A pox on them! May they breed ugly, ugly children.
translation: 诅咒他们！诅咒他们生儿子没屁眼。

original: As I grew up, those near me never made it a secret that I was a particularly ugly child. Now, as I am growing into a [Root.GetManWoman], they seem to react differently to my appearance...
translation: 从小到大，那些亲近我的人从来都不把我长得特别丑当作一个秘密看待。现在，我成长为一位[Root.GetManWoman]，他们对我外表的反应似乎在悄悄地变化……

original: An ugly duckling no longer...
translation: 丑小鸭变成了白天鹅……

original: Today as I mounted my favorite horse with the help of six stable boys, it let out a strange sigh and collapsed. The stable master claimed the horse was dead, its back broken. He hinted that perhaps it would be best for all concerned if I walk from now on.
translation: 今天我在六个马夫的帮助下骑上我最爱的宝马，它发出了一阵奇怪的喘息然后轰然垮倒。马夫总管说这匹马已经死了，它的背脊折断了。他暗示我从今以后还是步行的好，这让有关各方都放心。

original: I may have put on some weight...
translation: 我可能稍微长胖了点……

original: Nonsense! Find me another horse!
translation: 闭嘴！给老子再找匹马！

original: Enough is enough. I have decided to eat less and exercise more. Why, I think I can finally see my feet!
translation: 确实不能再胖了。我已经决定了要少吃多锻炼。我想我最终一定可以看到自己的脚的！

original: I was touring the defenses of [Root.Location.GetName] and as I tried to enter one of the towers, I got stuck in the doorway! I found myself unable to move in either direction and it took the strength of four men to pull me free.
translation: 我正在视察[Root.Location.GetName]的防御工事，当我试图走进其中一座塔楼时，我居然在塔门那卡住了！我发现我进退不能，最后靠了四个壮汉才把我拉出来。

original: What have I become? No more suckling pig for me.
translation: 我都胖成什么样了？别再给我烤乳猪了。

original: Was this tower designed for use by children? Expand all doorways!
translation: 这座塔楼是给小孩子设计的吗？给我把所有的门都砸开！

original: As I strolled through the streets of [Root.Location.GetName], I was approached by the local Coin Purse Inspector. He asked to see my purse, and I duly complied.
translation: 我穿过[Root.Location.GetName]纵横交错的街头时，遇上了当地的「钱包搜查官」，他说看我形迹可疑，要检查检查我的钱包，于是我老实听从了。

original: Wait... that wasn't the Coin Purse Inspector...
translation: 等下…… 那不是什么钱包搜查官……

original: A holy man came to court today to talk about matters of faith, but it soon became clear he held rather unorthodox views. Being a zealous defender of the church at all times, I believe I did the right thing when I gave the order to imprison a blasphemous pagan who dared criticise my faith and my church.
translation: 一位神职人员今天到宫廷谈论宗教信仰问题，但他很快就暴露出了自己异端的宗教观点。作为一以贯之的坚定卫教者，我相信我做了正确的事情——把这个胆敢诬蔑我的信仰和教会的异教徒关进监狱。

original: Deus vult!
translation: 主的旨意！

original: As the regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], my duty is to safeguard the realm. I feel that one of [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] holdings would flourish much more under my direct supervision.
translation: 作为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政，我的职责是捍卫这个国家。我感觉[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]某块领土在我的直接管理下会更加繁荣。

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] wills it!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]愿意如此！

original: Nay, I must remember the limits of my station.
translation: 还是算了，我必须得知道我权力的界限。

original: You usurp a title from [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 你从[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]手中篡夺了一个头衔。

original: [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], your regent, has decided in [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] infinite wisdom that one of your titles would benefit the realm more if it was awarded directly to [Root.Regent.GetHerHim].
translation: [Root.Regent.GetTitledName]，您的摄政，以[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]无穷的智慧决定，您的一个头衔如果被直接赐予给[Root.Regent.GetHerHim]，将会更有利于您的领地。

original: *drool*
translation: *流口水*

original: *stare vacantly ahead*
translation: *茫然地凝视着前方*

original: The poor of the realm have suffered terribly under the rule of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. As [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] regent, I am in a position to give something back to the people.
translation: 在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的统治之下，领地简直贫穷得一塌糊涂。作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]摄政，我能够还给人民一些东西。

original: Here you are... courtesy of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 这是给你的……承蒙[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]关照！

original: Tempting, but the gold isn't mine to spend.
translation: 诱人的建议，但这些金子不应该由我来花。

original: You give alms to the poor in the name of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 以[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的名义，你给了穷人们一些捐赠。

original: [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], your regent, seems to have given in to [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] charitable nature and has been donating alms to the poor from your coffers. Worst of all, [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] has been doing it in your name!
translation: 你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]似乎向[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]慈善的本性所屈服，从您的库房中支取了一些金子捐赠给了穷人。最糟糕的是，[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]是以您的名义做了这些事情！

original: Ggghnnn..n-n-nooooo...!
translation: 呃呃呃……不——不……！

original: The administration of your realm has improved significantly since [Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName] became your regent. If only you had [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] skills!
translation: 自从[Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName]成为你的摄政，你领地的管理水平显著上升了。如果你的能力和[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]能力比就好了！

original: *emit grunt of approval*
translation: *口齿不清地发出咕噜声*

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is a decrepit fool and a pathetic shell of a [Root.Liege.GetManWoman]. As [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] appointed regent, I think the court needs a new jester...
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]是一个衰老的蠢货和[Root.Liege.GetManWoman]的一个可悲的空壳。作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]指定的摄政，我想宫廷中需要一个新的小丑……

original: Humiliate [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] in front of the court.
translation: 在廷臣面前羞辱[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]。

original: Perhaps I had better not.
translation: 我想我最好还是别这样。

original: Those in court with low opinion of [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] approve.
translation: 那些在宫廷中不待见[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]的人赞成。

original: As you sit powerless on your throne, your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], has made a regular habit of mocking you in front of the rest of the court - [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] hangs [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] coat on your head, [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] writes crude sentiments on your forehead with charcoal and one time [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] even cracked open a walnut using your teeth. The indignity!
translation: 当你虚弱无力地坐在王座上时，你的摄政，[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]，当着廷臣的面作出了一系列侮辱你的行为——[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]将[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]外套挂在了你的脑袋上，[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]用木炭在你的额头上写了许多污言秽语，甚至有一次[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]用你的牙齿弄开了一个核桃。可耻啊！

original: *suffer series of involuntary spasms*
translation: *遭受了一系列不自主的抽搐*

original: *bob head in reckless, unpredictable manner*
translation: *鲁莽地摆头，作出不可预知的行为*

original: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName], the regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], has been physically humiliating [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] in public. Due to the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]'s infirm nature, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is powerless to resist. Honor demands that you put an end to this disgrace!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]在公共场合下对[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]进行了肉体羞辱。受制于[Root.Liege.GetTitle]的体弱衰微，[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]对此无力反抗。荣誉驱使你对此种奇耻大辱做一个了结！

original: Approach [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and seek [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] blessing to act.
translation: 接近[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]寻求[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]祝福来采取行动

original: Ah, the fool deserves no less.
translation: 啊，这个蠢货咎由自取。

original: You speak with the [Root.Liege.GetTitle].
translation: 你与[Root.Liege.GetTitle]交谈。

original: The way your regent has been treating you has not gone unnoticed. [From.GetTitledName] approaches you alone one evening to express [From.GetHerHis] disgust at the vile indignities you have been made to suffer. Eyes tearful with anger, [From.GetSheHe] promises to take action against your regent... if only you would give your approval.
translation: 您的摄政对待您的方式并没有被无视。在一个深夜[From.GetTitledName]悄悄地觐见了您，对您所遭受的羞辱与苦难表达了[From.GetHerHis]极大愤慨。[From.GetSheHe]的眼中饱含着愤怒的泪水，保证会采取行动对抗您的摄政……只要得到您的许可。

original: *nod head almost imperceptibly*
translation: *几乎是毫无知觉地点了点头*

original: *sag head and lapse into deep slumber*
translation: *垂下头，陷入了沉睡之中*

original: You give [From.GetTitledName] your blessing.
translation: 你给了[From.GetTitledName]你最衷心的祝福。

original: Though [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is not quite [Root.Liege.GetHerselfHimself] these days, you feel that your liege has given [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] blessing to take decisive action against [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]. Rally some dependable men! The realm needs a new regent!
translation: 虽然这些日子[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]身体有恙，但你仍然感受到了你的领主给予了[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]祝福，以采取果断行动对抗[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]。召集一些靠得住的勇士！这个国家需要一个新的摄政！

original: It is only fair that I serve as regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 只有让我担任[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政，才是唯一公平的做法。

original: Anyone is better than [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName].
translation: 任何人都比[Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]强。

original: you becoming the next regent.
translation: 你成为了下一任摄政。

original: the court appointing a new regent.
translation: 宫廷任命了一位新摄政。

original: We have trapped [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName] in one of the castle towers like a cornered rat! Those few guards at court that supported [Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim] have fled or been cut down.
translation: 我们在城堡的一座塔楼里困住了[Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]，他就像一只走投无路的丧家之犬！宫廷里少数几个支持[Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim]的守卫不是逃走就是被干掉了。

original: Off to the dungeons with [Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim]!
translation: 将[Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim]投入地牢！

original: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName] had more support at court than expected. We fought bravely in defense of the realm, but most of the guards rallied to the side of [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]. All is lost!
translation: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]在宫廷里的支持者比预想的要多。我们为保卫这个国家英勇地战斗，但是大部分的守卫都站在了[Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]一边。全完了！

original: Unhand me in the name of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 放开我，以[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的名义！

original: you being thrown in the dungeons.
translation: 你被扔进了地牢。

original: [From.GetTitledName], the fool, has decided to end your regency out of misguided sympathy for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Fortunately enough guards rallied to your side to thwart [From.GetHerHis] little scheme.
translation: 出于对[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的错误的同情心，[From.GetTitledName]这个傻瓜决心要结束你的摄政统治。幸运的是足够多的卫兵站在你这边挫败了[From.GetHerHis]小小阴谋。

original: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in the dungeons.
translation: 让[From.GetHerHim]在地牢里慢慢腐烂吧。

original: [From.GetTitledName], the fool, has decided to end your regency out of misguided sympathy for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. The treacherous guards seem to have left you to your fate!
translation: 出于对[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的错误的同情心，[From.GetTitledName]这个傻瓜决心要结束你的摄政统治。卫兵们也背叛了你！

original: Have you no sense of humor?
translation: 难道你没有幽默感么？

original: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName] is thrown in the dungeons.
translation: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetFirstName]被扔进地牢。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] failed to replace your regent and is now languishing in your castle dungeons. It seems your suffering at the hands of [Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName] will end only in the blissful embrace of death...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]取代您的摄政者的行动失败了，现在他被关在您的城堡地牢中。看起来只有死亡能够让您从[Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName]给您带来的苦难中解脱……

original: *blink away single tear*
translation: *挤出一滴眼泪*

original: *utter incomprehensible oath*
translation: *完全听不懂的诅咒*

original: From where you were propped up on your throne, you could hear shouting and the distinct sound of steel striking steel inside the castle. The men loyal to [From.GetTitledFirstName] prevailed against [Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName]! No longer will [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] vile presence be felt at court, and a new regent is to be appointed forthwith.
translation: 你被扶上了王座，可以听见从城堡中传来的呼喊声和各种各样的兵器撞击声。忠于[From.GetTitledFirstName]的人压过了忠于[Root.Regent.GetTitledFirstName]的人！不久[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]讨厌身影就会从宫廷中消失，很快将会任命一位新的摄政。

original: *contort face in grimace vaguely resembling smile*
translation: *扭曲的面孔浮现出一丝笑容*

original: *flail arms about in wild celebration*
translation: *挥舞胳膊激动地庆祝*

original: As you ride through the empty corridors of your castle on your trusty wooden stick horse, you come across your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], getting some fresh air on a balcony... with [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] back turned against you.
translation: 当您骑着您忠实的木马穿过空荡的城堡走廊时，您遇到了您的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]，他正在阳台上呼吸新鲜空气，而且[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]背对着您。

original: Charge!
translation: 冲过去！

original: No, I'm a good [Root.GetLadLass].
translation: 不，我是一个好[Root.GetLadLass]。

original: It suddenly dawns on you - when [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] comes of age, your title as regent of the realm is forfeit. Perhaps something could be done to extend your enlightened stewardship of the throne... for the good of the realm, of course.
translation: 一个事实突然摆在你的面前，当[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]长大的时候，你就会失去王国摄政的头衔。为了国家的利益，或许可以做些什么来延长你开明的管理。

original: The whelp is not fit to rule - not now, not ever!
translation: 这个小崽子不适合统治——现在不适合，以后也不适合！

original: For better or worse, I will step down when the [Root.Liege.GetLadLass] is ready.
translation: 不管是好是坏，当[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]准备好的时候我都会致政。

original: It is becoming increasingly obvious that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is a very... special child. You can no longer explain away [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] growing madness as the mere eccentricities of youth.
translation: 事实正变得越来越明显，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]是一个非常「特殊」的小孩。你无法仅用年轻人的怪癖来解释清楚[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]日渐增长的疯狂。

original: This is not a decision I take lightly, but something must be done.
translation: 下定决心并不轻松，但我必须去做。

original: Perhaps the madness will disappear with age and maturity...
translation: 也许这种疯狂会随着年龄增大和逐渐成熟而消失……

original: The mad [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has been imprisoned in one of the castle towers, and your regency will continue until the child is declared sound of mind, regardless of [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] age.
translation: 疯王[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]已经被囚禁在城堡的一座塔楼里，直到这个孩子被确认头脑正常为止，你的摄政权会一直继续下去，与[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]年龄无关。

original: It is for the good of the realm.
translation: 这对国家是个好事。

original: having [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] declared insane.
translation: 宣称[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]精神错乱。

original: Through skillful conniving, you have managed to see [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] declared insane. Until [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] mental state improves, the child will remain locked up in one of the castle towers while your illustrious regency continues.
translation: 你成功地宣称[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]精神错乱。在[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]精神状态好转之前，这个孩子将会被一直锁在城堡的塔楼里，与此同时你可以继续你卓越的摄政。

original: Ha! That day will never come.
translation: 哈！那一天永不会到来。

original: All of your attempts to have [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] declared insane have failed. Before long the [Root.Liege.GetLadLass] will be a [Root.Liege.GetManWoman], and you may have made yourself a powerful enemy...
translation: 你宣称[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]精神错乱的企图全部失败了。很快[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]就会成长为一个成熟的[Root.Liege.GetManWoman]，你为自己制造了一个强有力的敌人……

original: Well, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] looked insane to me...
translation: 好吧，在我看来[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]精神确实不正常……

original: failing to do so.
translation: 没有如愿。

original: Your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], seems to have been conspiring to have you declared insane in a futile attempt to extend [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] regency. Unfortunately for [Root.Regent.GetHerHim], it is obvious to all that you are sound of mind.
translation: 您的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]，似乎想要密谋宣称您精神不正常，他在徒劳地试图延长[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]摄政。对[Root.Regent.GetHerHim]非常不幸的是，所有人都认识到您的精神明显十分正常。

original: Some day [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] will regret this treachery.
translation: 总有一天[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]会为这次背叛感到后悔。

original: I'm not mad. Tell them, Mr. Flibble.
translation: 我没有疯。告诉他们，Flibble先生。

original: Your scheming snake of a regent, [Root.Regent.GetFirstName], has managed to convince the court that you are insane! The decision has been made to lock you up in one of the castle towers until you are deemed mentally fit to rule, regardless of your age.
translation: 你那一肚子诡计的摄政[Root.Regent.GetFirstName]，成功地向宫廷证实你疯了！宫廷已经决定把你锁在城堡的一座塔楼里，直到大家认为你精神正常适合统治为止，不论你的年龄是多少。

original: I'm not insane! I'm not!
translation: 我没有精神错乱！我没有！

original: I shall plead with the King of the Turnip People for my freedom.
translation: 我应该向芜菁人民的国王祈求获得自由。

original: For fifteen years [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has been locked up under guard while you have served as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] regent. You are the true ruler of the realm in all but name. Perhaps the time has come to end this charade.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]已经被关押了15年，在这期间由你担任[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]摄政。你是王国的实际统治者，只差一个名义。也许到了结束这层伪装的时刻了。

original: Seize the throne!
translation: 夺取王位！

original: No, appearances must be kept.
translation: 不，表面上的伪装是必要的。

original: I have had enough. Release the [Root.Liege.GetLadLass].
translation: 我拥有的已经够多了。释放[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]。

original: At long last, the throne is yours. The degrading charade you have been forced to endure all these years has come to an end. You are [Root.Liege.GetTitle] now, both in title and practise. Long live the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]!
translation: 你好不容易取得了王位。这些年来你被迫承受的不体面的伪装终于结束了。不论从名义上还是实际上，你现在都是[Root.Liege.GetTitle]了。[Root.Liege.GetTitle]万岁！

original: I earned this.
translation: 这是我自己挣来的。

original: stealing the throne.
translation: 窃取王位。

original: The ingrates at court have refused to embrace you as their true liege! For your audacity in pursuing this claim, they have stripped you of your title as regent and released [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] from [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] imprisonment.
translation: 宫廷中忘恩负义的人拒绝拥戴你为真正的领主！为了应对你大胆的宣称王位的举动，他们剥夺了你的摄政称号并把[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]从[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]监禁中释放出来。

original: Fools! The realm will suffer now.
translation: 傻瓜们！王国会从此遭受磨难。

original: failing miserably.
translation: 不幸地失败了。

original: Your treacherous regent seems to have finally bitten off more than [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] could chew. An attempt to completely usurp your throne has backfired, and [Root.Regent.GetTitledName] has been stripped of [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] title as regent. You have been released, and can now assume your rightful position as [Root.GetLordLady] of this realm.
translation: 你不忠的摄政似乎吞下了超出[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]的承受能力的东西。[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]完全篡取你的王位的企图适得其反，反而被剥夺了[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]摄政头衔。你被释放出来，现在可以作为这个王国的[Root.GetLordLady]掌握合法的权力。

original: Is... is that the sun?
translation: 那……那是太阳吗？

original: The [Root.Liege.GetTitle] is set free!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitle]得到自由！

original: While you were locked up, your regent has been busily gathering enough support at court to finally steal away your title. The despicable theft of your birthright is now complete.
translation: 在您被监禁期间，您的摄政一直在忙于从宫廷中获得足够的支持来最终窃取您的头衔。这件可耻的偷窃你与生俱来的权力的行为已经成功了。

original: This is not happening...
translation: 这不是真的……

original: A new [Root.Liege.GetTitle].
translation: 新的[Root.Liege.GetTitle]。

original: You cunningly trick one of the guards into leaving the door to your tower unlocked. After escaping into the castle, you kick open the door to the main chamber where your jackal regent [Root.Regent.GetFirstName] sits bewildered on your throne. As the confused courtiers whisper to each other, you bellow at the top of your lungs:
translation: 你狡猾地骗走了你所在塔楼的一名守卫，并且他忘了锁门。在逃入城堡之后，你踢开了通往主厅的门，您的骗子摄政[Root.Regent.GetFirstName]正手足无措地坐在您的王位上。在迷惑的廷臣们互相耳语的时候，您用尽肺里的每一分空气大喊：

original: Hear me! I am the rightful [Root.GetLordLady] of this land!
translation: 听着！我是这片土地真正的[Root.GetLordLady]！

original: GOBBLEDYGOOK!
translation: 一篇冠冕堂皇的空话！

original: The guards escort you back to your tower and nail the door shut from the outside...
translation: 卫兵把你押送回你的塔楼，并且从外面把门钉上了……

original: If this is to be my kingdom, then so be it.
translation: 如果我的王国要变成这样，那么就让它这样吧。

original: Well, you gave it your best shot...
translation: 好吧，你做出了最好的一次尝试……

original: Disaster! Somehow [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to escape from his tower and rally enough support to oust you from your position as regent! The guards turn on you and throw you into the dungeon.
translation: 灾难！[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]设法逃离了他的塔楼并召集到了足够的支持者来把你从摄政的位置上赶下去！卫兵转身朝你攻击，并把你投入了地牢。

original: It was not to be.
translation: 不应该啊。

original: Your regent is arrested.
translation: 你的摄政被抓了起来。

original: The throne shan't be yours so long as [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] draws breath. If an accident was to befall the whelp... they happen so easily, after all. As [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] regent, perhaps you should appoint some simple chores to the [Root.Liege.GetLadLass]. The castle roof has long needed to be scrubbed clean of bird-droppings...
translation: 只要[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]还活着，王位就轮不到你。如果一场事故降临在这个小崽子身上……毕竟意外事故是很常见的。作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]摄政，或许你应该指派[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]做一些简单的劳动。城堡的屋顶已经很久没有清洗过了，上面堆满了鸟粪……

original: It builds character.
translation: 这种事能够塑造人格。

original: No, that would not be worthy of a [Root.Liege.GetTitle].
translation: 不，这种事不值得由[Root.Liege.GetTitle]去做。

original: At times you can't shake the feeling that your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], does not always have your best in mind. Claiming it will build character, [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] has given you the dangerous task of scrubbing away bird-droppings from the castle roof. If you lose your balance even once...
translation: 有时这种感觉在你心头徘徊不去，你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]对你不怀好意。[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]交给你一项危险的任务，让你去清洗城堡屋顶上的鸟粪，并宣称这可以塑造人格。只要你稍一失去平衡……

original: Isn't this what servants are for?
translation: 这不是仆人做的事情么？

original: May perish in an unfortunate accident.
translation: 你也许会在一次不幸的事故中死去。

original: You had a few close calls, but the roof is now shining clean and you made it down in one piece. If the confounded birds return, you will have a chance to hone your skills at archery.
translation: 好几次你都差点摔下去，但是现在屋顶干净的闪闪发光，好像一个整体一样。如果这些讨厌的鸟又飞回来，你将有机会来磨练自己的箭术。

original: An honest day's work.
translation: 一整天辛勤的劳动。

original: a roof free of bird excrements.
translation: 没有鸟粪的屋顶。

original: So the child has a good sense of balance. No matter. Perhaps a trip to the countryside would do [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] some good. There are some dense woods not far from here, infested with wolves and bandits. One could easily get lost in them...
translation: 这个孩子有着出色的平衡感。没关系。也许一次乡村旅行对[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]有好处。在那旁边不远有一片茂密的树林，林中有成群的狼和盗贼。一个人很容易有去无回……

original: Come, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]. You are going on a little trip.
translation: 来吧，[Root.Liege.GetFirstName]。你将会进行一次短途旅行。

original: The risk is too great.
translation: 风险太大了。

original: [Root.Regent.GetFirstName], your regent, has arranged for you to tour the nearby countryside and visit your subjects living there. As you enter a dense forest, your escort mysteriously melts away into the brush and you are left to fend for yourself.
translation: 您的摄政[Root.Regent.GetFirstName]为您安排了一次去临近乡村的旅行，您可以拜访那里的臣民。当您进入一片密林的时候，您的廷臣神秘地消失在丛林中，您被一个人留在那里。

original: H-hello? Anyone?
translation: 你——你好？有人在么？

original: The guards at the castle gates nearly turn you away as peasant rabble when you finally make it back. Your face is caked with dirt, your fancy clothes are torn, but your signet ring proves your identity. Blind luck alone helped you conceal it from the bandits you met on the way.
translation: 当你拼尽全力终于回到城堡的时候，门口的守卫差点把你当作暴乱的农民赶跑。你的脸上沾满灰尘，您带有花边的精致衣服被撕破了，但是你戒指上的图章证明了你的身份。全靠运气你才能把戒指藏起来，而没有让你路上碰到的盗贼抢走。

original: My feet hurt.
translation: 我的脚疼。

original: safely returning to civilization (such as it is).
translation: 安全的回到了文明世界（虽然不怎么文明）。

original: Unbelievable... the runt made it back alive! Well, this time I have arranged for a special carriage to take [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to meet with a foreign dignitary. The driver has been instructed to lose control of the carriage at a certain point on the journey, sending the whole thing careening down a ravine...
translation: 难以置信……这个矮子成功生还了！好吧，这次我安排了一辆特殊的马车送[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]去与一位外国显贵见面。车夫已经接到指示，让他在路上的特定地点故意让马车失去控制，把整辆车送入山谷……

original: You leave at dawn, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName].
translation: 你在清晨出发，[Root.Liege.GetFirstName]。

original: It will never work.
translation: 这不会成功的。

original: Your old bore of a regent, [Root.Regent.GetFirstName], wants you to meet with some foreign dignitary in the middle of nowhere. As your carriage travels alongside a deep ravine, the driver suddenly seems to lose control of the horses...
translation: 你的讨厌的老摄政[Root.Regent.GetFirstName]，想让你同一位外国的显贵在一个偏僻的地方会面。当你的马车顺着一条深深的山谷行走时，突然间车夫好像失去了对马匹的控制……

original: *scream like a girl*
translation: *像个女孩一样尖叫*

original: You throw yourself to safety only moments before the carriage loses one of its wheels, tips over and plummets down the ravine. The driver, who jumped off at the first sign of trouble, looks at you with a frown that almost seems disappointed.
translation: 你赶在马车失去一个轮子之前安全地跳了出去，马车头朝下笔直坠落到山谷里。车夫在事故发生的第一时间就跳下了车，他紧皱眉头看着你，好像很失望的样子。

original: The clumsy oaf should hang for this.
translation: 应该为此把这个笨手笨脚的人吊死。

original: surviving a tragic carriage accident.
translation: 从一场悲惨的车祸中生还。

original: You take a moment up on the castle ramparts to contemplate your bad luck in dealing with [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], only to see the carefree little scamp strut past below. Next to you is an especially corpulent guard leaning half-asleep against his halberd. A gentle push could send him falling down on [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]...
translation: 你在城堡的城墙上安静片刻来思考你在对付[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的事情上的坏运气，你突然看见那个无忧无虑的小流氓在城墙下大摇大摆的走着。在你身旁是一个异常肥胖的卫兵，他正靠着他的戟打盹。轻轻的一推就能把他推下去砸在[Root.Liege.GetFirstName]的头上……

original: *tackle the guard with all your might*
translation: *尽全力把这个卫兵推下去*

original: No, fortune clearly favors this [Root.Liege.GetLadLass].
translation: 不，运气显然站在这位[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]一边。

original: You walk through the castle courtyard minding your own business when a dark shadow suddenly forms around you. There is just enough time to look up and see the screaming, grossly overweight guard tumbling down at you from the upper ramparts.
translation: 你在城堡的庭院中散步，思考着属于你的产业，这时一个阴影突然在你身旁出现。时间仅够你抬头看见那个尖叫着的过度肥胖的卫兵从城墙上向你头顶摔下来。

original: Oh dear.
translation: 哦我的天。

original: As if by divine intervention, the guard narrowly misses you and impacts the ground just ahead with a heavy, bone-shattering thud. Above, on the rampart from which he fell, stands your regent, [Root.Regent.GetFirstName]. With a trembling voice [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] asks if you are all right.
translation: 好像是神在眷顾你，那个卫兵紧挨着你撞向地面，跟着传来一声沉重的骨头破裂的声音。城墙上卫兵掉落的位置站着你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetFirstName]。[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]用颤抖的声音询问你是否平安无恙。

original: Better than the guard.
translation: 比那个卫兵强。

original: not cushioning the guard's fall at your own expense.
translation: 没让自己成为卫兵的肉垫。

original: Enough games. If you want the [Root.Liege.GetLadLass] dead, you will clearly have to take more direct action! Blinded by rage and with your best dagger in hand, you rush towards [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] bedchamber...
translation: 你受够这些把戏了。如果你想让[Root.Liege.GetLadLass]死掉，显然你必须采取更加直接的行动！你被愤怒蒙蔽了双眼，拿着你最好的短剑冲向[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]卧室……

original: DIE!!!
translation: 死吧！！！

original: I must keep my wits about. I could lose everything...
translation: 我必须让自己冷静的思考。这样做我会失去一切……

original: You retreat to your bedchamber to consider the unlikely series of accidents you have suffered recently. Suddenly the door flies ajar with a bang. Your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], stands before you, [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] eyes burning with hatred. A sharp dagger is clutched in [Root.Regent.GetHerHis] hand and without a word, [Root.Regent.GetSheHe] lunges at you...
translation: 你回到你的卧室，思考最近发生在你身上的一系列不可思议的事故。砰的一声，门突然被撞开。你的摄政[Root.Regent.GetTitledName]站在你的面前，[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]双眼中燃烧着仇恨。[Root.Regent.GetHerHis]手里拿着一把锋利的短剑，一声不吭，[Root.Regent.GetSheHe]向你猛刺过来……

original: Help! Guards!
translation: 救命！卫兵！

original: May perish in an unfortunate stabbing spree.
translation: 也许会不幸地死在一场疯狂的刺杀之中。

original: Did... did I miss something?
translation: 我……我刚才避开了什么东西么？

original: bravely evading the dagger.
translation: 英勇地躲避短剑。

original: Before you can plunge your blade into the wretched little monster's heart, [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] guards intervene and you are dragged away kicking and screaming to the dungeons. Can't they see that [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] HAS to die?
translation: 在你把刀锋刺进这个可怜的小怪物的心脏之前，[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]卫兵及时赶到并把你投入了地牢，一路上尖叫声和踢打声不断。他们难道不明白[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]必须死么？

original: Let me kill [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]. Just a little bit.
translation: 让我杀了[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]。差一点就成功了。

original: Somehow [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName] has managed to worm [Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHis] way into being titled regent of poor [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. This grave error could cost the realm dearly - clearly there is no one better qualified than you for this position.
translation: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]一步步得到了可怜的[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政头衔。整个王国会为这个严重的错误付出沉重的代价——显然没有人比你更适合这个位置。

original: Challenge the coward to single combat!
translation: 用决斗来挑战这个懦夫！

original: Make your case at court.
translation: 向宫廷提出你的意见。

original: It is not worth the effort.
translation: 这不值得努力。

original: Doubts have been expressed at court whether you truly have the skill and ability required to serve as the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]'s regent. [From.GetTitledName] has accused you of incompetence and is arguing that the realm would benefit much more if [From.GetSheHe] was regent.
translation: 有人向宫廷质疑你是否真正具有成为[Root.Liege.GetTitle]的摄政所需要的技巧和能力。[From.GetTitledName]指责你无能，并且声称如果[From.GetSheHe]成为摄政的话国家会获益良多。

original: Challenge the coward to single combat!
translation: 用决斗来挑战这个懦夫！

original: Rally support at court.
translation: 在宫廷中争取支持。

original: Abdicate your position.
translation: 让出你的位置。

original: Regency put into question.
translation: 摄政遭到质疑。

original: You have successfully made your case at court, and been appointed as the new regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. The realm is now safely delivered from the incompetent hands of [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName].
translation: 宫廷通过了你的申请，并任命你为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的新的摄政。王国从无能的[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]手上平安地移交出来。

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] should be pleased.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]会为此感到高兴。

original: Becomes new regent.
translation: 成为新的摄政。

original: It seems [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName] had too many friends at court. Your attempts to replace [Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim] as regent have met with failure, and [Root.Liege.Regent.GetSheHe] is none too pleased...
translation: 看来[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]在宫廷中有很多支持者。你取代[Root.Liege.Regent.GetHerHim]成为摄政的企图遭到失败，而且[Root.Liege.Regent.GetSheHe]对你感到非常气愤……

original: I did it for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我是为了[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]而做的！

original: Those who doubted me will be sorry.
translation: 那些质疑我的人会后悔的。

original: successfully defending your regency.
translation: 成功守卫了你的摄政权。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has somehow managed to convince the sycophants at court to appoint [From.GetHerHim] as the new regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]设法成功地说服宫廷中的马屁精任命[From.GetHerHim]作为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的新摄政。

original: Fools!
translation: 蠢货！

original: losing your regency to [From.GetTitledName].
translation: 失去你对[From.GetTitledName]的摄政权。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has accused you of cowardice and incompetence! He claims you are not fit to serve as the regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], and has challenged you to single combat for the title.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]指责你又怯懦又无能！他声称你不适合担任[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政，他已经要求与你进行决斗来争夺摄政的头衔。

original: At last, someone who understands politics!
translation: 终于有懂得政治为何物的人了！

original: I need not prove my martial prowess.
translation: 我不需要证明我打仗的本事。

original: If he wants the title so badly, he can have it.
translation: 如果他这么想要这项头衔的话，那就给他吧。

original: The challenge is issued!
translation: 发起挑战！

original: That madman [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName] has challenged you to a duel in what can only be a desperate bid to preserve his regency. What say you?
translation: 那个疯子[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]向你发出决斗的挑战，这是一次绝望的赌博，只有这样他才可以继续做他的摄政。你的看法如何？

original: Ha! I would have it no other way!
translation: 哈！就这样办吧！

original: Surely you jest... a duel? He can keep the bloody regency.
translation: 你一定是在开玩笑……决斗？让他继续他那血腥的摄政吧。

original: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName] has accepted your terms. As dawn breaks, you meet on a field just outside [Root.Location.GetName]. The mist still lies thick on the ground and the brilliance of the early morning sun is reflected in the shining steel of your weapons and armor. It is a good day to die.
translation: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]接受了你的挑战。天刚破晓，你们就在紧挨着[Root.Location.GetName]外面的场地中碰面。地面上仍然飘荡着浓厚的雾气，璀璨的朝阳照在你们的武器和铠甲上闪闪发光。这是死亡的好日子。

original: Have at thee!
translation: 看招！

original: Challenge accepted!
translation: 接受挑战！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has accepted your terms. As dawn breaks, you meet on a field just outside [Root.Location.GetName]. The mist still lies thick on the ground and the brilliance of the early morning sun is reflected in the shining steel of your weapons and armor. It is a good day to die.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]接受了你的挑战。天刚破晓，你们就在紧挨着[Root.Location.GetName]外面的场地中碰面。地面上仍然飘荡着浓厚的雾气，璀璨的朝阳照在你们的武器和铠甲上闪闪发光。这是死亡的好日子。

original: Come then. Let us settle this.
translation: 来吧。让我们做个了断。

original: He actually came? I... I am needed elsewhere.
translation: 他真的来了？我……我还有点别的事情。

original: The matter is settled.
translation: 事件得到解决。

original: delivering a killing blow.
translation: 送出致命的一击。

original: Learn from this. Do not oppose me again.
translation: 从这件事中吸取教训吧。不要再对我有丝毫的反抗。

original: inflicting a serious wound.
translation: 身受重伤。

original: As the blackness recedes and your sight returns, you find yourself lying on your back in the tall grass. You feel the warm, sticky sensation of blood gushing from a deep wound somewhere beneath your mail. Your foe leans over you in silence, ready to deal the finishing blow, but to your shame elects to spare your wretched life.
translation: 当黑暗完全退去，你的视觉恢复的时候，你发现自己躺在高高的草丛中。你感到温暖粘稠的鲜血从你的锁子甲下的深处涌出。你的仇敌安静地向你俯下身子，准备好给你最后的一击，但是让你感到耻辱的是他选择了饶你一条小命。

original: I have been robbed of a glorious death.
translation: 我被剥夺了光荣战死的机会。

original: The regent loses, is maimed.
translation: 摄政输掉了决斗，并且受了重伤。

original: There was never any doubt how this would end.
translation: 这件事情结束的方式毫无悬念。

original: delivering a killing blow.
translation: 送出致命的一击。

original: Be gone from my sight. Ye are not fit to serve the [Root.Liege.GetTitle].
translation: 滚出我的视线，你不适合当[Root.Liege.GetTitle]的摄政。

original: Only one of us can leave this field alive, friend. I am sorry.
translation: 我们之中只有一人可以活着离开决斗场地，我的朋友。对此我感到十分遗憾。

original: inflicting a serious wound.
translation: 身受重伤。

original: As the blackness recedes and your sight returns, you find yourself lying on your back in the tall grass. You feel the warm, sticky sensation of blood gushing from a deep wound somewhere under your mail. Your foe leans over you in silence, ready to deal the finishing blow, but to your shame elects to spare your wretched life.
translation: 当黑暗完全退去，你的视觉恢复的时候，你发现自己躺在高高地草丛中。你感到温暖粘稠的鲜血从你的锁子甲下的深处涌出。你的仇敌安静地向你俯下身子，准备好给你最后的一击，但是让你感到耻辱的是他选择了饶你一条小命。

original: I have been robbed of a glorious death.
translation: 我被剥夺了光荣战死的机会。

original: spared from death.
translation: 免于死亡。

original: You arrive at the agreed upon location of the duel, only to find that [From.GetTitledName] is nowhere to be found. The coward dares not face you after all!
translation: 你抵达了约定的决斗场地，却找不见[From.GetTitledName]的身影。这个胆小鬼根本不敢来见你！

original: That worm.
translation: 那个懦夫。

original: Informed of your shameful cowardice.
translation: 得知你可耻的怯懦。

original: Your opponent plunges his sword deep into your flank, and it takes you a few confused moments to realize all that blood is coming from you. You fall to your knees as life fades away...
translation: 你的仇敌将他的剑深深的插入你的侧肋，你错愕片刻才发现鲜血是从你的身体中冒出的。你跪倒在地，感到生命从你的身体中流逝……

original: It wasn't supposed to end like this...
translation: 事情不应该这样结束……

original: is put out of his misery.
translation: 结束了他的痛苦。

original: Your former regent has been bested in single combat. The duel's victor, [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName], has taken his place.
translation: 你的前任摄政在一场决斗中被击败。决斗的胜利者[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]已经接过了他的权位。

original: Due to court intrigue well beyond your present ability to comprehend, your current serving regent has been replaced with another.
translation: 由于宫廷中超出你现在的理解范围的密谋，你目前的摄政被另一个人所取代。

original: I should be the one to rule in my husband's stead, not [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]. It is only proper.
translation: 应该由我来代替我的丈夫执政，而不是[Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]。这是唯一正当的事情。

original: Make it so!
translation: 就这样做吧！

original: As Queen Mother, I have decided to take over the responsibilities and duties of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s regency.
translation: 作为太后，我决定担起[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政职责。

original: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName], you are dismissed.
translation: [Root.Liege.Regent.GetTitledName]，你被解职了。

original: Your loving wife has decided that she would do a better job serving as your regent. After all, who but her could rule the realm in accordance with your own desires?
translation: 你钟爱的妻子认为让她来做你的摄政是件好事。毕竟，有什么人可以像她一样按照你的意志治理王国呢？

original: No one.
translation: 没有人。

original: I have a wife?
translation: 我有个妻子？

original: That hag!
translation: 那个母夜叉！

original: The Queen Mother has used her considerable influence to step in as your regent. May the realm benefit from her wisdom and experience.
translation: 太后利用她举足轻重的影响力成为了你的摄政。愿王国从她的智慧和阅历中受益。

original: New content is now available for purchase
translation: 新的内容已经可供购买

original: Women do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other men.
translation: 女人不能引起我的兴趣，相反我被其他男人所吸引。

original: Men do not interest me, instead I feel drawn to other women.
translation: 男人不能引起我的兴趣，相反我被其他女人所吸引。

original:
My liege,
I write to you with shocking news! [FromFrom.GetTitledName] tried to have me assassinated to make sure I wouldn't discover [FromFrom.GetHerHis] plot to [FromFrom.GetPlot].

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我在信里给您带来一个惊人的消息！[FromFrom.GetTitledName]想要暗杀我，以确保我不会发现[FromFrom.GetHerHis][FromFrom.GetPlot]的阴谋。

您谦卑的间谍总管，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Actually, going to war was not my plan...
translation: 实际上，我并不想开战……

original: $ATTACKER$'s $ORDER$War to Revoke $OTHER_TITLE$
translation: $ORDER$ $ATTACKER$剥夺$OTHER_TITLE$战争

original: Tell them who stole the cookies and the quill!
translation: 告诉他们是你偷的糕点和羽毛笔！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes rivals
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为仇敌

original: Let us wreak havoc together!
translation: 让我们一起大肆破坏吧！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] mischievous planning makes them friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]的恶作剧计划让他们成为朋友

original: I had watched the cook scold [From.GetFirstName] and the spymaster try to bribe [From.GetHerHim] to give back his quill to no avail - I held the bluish, precious quill in my right hand and a cookie in my left. While playing with it and eating cookies I did not notice [From.GetFirstName] sneak up on me and snatch the quill from my hands.
translation: 我看见厨师训斥[From.GetFirstName]，还有间谍总管想要贿赂[From.GetHerHim]来要回他的羽毛笔，他们都在白费劲——我的右手拿着浅蓝色的贵重羽毛笔，左手拿着一块糕点。当我玩着笔吃着糕点的时候，我没有注意到[From.GetFirstName]悄悄地走近我并把那支笔从我手里抢走。

original: Hey! Give that back, that's mine now!
translation: 嘿！还给我，它现在是我的了！

original: Rival
translation: 仇敌

original: I thought [From.GetFirstName] would tell the cook it was I who had stolen the cookies and make me give the quill back to the spymaster. [From.GetFirstName] surprised me when [From.GetSheHe] instead asked me how I managed to steal the quill right under the spymaster's nose and wanted my help to get back at the cook for scolding [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我本以为[From.GetFirstName]会告诉厨师是我偷了糕点并且逼我把笔还给间谍总管。但[From.GetFirstName]却让我大吃一惊，相反[From.GetSheHe]询问我是怎样在间谍总管的眼皮底下把这支羽毛笔偷出来的，还想让我帮他报复训斥[From.GetHerHim]的厨师。

original: I could do that!
translation: 我能做到！

original: Tease the shy child
translation: 戏弄这个害羞的小孩子

original: [This.GetFirstName] is teased by [Root.GetFirstName]
translation: [This.GetFirstName]被[Root.GetFirstName]戏弄

original: I ask if the child would like to borrow my toy sword
translation: 我问这个孩子想不想借我的玩具剑玩

original: [Root.GetFirstName] talks to [This.GetFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]同[This.GetFirstName]讲话

original: Leave the child alone
translation: 让他自己呆着去吧

original: I was reading under the big tree, listening to the other children's laughter and screams, not noticing [From.GetFirstName] until [From.GetSheHe] stood before me and grabbed the book, flinging it away.\n\n'So, nose-in-books, what are you going to about it?'
translation: 我正在一棵大树下读书，听着其他孩子笑闹的声音，直到[From.GetFirstName]站在我面前抢走我的书并把它扔到一边，我才注意到[From.GetSheHe]。\n\n「好了，书呆子，你想干什么？」

original: You will hurt so much your grandchildren will be born crying!
translation: 我会把你打疼，疼得让你的孙子出生的时候也是哭着的！

original: [Root.GetFirstName] punches [This.GetFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]用拳猛击[This.GetFirstName]

original: N-nothing...
translation: 没，没事……

original: I was enjoying my latest find in the library, listening to the other children's laughter to make sure they wouldn't show up and drop another frog down my shirt or on the fragile pages of the book when [From.GetFirstName] sneaked up on me, asked me a bunch of questions about the book and then offered to let me borrow [From.GetHerHis] toy sword.
translation: 我一边读着刚从图书馆里找到的书，一边听着其他孩子们的笑声，确保他们不会又一次突然出现，把青蛙扔到我的衬衣里，或者扔到这本书脆弱的纸张上。[From.GetFirstName]悄悄地走近了我，问了我一大堆关于这本书的问题并表示愿意把[From.GetHerHis]玩具剑借给我。

original: I'd love to!
translation: 我十分想玩这把剑！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] plays together and becomes friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]一起玩耍并且成为一对好朋友

original: I'm afraid of swords...
translation: 我惧怕刀剑……

original: I did not even see [From.GetFirstName] throw the punch that made me fall head-first into the mud puddle!
translation: 我甚至还没有看清[From.GetFirstName]是怎样出拳的，我就已经头朝下的栽进了泥坑里！

original: I'm gonna kill you!
translation: 我要杀了你！

original: The teased [This.GetFirstName] and [Root.GetFirstName] becomes fierce rivals
translation: 被戏耍的[This.GetFirstName]和[Root.GetFirstName]成为激烈的仇敌

original: Woah, that was a fantastic punch! Show me how you did that!
translation: 哇哦，这一拳太精彩了！快告诉我你是怎么做到的！

original: [This.GetFirstName] and [Root.GetFirstName] becomes friends
translation: [This.GetFirstName]和[Root.GetFirstName]成为朋友

original: I watched nervously as [From.GetFirstName] slowly got up from the mud puddle [From.GetSheHe] fell into when I punched [From.GetHerHim], ready to run away if [From.GetFirstName] would want revenge. [From.GetSheHeCap] did not even try to grab me, [From.GetFirstName] apologised for throwing my book away and asked if I could show [From.GetHerHim] how to punch like that.
translation: 在我打了[From.GetHerHim]之后，我紧张地看着[From.GetFirstName]慢慢地从[From.GetSheHe]掉入的泥坑里爬起来。我已经做好准备，一旦[From.GetFirstName]想报复，我就逃跑。可[From.GetSheHeCap]甚至没有想要抓住我，[From.GetFirstName]为扔掉我的书这件事向我道歉，还问我可不可以向[From.GetHerHim]演示一下怎样像那一拳一样出拳。

original: Promise you are not angry?
translation: 你真的没有生气？

original: I had barely time to pick up the book and then run for my life when [From.GetFirstName] roared like a mad bull and came charging after me, face full of mud and seeking revenge for me punching [From.GetHerHim]. I fled and hid in the kitchen, only to hear [From.GetFirstName] swear [From.GetSheHe] would get [From.GetHerHis] revenge on me, if it would take [From.GetHerHis] whole life so be it so.
translation: 我连把那本书捡起来然后再逃跑的时间都没有，就看见[From.GetFirstName]满脸泥巴，像一头疯牛一样咆哮着向我冲来，想要报复我刚才打[From.GetHerHim]的那一拳。我逃进厨房躲了起来，只听见[From.GetFirstName]发誓[From.GetSheHe]一定会报[From.GetHerHis]仇，哪怕是为此付出[From.GetHerHis]整个生命都在所不惜。

original: We will never be friends now...
translation: 我们从此以后不再是朋友了……

original: Once again, [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] found out that I tried to dodge my chores but before I broke down and admitted I had done just that, someone else took the blame for it.
translation: [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]发现我又想逃避我的家务劳动，但是在我坚持不住想要承认是我犯的错误之前，另外一个人帮我担下了责任。

original: Thank him profusely when out of earshot
translation: 在监护人听不见的时候向他表示衷心的感谢

original: [This.GetFirstName] is glad to help a friend
translation: [This.GetFirstName]乐于帮助朋友

original: Why did you interfere? I had it under control!
translation: 你为什么要干预这件事情？一切尽在我掌握之中！

original: [This.GetFirstName] just wanted to help
translation: [This.GetFirstName]只是想提供帮助

original: Tell your guardian [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] the truth
translation: 告诉你的监护人[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]真相

original: [From.GetFirstName] was in trouble, again. [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] was scolding [From.GetFirstName] about [From.GetHerHis] slothfulness and failure to do [From.GetHerHis] chores. I interfered and made it sound as if it was my fault [From.GetFirstName] hadn't been able to do [From.GetHerHis] chores...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]又一次陷入麻烦之中。[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]正在因为没做[From.GetHerHis]家务劳动而显示出的[From.GetHerHis]懒惰行为而责骂[From.GetFirstName]。我介入了这件事情，让[From.GetFirstName]没法做完[From.GetHerHis]家务劳动听起来像是我的错误……

original: [From.GetFirstName] thanked me profusely and we became fast friends
translation: [From.GetFirstName]衷心的感谢我，我们成为可靠的朋友

original: [From.GetFirstName] made it clear [From.GetSheHe] did not want my help
translation: [From.GetFirstName]清楚地表示[From.GetSheHe]不需要我的帮助

original: Then [This.GetFirstName] won't care if I tell [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] the truth
translation: 那么如果我告诉[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]真相[This.GetFirstName]也不会介意咯

original: Next time, I won't help [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 下一次，我再也不去帮助[From.GetFirstName]了

original: I learnt my lesson: never help someone in need...
translation: 我得到了教训：永远不要帮助需要帮助的人……

original: Ever since [From.GetFirstName] tried to save me from getting scolded by [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] for not doing my chores and me refusing to thank [From.GetHerHim] for it, [From.GetFirstName] has been a regular thorn in my side. I believe [From.GetSheHe] is determined to make me [From.GetHerHis] rival.
translation: 自从[From.GetFirstName]尝试让我免于因为没有做家务而被[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]责骂，我却没有为这件事感谢[From.GetHerHim]之后，[From.GetFirstName]经常找我的麻烦。我认为[From.GetSheHe]下定决心要把我当成[From.GetHerHis]仇人。

original: If that's what [From.GetSheHe] wants, then so be it!
translation: 如果那就是[From.GetSheHe]想要的，那么就来吧！

original: I watched and winced in sympathy as yet another lady rejected the poor man. It was clear to me that he lacked even the ability to talk to women but why he persisted I could not understand. Never had I had the same problem, maybe it was time for me to take a student?
translation: 刚刚又一位小姐拒绝了这个可怜男人，我怀着同情的心情看着他。我很明白他甚至缺乏基本的同女人谈话的能力，但是我无法理解为什么他一直坚持不懈。我从没遇到过同样的问题，也许我有这个必要告诉他一点，人生的经验？

original: I should offer him help
translation: 我应该向他提供帮助

original: [Root.GetFirstName] offers to help [This.GetFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]想要帮助[This.GetFirstName]

original: I fear the competition...
translation: 我害怕以后他会与我竞争……

original: I have never had any luck with women, no matter what subject I try to talk about they just seem to leave as soon as I utters the first word. [From.GetFirstName] interrupted my self-loathing thoughts and offered to help me charm or at least be able to talk to women without them leaving in the middle of a sentence.
translation: 我从来没有女人运，不管我想要尝试什么话题，她们看上去都恨不得越早走开越好。[From.GetFirstName]打断了我自卑的想法并提出要帮助我变得吸引人，至少能够正常的谈话而不是让她们在我说话的时候走开。

original: Of course I accept [From.GetHerHis] help!
translation: 我当然接受[From.GetHerHis]帮助！

original: [Root.GetFirstName] accepted [This.GetTitledFirstName] offer to help
translation: [Root.GetFirstName]接受了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助

original: I can do it on my own!
translation: 我自己可以做好！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rejected [This.GetTitledFirstName] offer to help
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助

original: I am happy as I am, thank you!
translation: 我这样就很好，谢谢你！

original: [From.GetFirstName] was willing to learn but had no idea how [From.GetFirstName] should talk to women or what subject would interest them. We started small, I let [From.GetHerHim] talk to the cook who were more than happy to talk about her cooking. Then it got harder and harder until [From.GetFirstName] finally was able to talk to every woman in the castle and charm her nearly as well as I can.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]想要学习，但是[From.GetFirstName]对于应该如何与女人交谈或者她们对什么话题感兴趣没有丝毫的概念。我们从小事上做起，我让[From.GetHerHim]同厨娘谈论她的厨艺，她很愿意谈论这一话题。然后难度逐渐加大，直到[From.GetFirstName]终于可以同城堡中的任何女人交谈，并且像我一样的迷人。

original: During that time, we became friends
translation: 在这一期间，我们成为朋友

original: I had honestly thought [From.GetFirstName] would enthusiastically accept my help or at least show some interest in learning some of what I knew about women and how to charm them.
translation: 我本以为[From.GetFirstName]会热情地接受我的帮助，或者至少对向我学习一些关于女人的知识和吸引她们的方法感兴趣。

original: [From.GetFirstName] rejected my offer brusquely
translation: [From.GetFirstName]唐突地拒绝了我的帮助

original: [From.GetFirstName] politely told me [From.GetSheHe] needed no help
translation: [From.GetFirstName]礼貌地告诉我[From.GetSheHe]不需要帮助

original: Charming, pleasant and amusing is not words people would describe me with, but the man talking to the small group of women is all that and perhaps more. I wish I could be as charming and be able to talk to women without stuttering or inadvertently insulting them...
translation: 迷人，令人愉快以及风趣，没人会用这些词语来形容我，但是那个同女人交谈的男人具备以上的所有甚至更多。我希望我可以像他一样迷人，并且可以同女人正常交谈，而不是结结巴巴或者无意中冒犯到她们……

original: Will he help me if I ask nicely?
translation: 如果我好好向他询问，他会不会帮助我？

original: is asked by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to help [Root.GetHerHim] conquer [Root.GetHerHis] fear of women
translation: 被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]拜托来帮助[Root.GetHerHim]克服[Root.GetHerHis]女性恐惧

original: He can have whatever he wants if only he helps me!
translation: 只要他帮助我，他可以得到任何他想要的！

original: is bribed by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to help [Root.GetHerHim] conquer [Root.GetHerHis] fear of women
translation: 被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]贿赂来帮助[Root.GetHerHim]克服[Root.GetHerHis]女性恐惧

original: Forget it, I'm a nobody and women knows it
translation: 忘掉这个想法吧，我是个没用的人，女人都知道这点

original: At first I found it unsettling that [From.GetFirstName] asked me to help [From.GetHerHim] conquer [From.GetHerHis] shyness and teach [From.GetHerHim] to be able to at least talk to a woman without unintentionally insulting her. [From.GetFirstName] said [From.GetSheHe] wanted be as charming and pleasant as I am.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]拜托我帮助[From.GetHerHim]克服[From.GetHerHis]害羞，并教[From.GetHerHim]如何做到在同女人谈话时至少不会无意中冒犯她们，起初我还有点不知所措。[From.GetFirstName]说[From.GetSheHe]想变得像我一样迷人，令人愉悦。

original: I'll help you, but it's gonna cost you
translation: 我会帮助你，但是你要付给我一大笔报酬

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] agrees to help [This.GetTitledFirstName], but for a prize...
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]同意帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]，但是索要高额的报酬……

original: I would be glad to!
translation: 我对此感到十分荣幸！

original: Under [Root.GetTitledFirstName] watchful eye, [This.GetTitledFirstName] learns how to talk to women
translation: 在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的注视下，[This.GetTitledFirstName]学会了如何与女人交谈

original: I have gone so long without craving the touch of another human, but now I have grown wiser. I have lost the §YChaste§! trait.
translation: 我很久都没有渴望同另一个人嘿咻，但是现在我变聪明了。我失去了§Y忠贞§!的特质。

original: As if I would want someone to compete with me about women's hearts!
translation: 我怎么会让其他人同我争夺女人的心！

original: The rivalry between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] reveals itself
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]之间的竞争关系自动显露了出来

original: [From.GetFirstName] listened thoughtfully when I asked [From.GetHerHim] to help me get over my shyness and learn how to charm or at least talk to a woman! I looked at [From.GetHerHim] pleadingly and after hesitating at first [From.GetFirstName] agreed to help me, for a small sum of money.
translation: 在我拜托[From.GetHerHim]帮助我克服害羞，并且教会我吸引女人或者至少同女人谈话的方法的时候，[From.GetFirstName]若有所思地听着。我用恳求的眼神看着[From.GetHerHim]，在最初的犹豫之后[From.GetFirstName]同意帮助我，条件是一小笔报酬。

original: Yes! Of course! Here you go...
translation: 是的！当然了！给你……

original: No, I don't think so...
translation: 不，我认为这件事不值这个价钱……

original: I was willing to learn but I could decipher from [From.GetFirstName] sighs that [From.GetSheHe] thought that I was almost unteachable. No matter who I talked to I made a fool out of myself until [From.GetFirstName] made me talk to the cook who were more than happy to talk about her cooking. From on then it got easier until I finally was able to talk to every woman in the castle and charm them nearly as well as [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我十分想学会，但是我可以从 [From.GetFirstName]的叹息声中分辨出[From.GetSheHe]认为教会我几乎是无法完成的任务。在[From.GetFirstName]让我同厨娘谈论她的厨艺之前，不论我和谁说话，我都把自己弄得像个傻子一样，从那之后事情变得越发容易，直到我终于可以同城堡中的任何女人交谈，并且几乎同[From.GetFirstName]一样吸引她们。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is a true friend!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]是一位真正的朋友！

original: No matter what I said, promised or did, [From.GetFirstName] refused to help me with my problem, being unable to to talk to women. [From.GetSheHeCap] even told me it was because I '...would ruin [From.GetHerHis] chances with women...' But all I asked about was to be able to have a conversation...
translation: 不论我说什么，许诺什么或者做什么，[From.GetFirstName]都拒绝帮我解决我无法同任何女人交谈这一问题。[From.GetSheHeCap]甚至告诉我这是因为我「……会破坏[From.GetHerHis]吸引女人的机会……」但是我想要的仅仅是能够简单的同女人进行对话……

original: This means WAR! Nah, we're just rivals...
translation: 这意味着战争！算了，我们只是竞争仇敌……

original: [From.GetFirstName] promised me a lot of gold if only I could help [From.GetHerHim] conquer [From.GetHerHis] shyness and teach [From.GetHerHim] to charm and talk to women without unintentionally insulting them.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]许诺给我一大笔金币，只要我可以帮助[From.GetHerHim]克服[From.GetHerHis]害羞，教[From.GetHerHim]吸引女人并且同女人正常谈话而不是在无意中冒犯她们。

original: I'll take your gold, you'll lose your pride
translation: 我会接受你的金币，你会失去你的自尊

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I'll help you with this if you can help me with that
translation: 我可以在这件事情上面帮助你，如果你可以在另一件事情上帮助我的话

original: After the money had exchanged hands, [From.GetFirstName] became almost merciless in correcting and teaching me how I should talk to women, what subjects might interest them and how I could stand, sit or smile at them in different ways to get them relaxed or interested. A whole new world opened up before my eyes.
translation: 钱一交到他的手上，[From.GetFirstName]就开始冷酷无情地矫正并且教我应该同女人讲些什么，什么样的话题会让她们感兴趣，还教我怎样站，坐或者向她们微笑可以让她们放松或感兴趣。在我眼前呈现出一个全新的世界。

original: ...and now I can talk to women!
translation: ……现在我可以同女人交谈了！

original: I was playing with my doll by myself, trying to remember a song to sing to my poppet when I saw a girl my age look at my beautiful doll with longing in her eyes...
translation: 我正在同我的玩偶玩耍，想要记起一首歌来唱给我的玩偶听，这时我看见一个和我差不多大的女孩用渴望的眼神看着我的漂亮娃娃……

original: Do you want to play with her?
translation: 你想同她一起玩么？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to befriend [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]想成为[This.GetTitledFirstName]的朋友

original: You're no fun, go away!
translation: 你这人好无趣，走开！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] becomes [This.GetTitledFirstName] rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]成为[This.GetTitledFirstName]的仇敌

original: [From.GetFirstName] was playing with [From.GetHerHis] doll by the pond. It was beautiful with long, braided hair, buttons for eyes and even a dress made of grass. I wanted the doll so much I asked [From.GetFirstName] if I could play with her...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]正在池塘边玩[From.GetHerHis]玩偶。它有着长长的麻花辫，美丽的双眼和草裙。我太喜欢这个玩具娃娃了，所以我问[From.GetFirstName]我能不能和它玩……

original: We played for so long, we almost forgot supper!
translation: 我们玩得时间太长，差点忘了晚饭！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]同[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为朋友

original: ...then I grabbed the doll and ran!
translation: ……然后我抢过那个玩偶并且跑掉了！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] stole [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s doll, making them rivals
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]偷走了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的玩偶，这让她们成为仇敌

original: I just wanted to play with [From.GetFirstName]'s beautiful doll, but when I asked [From.GetHerHim] if I could just hold the doll [From.GetSheHe] screamed at me to go away and threatened to tell my parents I had hit [From.GetHerHim] if I didn't!
translation: 我只想同[From.GetFirstName]的漂亮玩偶一起玩，但是当我问[From.GetHerHim]我可不可以抱一下玩偶的时候，[From.GetSheHe]向我尖叫让我走开，并且威胁说如果我不走开，就告诉我的父母我打[From.GetHerHim]，就算我没有这么做！

original: [From.GetFirstName] will never be my friend!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]永远不会成为我的朋友！

original: I didn't like how [From.GetFirstName] looked at my doll but when [From.GetSheHe] told me how beautiful my doll was I forgave [From.GetFirstName] at once. We played together for so long, we almost missed supper!
translation: 我不喜欢[From.GetFirstName]看我的玩偶的方式，但是当[From.GetSheHe]告诉我我的玩偶是多么的漂亮的时候，我立刻原谅了[From.GetFirstName]。我们一起玩了很长时间，差点错过了晚餐！

original: We will play again tomorrow!
translation: 我们明天再玩！

original: I hugged my doll and then gave her to [From.GetFirstName], who grabbed her and ran away! I tried following [From.GetHerHim], crying the whole time for my doll but [From.GetFirstName] got away!
translation: 我抱了下我的玩偶，然后把她递给[From.GetFirstName]，她却抓过我的玩偶就跑！我想要追上[From.GetHerHim]，我一直哭着要她把玩偶还给我，但是[From.GetFirstName]跑得不见了踪影！

original: Give my doll back! I hate you [From.GetFirstName], so much!
translation: 把我的玩偶还给我！我恨死你了，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: There's a girl at court that is very flirtatious and knows how to play on people's feelings to get what she wants, when she wants it. She is more brave than any other girl I ever met and I envy her sometimes, to be as courageous as she is would be wonderful...
translation: 宫廷中有一个非常轻佻的女孩，她懂得如何玩弄他人的心来得到她想要的东西。她比我见过的其他任何女孩都要勇敢，我时常羡慕她，变得像她一样勇敢将会是一件很棒的事情……

original: Could she find it in her heart to help me?
translation: 她能发自内心帮助我吗？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks [This.GetTitledFirstName] to help [Root.GetHerHim] become courageous
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拜托[This.GetTitledFirstName]帮助[Root.GetHerHim]变得自信

original: She's a trollop!
translation: 她是个婊子！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] shouldn't have called [This.GetTitledFirstName] a trollop
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不应该叫[This.GetTitledFirstName]婊子

original: How I envy her...
translation: 我多么嫉妒她啊……

original: I was kind of flirting with the cute stable boy when [From.GetFirstName] asked me to come help [From.GetHerHim] with something. Thinking it was yet another boring task I couldn't flirt my way out of, I reluctantly followed [From.GetFirstName]. It did surprise me when [From.GetSheHe] asked, no begged me to help [From.GetHerHim] become as courageous as I am.
translation: 我正在和英俊的马童打情骂俏，突然[From.GetFirstName]让我去帮[From.GetHerHim]做事。一边想着这肯定又是一件枯燥的事情，我一边不情愿地跟着[From.GetFirstName]。当[From.GetSheHe]恳求我帮[From.GetHerHim]成为像我一样勇敢的人时，我大吃一惊。

original: I would be my pleasure!
translation: 我很乐意！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] finds a friend in [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]结交了朋友[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: This court is not big enough for both of us!
translation: 这个宫廷无法同时容下我们两个人！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refusal makes [This.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerHis] rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的拒绝使[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌

original: I don't have time for this!
translation: 我没有时间！

original: I cannot flirt my way out of everything. [From.GetFirstName] thinks I'm a trollop after watching me flirt and use my charm to get my will through.
translation: 我不能在所有事情上花言巧语。在看到我调情并运用我的美丽得偿所愿后，[From.GetFirstName]觉得我是个荡妇。

original: Why would I care what [From.GetFirstName] thinks?
translation: 为什么我要在意[From.GetFirstName]的想法？

original: [From.GetFirstName] agreed to help me become more confident and courageous, gave me advice on how to talk to people to get them to like me more and how to use flattery to get my will through. It didn't take long before I could charm the pants off the spymaster if I wanted. Somewhere along my way to confidence, [From.GetFirstName] and I became friends.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]同意帮我变得更加自信和勇敢，教导我怎样与人们交谈，使他们更喜欢我，并运用奉承实现我的愿望。很快，如果我想的话我就可以迷得间谍总管把裤子都脱下来。在我变得更加自信的过程中，[From.GetFirstName]和我成为了好朋友。

original: Best friends, forever!
translation: 最好的朋友，永远如此！

original: I asked [From.GetFirstName] to help me, begged for a bit of understanding and even tried threatening [From.GetHerHim] into helping me gain some confidence and courage, but [From.GetFirstName] refused. [From.GetSheHeCap] did not want to share [From.GetHerHis] hard-earned secrets to confidence and courage.
translation: 我请求[From.GetFirstName]帮助我，恳求甚至试图威胁[From.GetHerHim]帮我变得更自信和勇敢，但[From.GetFirstName]还是拒绝了。[From.GetSheHeCap]不想分享[From.GetHerHis]关于自信和勇气的来之不易的秘密。

original: [From.GetFirstName] must have feared the competition!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]一定是害怕出现竞争者！

original: I wanted someone I could confide in, someone who were a bit more gregarious than me so [Root.GetSheHe] could introduce me to people without making me feel like a fool. A girl my age I could share secrets with, gossip and giggle over boys.
translation: 我想找到一个值得我信任的人，一个比我更合群的人。[Root.GetSheHe]向人们介绍我，并避免使我被认为是个傻瓜。我想找一个和我同龄的女孩，她可以和我一起分享秘密，闲聊八卦，一边谈论男孩子一边傻笑。

original: There should be someone I could talk to!
translation: 应该会有能和我谈话的人！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]同[This.GetTitledFirstName]见面

original: What? Her? Never!
translation: 什么？她？绝不！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dismisses [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝搭理[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I will never find a good friend...
translation: 我永远都不会找到好朋友……

original: [From.GetFirstName] seemed very lonely, so I decided to talk to [From.GetHerHim] a bit and see if I could make [From.GetHerHim] cheer up. It was if a dam had burst open, we talked and gossiped about everything, from the cook who always smelled of liquor to the cute guards.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]看起来非常孤独，所以我决定同[From.GetHerHim]谈一谈看我能不能让[From.GetHerHim]高兴起来。就好像大坝决堤一样，我们无所不谈，从身上总是散发着酒气的厨师到那个帅气的卫兵。

original: I'd like [From.GetFirstName] to be my friend
translation: 我想让[From.GetFirstName]做我的朋友

original: A strong friendship forms between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]建立起牢固的友谊

original: But... I like that guard!
translation: 但是……我喜欢那个卫兵！

original: Rivalry bloom between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 仇敌对立开始在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]之间萌生

original: I hope you feel better now
translation: 我希望你现在感觉好多了

original: I felt as if a dam had burst and swept away with me. When [From.GetFirstName] started talking to me I couldn't stop, we gossiped, laughed and talked for what felt like for ever. I had such a good time I forgot how lonely I had felt just a couple of hours before.
translation: 我感觉如大坝决堤般，孤独感一扫而空。当[From.GetFirstName]开始同我谈话之后，我的话匣子就停不下来了，我们聊着八卦，大声欢笑，感觉想这样永远聊下去。我度过了一段愉快的时光，我甚至忘了几个小时之前我是多么的孤独。

original: Let's do this again, tomorrow perhaps?
translation: 明天我们再找时间接着聊，怎么样？

original: I do feel better now, thank you
translation: 我现在确实感觉好多了，谢谢你

original: I thought [From.GetFirstName] had enjoyed our [Root.GetManWoman]-to-[From.GetManWoman] talk yesterday, and I had really poured my heart out, told [From.GetHerHim] all my secrets and even that I thought one of the guards especially handsome. So when I saw that wench kiss 'my' guard this morning it broke my heart...
translation: 我认为[From.GetFirstName]很享受昨天我们[Root.GetManWoman]与[From.GetManWoman]之间的谈话，我彻底敞开了心怀，把所有我的秘密都告诉了[From.GetHerHim]，甚至把我认为一个卫兵特别的帅气这种事都告诉了他。所以当我今天早上看见那个姑娘和「我的」卫兵亲吻的时候，我的心都碎了……

original: I... I thought you were my friend!
translation: 我……我以为你是我的朋友！

original: I see no reason why but [From.GetFirstName] clearly does not like me. If I were a bit more paranoid than I am I might think [From.GetSheHe] believes me to be a rival.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]显然不喜欢我，我不知道这是为什么。如果我更加多疑一些的话我可能会认为[From.GetSheHe]把我当作仇敌。

original: So, [From.GetFirstName], are we rivals now then? Fine!
translation: 所以，[From.GetFirstName]，我们从此就是仇敌了？就这样吧！

original: I thought I finally had a chance winning a friendly duel during the swordstraining, my opponent clearly wasn't as comfortable with a sword as I was and I had read our teacher's treatise through and through several times. For all his unease, my opponent showed he knew what end of a sword you are supposed to hold and I lost once again.
translation: 在剑术测试中，我以为我终于有机会赢得一场友谊性的决斗，我的仇敌拿剑的姿势显然不像我一样舒适，而且我已经把我们老师写的论文从头到尾读了好几遍了。尽管有这些不利因素，我的仇敌仍然知道应该握住剑的哪一段，我又一次输了。

original: Good game
translation: 精彩的比赛

original: How dare you! You, sir, have gained a new rival this day!
translation: 你竟敢打败我！先生，从今天起你就成为我的新仇敌了！

original: The defeated [Root.GetTitledFirstName] marks [This.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.GetHerHis] new rival
translation: 被击败的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]把[This.GetTitledFirstName]当作[Root.GetHerHis]新的仇敌

original: I'll defeat you tomorrow!
translation: 明天我就会击败你的！

original: [From.GetFirstName] certainly handled a sword expertly, but when we started fencing I realized [From.GetSheHe] probably had only read our teacher's treatise without ever practicing any of the moves. I easily disarmed [From.GetFirstName] and when I extended my hand to thank [From.GetHerHim] for the practice [From.GetSheHe] slapped it aside and named me [From.GetHerHis] rival.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]拿剑的姿势确实是专家级的，但是当我们开始击剑的时候，我意识到[From.GetSheHe]可能只读过我们老师的论文而一点动作练习都没做过。我轻松的将[From.GetFirstName]缴械，然后当我伸出手去感谢[From.GetHerHim]与我练习的时候，[From.GetSheHe]把我的手打到一旁并且称我为[From.GetHerHis]仇敌。

original: Do you really want me as your rival?
translation: 你真的想让成为你的仇敌么？

original: I am sick and tired of being called all sorts of names, dodging kicks and punches and never be left alone. My tormentor is able to sniff me out and find me wherever I try to hide, and I don't know if I can take it any longer!
translation: 我被人起了一堆外号，成天的躲避拳打脚踢，这些让我感到恶心和疲惫。不管我躲到哪里，欺负我的人都能把我找出来，我不知道我还能够继续忍耐多久！

original: Fight back!
translation: 回击！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] punches [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拳打[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Bribe my tormentor with a sweetmeat
translation: 用一块糖果贿赂欺负我的人

original: Will [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s sweetmeat tooth make [This.GetHerHim] leave [Root.GetTitledFirstName] alone?
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]拿到的糖果能否让[This.GetHerHim]不再找[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的麻烦？

original: Try to ignore the tormentor
translation: 尝试不去理会

original: It was a delight tormenting [From.GetFirstName], calling [From.GetHerHim] [From.GetFirstName] the cowardly chicken and other epithets and, if that didn't work, punches, kicks or destroying [From.GetHerHis] things. [From.GetFirstName] was easy prey, until [From.GetSheHe] punched back!
translation: 折磨 [From.GetFirstName]真是一件令人愉悦的事情，可以叫[From.GetHerHim]「小鶸 [From.GetFirstName]」或者其他的外号，如果这不奏效的话，就拳打脚踢，或者毁坏[From.GetHerHis]东西。[From.GetFirstName]一直是个很好的出气筒，直到[From.GetSheHe]突然挥拳还击！

original: Ow, my nose! You'll pay for this!
translation: 哦，我的鼻子！你要为此付出代价！

original: I was looking forward to another day of tormenting [From.GetFirstName] with name-calling and kicks when [From.GetSheHe] came up to me and gave me a sweetmeat.
translation: 我正期待着在新的一天里可以继续欺负[From.GetFirstName]，叫他的外号，尽情的踢他，这时[From.GetSheHe]向我走来递给我一块糖果。

original: Throw the sweetmeat away and kick [From.GetHerHis] butt!
translation: 把糖果扔掉，踢[From.GetHerHis]屁股！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will always be [This.GetTitledFirstName] rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]永远是[This.GetTitledFirstName]的仇敌

original: Eh... thank you
translation: 呃……谢谢你

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] stops harassing [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]停止骚扰[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I watched nervously as [From.GetFirstName] looked at the offered sweetmeat in my outstretched hand and then gently took it, sniffing it before stuffing [From.GetHerHis] face with it. [From.GetFirstName] beamed at me and told me I wasn't as bad as [From.GetSheHe] thought I was.
translation: 我紧张地看着[From.GetFirstName]盯着我手中的甜食，轻轻地接过它，先闻了闻，然后塞满了[From.GetHerHis]嘴。[From.GetFirstName]微笑着告诉我，我并不像[From.GetSheHe]想象中那么差劲。

original: I'm... flattered?
translation: 我……刚刚被人恭维了？

original: Now can we be friends?
translation: 现在我们可以是朋友了么？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] lays their differences behind them, becoming fast friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]把他们之间的不同抛在脑后，成为可靠的朋友

original: It felt wrong to keep harassing [From.GetFirstName] after [From.GetSheHe] gave me that sweetmeat, so I decided I would stop calling [From.GetHerHim] things like '[From.GetFirstName] the cowardly chicken' and apologise for kicking [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 在[From.GetSheHe]送给我那块糖果之后，我感到一直以来我对[From.GetFirstName]的欺凌是错误的，所以我决定不再叫[From.GetHerHim]的外号，像「小鶸[From.GetFirstName]」之类，并为以前踢[From.GetHerHim]的行为致歉。

original: Do you think we can be friends?
translation: 你认为我们可以成为朋友么？

original: Thank you for the sweetmeat!
translation: 谢谢你的糖果！

original: There's something about that [Root.GetLadLass] that I cannot stand, and I take the opportunity to show that whenever I can. I should feel bad for making [Root.GetHerHim] miserable, but my loathing for [Root.GetHerHim] is too great.
translation: 我无法忍受那个[Root.GetLadLass]了，我随时随地都在表示这一点。我应该为使[Root.GetHerHim]痛苦而感到内疚，但我对[Root.GetHerHim]的厌恶实在是太深了。

original: [Root.GetSheHeCap] truly is my rival
translation: [Root.GetSheHeCap]真的是我的仇敌

original: The rivalry between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] escalates
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]之间的敌对升级了

original: Oh [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what am I doing?!
translation: 哦[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，我在做什么？！

original: [Root.GetSheHeCap] is a coward, [Root.GetSheHe] will never defend [Root.GetHerselfHimself]!
translation: [Root.GetSheHeCap]是一个懦夫，[Root.GetSheHe]从来不会保护[Root.GetHerselfHimself]！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] harasses [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]骚扰[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: As long as I can remember, [From.GetFirstName] has pestered me in any way [From.GetSheHe] could think of. I'm getting tired of being used for 'innocent' pranks like getting the contents of a chamber pot poured over me, tripped in the stairs or have my food stolen.
translation: 在我的记忆中[From.GetFirstName]一直在用[From.GetSheHe]所能想到的任何方式折磨我。把便壶中的东西倒在我的身上，在楼梯上绊倒我，或者偷走我的食物，我已经对这些「没有恶意的」恶作剧感到厌烦了。

original: You've gotten a rival in me, [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 你已经成为了我的仇敌，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: [From.GetFirstName] has been bothering me for a long time, at first I thought it was [From.GetHerHis] way of making friends. The pranks started to escalate, from being rather harmless to me finding my clothes sprinkled over the yard in the morning or getting the contents of a chamber pot poured over me. I don't think [From.GetFirstName] likes me, at all...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]已经骚扰了我很长时间，起初我认为这是[From.GetHerHis]成为朋友的方式。这些恶作剧逐渐升级，从基本无害的行为变成让我一早起来发现我的衣服散落在院子里，或者把便壶中的东西倒在我的身上。我不认为[From.GetFirstName]喜欢我，一点都不……

original: It's time to get revenge!
translation: 是报仇雪恨的时候了！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gets [Root.GetHerHis] revenge on [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]试图在报复[This.GetTitledFirstName]来达成[Root.GetHerHis]复仇计划

original: I'm sure I can get [From.GetFirstName] to like me
translation: 我相信我能让[From.GetFirstName]喜欢上我

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to make friends with [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]尝试与[This.GetTitledFirstName]做朋友

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will get bored someday, hopefully...
translation: 希望有一天[From.GetSheHeCap]会对做这种事情感到厌烦……

original: I waited until exactly the right moment, when [From.GetFirstName] was directly underneath me, to pour the day-old contents of the chamber pot over [From.GetHerHim]. The horrified look on [From.GetFirstName] face when the contents hit [From.GetHerHim] had me on the floor laughing out loud. [From.GetFirstName] swore at me, calling me all kinds of ugly words and that [From.GetSheHe] would never forget this...
