translation: 机会终于被我逮到了，当[From.GetFirstName]从我的正下方走过的时候，我将早已备好的满满一便壶的黄白之物倒在[From.GetHerHim]的身上。这些东西浇在[From.GetHerHim]身上的时候，[From.GetFirstName]脸上惊悸的表情让我笑得直不起腰。[From.GetFirstName]用所有能想到的脏话咒骂我，这件事将让[From.GetSheHe]永生难忘……

original: So I believe [From.GetHerHim] is my rival now?
translation: 所以我相信[From.GetHerHim]现在是我的仇敌了？

original: No matter what I expose [From.GetFirstName] for, [From.GetSheHe] still tries to make me [From.GetHerHis] friend. I have started to feel a reluctant respect for [From.GetFirstName] and even though I still get great ideas for pranks, such as freeze in [From.GetFirstName]'s clothes in a block of ice or empty a chamber pot over [From.GetHerHis] head, it feels wrong doing it.
translation: 不管我让[From.GetFirstName]遭受什么事情，[From.GetSheHe]仍然想要让我成为[From.GetHerHis]朋友。我不情愿的开始感到对[From.GetFirstName]的尊敬，虽然我仍然能够想出恶作剧的好主意，像把[From.GetFirstName]的衣服冻在冰块里，或者把便壶里的东西倒在[From.GetHerHis]脑袋上，但我感到做这些事情是不对的。

original: I hope [From.GetFirstName] forgives me, maybe we can be friends?
translation: 我希望[From.GetFirstName]可以原谅我，或许我们可以成为朋友？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] regrets the harassment of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对骚扰[This.GetTitledFirstName]的行为表示懊悔

original: Naah, I have too much fun. I won't stop now!
translation: 不，我觉得这很有趣。我不会停止这种行为的！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s harassment of [This.GetTitledFirstName] leads to rivalry
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.GetTitledFirstName]的骚扰导致敌对

original: [From.GetFirstName] has almost stopped pestering me, there's the occasional prank but I can put up with it as long as they are harmless.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]几乎停止骚扰我了，偶尔会有一些恶作剧，但是只要它们没有什么害处我就可以忍受。

original: I think... I think you could say we are friends now
translation: 我想……我想现在你可以说我们是朋友了

original: ...and then [From.GetSheHe] ruined everything!
translation: ……接着[From.GetSheHe]毁掉了一切！

original: I pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] every day and listen carefully to the priest whenever he preaches about God's will. When I saw a [Root.GetLadLass] my age clearly disrespecting the word's of God and boisterously proclaimed [Root.GetHerHis] disbeliefs and refusal to accept that there is a God I felt shocked. Something must be done to save this lost soul!
translation: 我每天都向[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]祈祷，并且在神父宣传主的意志的时候认真聆听。当我看见一个与我同龄的[Root.GetLadLass]很明显地不尊敬主的话语，并且大声的宣称[Root.GetHerHis]对于主的存在的质疑，我感到十分震惊。必须做点什么来拯救这个迷失的灵魂！

original: I will pray for [Root.GetHerHis] soul!
translation: 我会为[Root.GetHerHis]灵魂祈祷！

original: I will convince [Root.GetHerHim] there's a God!
translation: 我会向[Root.GetHerHim]证明主确实存在！

original: Pious little [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to help [This.GetTitledFirstName] find [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and save [This.GetHerHis] soul
translation: 年轻虔诚的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]试图帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]皈依[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，并且拯救[This.GetHerHis]灵魂

original: I don't believe in God, religion is stupid and the priests boring! [From.GetFirstName] couldn't understand how someone could not believe in [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and tried to convince me there is a God and He loves me. I decided to listen to [From.GetFirstName], I was curious as to why [From.GetSheHe] is so convinced there's a God.
translation: 我不信神，宗教是一件蠢事而且神父十分无趣！[From.GetFirstName]无法理解怎么有人不信[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，并试图向我证明神确实存在并且神爱着我。我决定听听[From.GetFirstName]说的话，我对于[From.GetSheHe]如此虔诚的相信有神存在的原因感到十分好奇。

original: Leave me alone! I don't like you nor your [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 离我远点！我不喜欢你，也不喜欢你的[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] cannot be saved by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不能被[This.GetTitledFirstName]所拯救

original: If I tell you I believe in [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], will you leave?
translation: 如果我告诉你我信了[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，你会不会离开？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] deceives [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]欺骗[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Bless you! You have made me believe again
translation: 愿主保佑你！你让我找回了信仰

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s immortal soul is saved by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的灵魂为[This.GetTitledFirstName]所拯救

original: No matter what I said, no matter what evidence I showed [From.GetFirstName] that there is a God and He loves all His children, [From.GetSheHe] refused to be convinced and held on to [From.GetHerHis] belief that there is no God. [From.GetSheHeCap] said to me: 'If there is a God and He loves everyone, why is there war in the world? Why do people starve? Why do people hurt each other?'
translation: 不管我说什么，不管我给[From.GetFirstName]展示什么证据证明主确实存在并且主爱着他所有的孩子，[From.GetSheHe]都拒绝相信并且坚持[From.GetHerHis]观点认为主并不存在。[From.GetSheHeCap]对我说：「如果有神存在并且他爱着每一个人，为什么世界上会有战争存在？为什么会有人挨饿？为什么人类要互相伤害？」

original: I had no answer, only my faith
translation: 我无言以对，只有我的信仰

original: It took longer than I thought it would to convince [From.GetFirstName] that our God is a loving God. I am still unsure if [From.GetFirstName] really meant it when [From.GetSheHe] said that [From.GetSheHe] believed in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] or if [From.GetFirstName] only said that to make me feel better...
translation: 使[From.GetFirstName]相信我们的主是慈爱的主所花费的时间比我想象的要长。当[From.GetFirstName]说[From.GetSheHe]开始信奉[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的时候，我仍然不确定这是否[From.GetSheHe]真实的想法，或者[From.GetFirstName]只是这样说来安慰我……

original: Pray some more for [From.GetFirstName]'s soul...
translation: 为[From.GetFirstName]的灵魂做更多的祈祷……

original: [From.GetFirstName] were unwilling at first but as I talked about God and His love for mankind [From.GetSheHe] started to be interested and soon we were discussing [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. It took several hours of discussing, reading the Bible and answering all [From.GetFirstName]'s questions and then I saw how [From.GetFirstName] started believing...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]起初并不太情愿，但当我开始谈及神及祂对人类的爱时，[From.GetSheHe]开始感兴趣，很快我们就在一起讨论[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]了。这场讨论持续了数个小时，通过阅读圣经并且回答[From.GetFirstName]的所有问题，我目睹了[From.GetFirstName]是如何开始信主的……

original: How great for you!
translation: 太好了！

original: I toiled long and hard to try to embroider the most beautiful embroidery but I was beaten, and beaten hard by a nobody... My stitches were small, but hers was smaller. My motif was beautiful, but hers were even more so. My embroidery was praised, but hers people admired and loved.
translation: 我长时间的辛苦劳作，想要织出最美丽的刺绣，但是我被击败了，而且是被一个无名小卒彻底的打败……我的针脚细密，但是她的更细；我的花纹漂亮，但是她的更加漂亮；我的刺绣被人称赞，但是她的刺绣被人羡慕和喜爱。

original: I swallow my pride and praise her embroidery
translation: 我收回了我的傲慢并且称赞她的刺绣

original: I will hate her from afar
translation: 从今以后我会一直记恨着她

original: The rivalry between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] knows no bounds
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]之间的敌对没有限度

original: No one is better than me!
translation: 没有人比我强！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] destroys [This.GetTitledFirstName] embroidery
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]毁掉[This.GetTitledFirstName]的刺绣

original: I ask her to teach me
translation: 我请他教导我

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] humbles [Root.GetHerselfHimself]  and asks [This.GetTitledFirstName] for help
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]放低[Root.GetHerselfHimself]的身段，并向[This.GetTitledFirstName]请求帮助

original: I was beaming from all the praise I got about my embroidery, 'Oh, the stitches are so tiny they are almost invisible!' 'Such a lovely motif!' but when I saw anger cloud [From.GetFirstName] my smile shrank and disappeared. [From.GetSheHeCap] had made a lovely embroidery but people obviously liked mine better and [From.GetFirstName] couldn't stand it.
translation: 我听着对我的刺绣的夸奖眉开眼笑，「哦，这针脚真够细的，都快看不见了！」，「多可爱的图案！」，但是当我看见[From.GetFirstName]脸上的怒火时我的笑容不见了。[From.GetSheHeCap]织了一幅美丽的刺绣，但是人们显然更喜欢我的作品，这让[From.GetFirstName]难以忍受。

original: I did not want this, I don't want a rival!
translation: 我不想要这个，我不想要一个宿敌！

original: My embroidery was lovely and I had worked so hard and gotten so much praise for it that I almost felt physically sick when [From.GetFirstName] grabbed it and started tearing it apart, almost screaming in anger and jealousy as [From.GetSheHe] destroyed my embroidery.
translation: 我的刺绣很漂亮，我在上面花费了大量心血，并且得到了许许多多的赞赏，因此当[From.GetFirstName]抓过我的刺绣开始撕扯它的时候，我差点晕了过去。[From.GetSheHe]满怀着愤怒与嫉妒地尖声叫喊着撕烂了我的刺绣。

original: I hate you so much! How could you? I HATE you!
translation: 我恨死你了！你怎么可以这样？我恨你！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will never forgive [This.GetTitledFirstName] for destroying [Root.GetHerHis] beautiful embroidery
translation: 因为毁掉[Root.GetHerHis]美丽的刺绣这件事，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]永远不会原谅[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: You are right, I can do better than this...
translation: 你是对的，我可以比这做的更好……

original: It was as if madness and jealousy had taken control over my body, the embroidery lay in pieces by my feet without me having any memory of grabbing it and ripping it apart. [From.GetFirstName] stared at me before [From.GetSheHe] burst into tears and was soothed by the other women whose accusatory eyes I fled. I heard [From.GetFirstName] announcing that [From.GetSheHe] would never forgive me for destroying [From.GetHerHis] embroidery.
translation: 好像疯狂和嫉妒控制住了我的身体，这幅刺绣被撕成一块块的躺在我的脚下，我甚至没有任何抢过它并且撕扯它的记忆。[From.GetFirstName]双眼圆瞪，突然[From.GetSheHe]大哭起来，其他的女人边安慰她，边用责备的眼光看着我。我听见[From.GetFirstName]声称[From.GetSheHe]永远不会原谅我毁坏[From.GetHerHis]刺绣的行为。

original: I have just gained a rival...
translation: 我刚刚招来了一个仇敌……

original: [From.GetFirstName] really tried to humble [From.GetHerselfHimself], ooohed and aaahed over my embroidery and agreed with the other women that my stitches were the tiniest and the motif even more beautiful than [From.GetHersHis]. I wasn't surprised then when [From.GetFirstName] lingered and asked me if I could teach [From.GetHerHim] to embroider as well as I can.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]真的试图降低[From.GetHerselfHimself]的身段，迎合着其他女人对我的细密针脚和美丽图样的赞叹，甚至说我的手艺比[From.GetHersHis]都好。当[From.GetFirstName]踌躇的走过来问我是否可以教[From.GetHerHim]绣得像我一样好的时候，我并不感觉十分惊讶。

original: It would be my pleasure. Come, let us start immediately!
translation: 这是我的荣幸。来，让我们马上开始吧！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] bond over their embroidery
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]因为刺绣结合在一起

original: You are unteachable - just look at that mess!
translation: 你真是朽木不可教也——看那一团糟！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] scornful comment angers [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]轻蔑的评论触怒[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [From.GetFirstName] was so sweet and told me my embroidery was beautiful, no matter what other people thought about it. We talked while [From.GetFirstName] showed me how [From.GetSheHe] managed to make [From.GetHerHis] stitches so, so small and even gave me a motif [From.GetSheHe] had designed [From.GetHerselfHimself]!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很亲切，并且告诉我我的刺绣十分漂亮，不要去管其他人怎么认为。我们一边交谈，[From.GetFirstName]一边向我展示[From.GetSheHe]是如何把[From.GetHerHis]针脚织的如此精致，[From.GetSheHe]甚至送给我一份[From.GetHerselfHimself]设计的花样！

original: I forgot my jealousy and won a friend!
translation: 我忘掉我的嫉妒心，赢得一个朋友！

original: Even though I humbled myself, agreed with the other women that [From.GetFirstName]'s embroidery was much more lovely than mine in every way, [From.GetFirstName] weren't as gracious as [From.GetSheHe] should've been when I asked [From.GetHerHim] to give me some advice about embroidery. [From.GetFirstName] was outright scornful and told me I had made a mess out of my embroidery!
translation: 尽管我放下身段，同意其他女人关于[From.GetFirstName]的刺绣在各个方面都要比我的漂亮的看法，但[From.GetFirstName]还是没有展现出[From.GetSheHe]应有的大度。当我向[From.GetHerHim]寻求关于刺绣的建议的时候，[From.GetFirstName]不客气的表示轻蔑，还说我的刺绣是一团糟！

original: What! That's not true, take that back!
translation: 什么！这不是真的，收回那句话！

original: I have lost my doll! She's nowhere to be found, could someone have taken her? I miss her so much, she's my bestest friend!
translation: 我把我的玩偶弄丢了！到处都找不到，是不是被人捡走了？我十分想念她，她是我最好的朋友！

original: I will find the one who took her and make them give her back!
translation: 我会找到拿走她的人并让他们还给我！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronts [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]质问[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I will never, ever find her...
translation: 我再也找不到她了……

original: I was playing with my new doll I've found forgotten in the kitchen when [From.GetFirstName] attacked me and tried to take the doll from me. [From.GetFirstName] screamed at me to give back her doll and grew more agitated as I kept holding on to the doll.
translation: 我正在同我的新玩偶玩耍，它是我在厨房里捡到的，这时[From.GetFirstName]袭击我并想把玩偶从我手里夺走。[From.GetFirstName]向我尖叫让我把她的玩偶还给她，当她看到我仍然抱着玩偶的时候，她变得更加激动。

original: Can I still play with her sometimes?
translation: 我能偶尔同她一起玩玩么？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gives the doll back to [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]把玩偶还给[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Fine, whatever. It's not even a pretty doll
translation: 无所谓，给你吧。这又不是什么漂亮的玩偶

original: This doll is mine now!
translation: 现在这个玩偶是我的了！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to give back the doll to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝把玩偶还给[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I saw my doll in [From.GetFirstName]'s arms and screamed at [From.GetHerHim] to give me my Dolly back! I was so upset, where had [From.GetFirstName] found my doll? And why hadn't [From.GetSheHe] given Dolly back to me yet?
translation: 我看见[From.GetFirstName]把我的玩偶夹在胳膊底下，我尖声叫喊着让[From.GetHerHim]把娃娃还给我！我感到十分沮丧，[From.GetFirstName]在哪里找到我的玩偶的？为什么[From.GetSheHe]还没有把它还给我？

original: I got my doll back! I decided we could both play with her as a thank-you
translation: 我把我的玩偶要回来了！我决定我们可以一起同她玩耍，作为对你的感谢

original: [From.GetFirstName] called Dolly ugly! But [From.GetSheHe] gave her back...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]说我的娃娃丑陋！但是[From.GetSheHe]把她还给了我……

original: [From.GetFirstName] refused to give me Dolly back!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]拒绝归还我的娃娃！

original: Crusading in [Root.Location.GetName], so far away from friends and family is wearying. It is good I have my fellow commanders I can rely on for some good talks and laughs. We are all here for the same thing:
translation: 在[Root.Location.GetName]进行十字军远征，远离朋友和家人的生活让人疲倦。很幸运我有一批可以信任的下属，我可以同这些指挥官一起愉快地交谈和欢笑。我们都是为了共同的目的来到这里：

original: Deus Vult! For the Glory of God!
translation: 神的旨意！为了上帝的荣耀！

original: agrees with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 赞同[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Deus Vult! For the prestige!
translation: 神的旨意！为了威望！

original: Deus Vult! For the lands and wealth!
translation: 神的旨意！为了土地和财富！

original: I'm here only because I have to
translation: 我来到这里只因为我不得不来

original: When you are fighting a Holy War against the infidels, you need the commanders and soldiers beside you to be good, strong men you can trust. [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I have been crusading for a long time together in [From.Location.GetName] and we were discussing the reasons behind why we where here, in this God-forsaken land, fighting the infidels.
translation: 当你同异教徒进行圣战的时候，你希望你身边的指挥官和士兵是一群值得信赖的强壮的好男人。[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直和我一起在[From.Location.GetName]进行十字军战争，我们正在讨论我们来到这片上帝保佑的土地同异教徒战斗的原因。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is wrong, not for the prestige
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]错了，不是为了赢得威望

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is wrong, not for the Glory of God
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]错了，不是为了上帝的荣耀

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] disagrees with [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不同意[This.GetTitledFirstName]的看法

original: I agree with [From.GetTitledFirstName]: For the prestige!
translation: 我同意[From.GetTitledFirstName]的看法：为了赢得威望

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] concurs with [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]达成一致

original: I agree with [From.GetTitledFirstName]: For the Glory of God!
translation: 我同意[From.GetTitledFirstName]的看法：为了上帝的荣耀！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] does not agree with me, [From.GetSheHe] sees no reason why we should be here, not for the prestige, nor for the lands or wealth we might acquire and definitely not for the Glory of God!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不同意我的看法，[From.GetSheHe]认为我们没有必须来到这个地方的理由，我们不是为了威望，不是为了可能获得的土地或财富，而且更不是为了上帝的荣耀！

original: We are here because God wills it!
translation: 我们来到这里因为上帝的意志！

original: And you call yourself Crusader!
translation: 你还敢自称十字军战士！

original: All had different reasons why they were here, crusading against the infidels in [Root.Location.GetName], some for the Glory of God, some for the lands and wealth they hoped to acquire, others for the prestige. Both [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are here, risking our lives together, for the same reason:
translation: 每一个在[Root.Location.GetName]同异教徒们进行十字军战争的人，都有各自来到这里的理由，有些人是为了上帝的荣耀，有些人是为了获取土地和财富，还有人是为了赢得威望。[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我来到这里，一同冒着生命的危险，都是为了同样的原因：

original: Friendship and for the Glory of God!
translation: 为了友谊和上帝的荣耀！

original: Friendship and the prestige this crusade brings us!
translation: 这场十字军战争带给我们友谊和威望！

original: First step first, make friends with a councilor...
translation: 第一步，同一位内阁成员成为朋友……

original: I will never be better than [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] [Root.Liege.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我不会比[Root.Liege.GetChancellorName][Root.Liege.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]做的更好

original: I will never be better than [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName] [Root.Liege.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我不会比[Root.Liege.GetMarshalName][Root.Liege.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]做的更好

original: I will never be better than [Root.Liege.GetTreasurerName] [Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我不会比[Root.Liege.GetTreasurerName][Root.Liege.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]做的更好

original: I will never be better than [Root.Liege.GetSpymasterName] [Root.Liege.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我不会比[Root.Liege.GetSpymasterName][Root.Liege.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]做的更好

original: I will never be better than [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.Liege.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我不会比[Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.Liege.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]做的更好

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked nicely, and I like [From.GetHerHim]
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我细心地询问，我喜欢上了[From.GetHerHim]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s helpfulness makes [This.GetTitledFirstName] respect [Root.GetHerHim] even more
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的乐于助人让[This.GetTitledFirstName]更加尊敬[Root.GetHerHim]

original: I'll help [From.GetTitledFirstName] but I'll keep an eye on [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我会帮助[From.GetTitledFirstName]但是我会密切注意[From.GetHerHim]！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refusal to help [This.GetTitledFirstName] has given [Root.GetHerHim] a new rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]，这给[Root.GetHerHim]带来一位新的仇敌

original: At first I had only wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] to teach me more about [From.GetHerHis] work as a councilor because I aspired to gain that position, but as we talked and got to know each other I realized we had become friends.
translation: 起初我只想让[From.GetTitledFirstName]教给我更多关于[From.GetHerHis]内阁成员工作的经验，这是我想要得到的职位，但是当我们谈论起来并且彼此深入了解之后，我发现我们已经成了朋友。

original: Does this mean I cannot steal your job now?
translation: 难道这意味着我不能偷走你的职位了么？

original: Even though my motives to get [From.GetTitledFirstName] to teach me more about [From.GetHerHis] work as a councilor was more than arbitrary, I hadn't really expected the reaction I got from [From.GetTitledFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] refused to teach me. My aspirations was widely known and [From.GetTitledFirstName] feared I would steal [From.GetHerHis] job!
translation: 我想让[From.GetTitledFirstName]教给我更多关于[From.GetHerHis]内阁成员工作的经验，虽然我的这一目的十分任性，在[From.GetSheHe]拒绝教我的时候，我也没有真的想从[From.GetTitledFirstName]得到什么反应。我的抱负众所周知，所以[From.GetTitledFirstName]怕我会偷走[From.GetHerHis]职位！

original: Well, yes...
translation: 好吧，我确实会这样做……

original: I have the fortune of being pregnant at the same time as one of the courtiers at court. We talk about our pregnancies, discuss our problems like morning sickness and swollen feet and talk about what we would name our babies.
translation: 我有幸与宫廷里的其中一位廷臣同时怀孕。我们一起谈论怀孕，讨论我们面对的一些诸如晨吐、脚肿的问题，并且谈及我们将为我们的孩子起什么样的名字。

original: Us mothers should stick together
translation: 我们这些做母亲的应该待在一起

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] feels [This.GetTitledFirstName] is a trustworthy friend
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]觉得[This.GetTitledFirstName]是一位值得信赖的朋友

original: My spouse is all comfort I need
translation: 我只需要丈夫给我的安慰

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I are both pregnant and I have heard more about [From.GetHerHis] morning sickness, swollen feet and absent husband than I really wanted to know. Still, it is very comforting having someone else going through the same thing as I do, to have someone you can talk about embarrassing problems and know they have the same or even more embarrassing problems.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我都怀孕了，我还听说了比我所想要知道更多的关于[From.GetHerHis]晨吐、脚肿和丈夫不在身边的事情。然而，能够有人跟我一同经历同样的事情，能够跟别人倾诉自己所遇到的尴尬问题，并且能够得知她们都遇到了跟我一样的、甚至是更尴尬的问题，这依然让我感到非常安慰。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a true friend
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是一位真正的朋友

original: This will only last until the baby is born
translation: 这一切将只会持续到孩子出生为止

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] inadvertently upsets [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s feelings
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]无意中让[This.GetTitledFirstName]感到沮丧

original: The babies are born and I had looked forward to being a mother together with [From.GetTitledFirstName], but [From.GetSheHe] told me that now when the baby is born [From.GetSheHe] won't have time to even talk to me. I don't understand why, it can't be that hard to do two things at the same time?
translation: 我们的孩子已经出生了，我曾期望能够与[From.GetTitledFirstName]一同为人母，但[From.GetSheHe]却告诉我，现在孩子已经出生了，[From.GetSheHe]将连跟我说话的时间都不会再有了。我无法理解这究竟是为什么，同时兼顾这两件事情并没有那么难啊？

original: I... I really thought we were friends!
translation: 我……我真的以为我们是朋友！

original: Very Disappointed
translation: 非常失望

original: Very Grateful
translation: 非常感激

original: Battle after battle, siege after siege... my friend must be pretty tired of the war, maybe I could help my friend in any way?
translation: 一场接一场战役，一场接一场围攻……我的朋友一定对这场战争感到筋疲力尽，也许我能够以一些方式帮助我的朋友？

original: My troops could use the exercise!
translation: 正好我的部队可以做些锻炼！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is grateful for any help [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is willing to give
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]给予的任何帮助都会报以感激之心

original: Some gold should help my friend win this war!
translation: 一些金钱应该能够帮助我的朋友赢得这场战争！

original: My friend has everything under control, my help is unnecessary
translation: 一切尽在我的朋友掌握之中，他并不需要我的帮助

original:
My dear friend, I fear the war might drag you away from me longer than necessary and thus I felt there must be something I could do! So please accept my help, and let's win this war - together!

Your Loyal Friend,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我亲爱的朋友，我担心这场战争可能会浪费你更多不必要的时间，因此我意识到一定有些事情是我可以做的！所以请接受我的帮助，让我们一齐赢得这场战争吧！

你忠实的朋友，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: With your help, I can defeat any foe!
translation: 有了你的帮助，我可以击败一切敌人！

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I am a bit concerned about this war you currently struggle with and therefore I decided I would send you a small gift - nothing much, just so you can hire some more soldiers.

Sincerely, your friend
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我对你现在进行的这场艰苦的战争表示关切，因此我决定送给你一小笔金钱，刚好够让你雇佣更多地士兵。

诚挚地，你的朋友 
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: This will suffice, thank you!
translation: 这笔钱就足够了，谢谢你！

original: Despite being able to help me with my latest war, my friend [From.GetTitledFirstName] chose to ignore my plight. The war was a struggle and any help, any help at all, could have helped me greatly.
translation: 在上一场战争中，我的朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]选择对我的困境不予理睬，尽管他有能力帮助我。这场战争十分艰苦，任何帮助，一点点的帮助都可以为我带来巨大的优势。

original: Don't count on my help then, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 那[From.GetTitledFirstName]以后就不要指望我的帮助！

original: The war is over, no need to dwell on the past
translation: 战争已经结束了，没必要再计较过往

original: This war isn't going quite as I thought it would. I lose more men per battle than I'd planned and the sieges - the sieges are going on forever! More manpower and more siege weapons are what I need, perhaps a friend could assist me with this?
translation: 这场战争并不像我所想象中的那样顺利。我在每场战役中的兵员损失都预期要多，至于围攻——都看不到成功的苗头！我需要更多的兵力和更多的攻城器械，也许我的一位朋友能够解决我的燃眉之急？

original: Ask my friend to join the war!
translation: 请求我的朋友加入这场战争！

original: is asked to join [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s war
translation: 被请求加入[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的战争

original: Ask a friend for some monetary help
translation: 向我的一位朋友请求资金帮助

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks [This.GetTitledFirstName] for some money
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]请求[This.GetTitledFirstName]给予资金帮助

original: I need no help, this war will soon be won!
translation: 我不需要帮助，我将很快赢得这场战争！

original:
My dear friend, it pains me to have to ask you to join my war. I must confess that the war does not progress as well as I had hoped it would, and I would really appreciate if you would lend me your help, your troops and your siege weapons.

With hopeful regards,
Your friend,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我亲爱的朋友，我不得不请求您加入我的战争，对此我感到十分痛苦。我必须承认这场战争并不如我所期望的那样顺利，如果您能借予我您的帮助、您的部队和您的攻城器械，我将十分感激！

满怀希望之情，
你的朋友，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to the rescue!
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]前来救援！

original: gladly accepts all help [This.GetSheHe] can get
translation: 愉快地接受所有[This.GetSheHe]能得到的的帮助

original: I can send [From.GetHerHim] some money instead
translation: 我可以送给[From.GetHerHim]一些金钱作为代替

original: I cannot help [From.GetHerHim] at this time
translation: 此刻我无法帮助[From.GetHerHim]

original: is disappointed [Root.GetTitledFirstName] couldn't help [This.GetHerHim]
translation: 因为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]无法帮助[This.GetHerHim]而感到失望

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I never thought I would feel the shame of asking a friend for some monetary help but this war is threatening to run my coffers dry. I implore you, as a friend to a friend, for a small monetary gift so that I may win this war!

With my deepest thanks in beforehand
Your friend,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我从未想过有一天我会向朋友请求资金帮助而感到羞耻，但这场战争就快要榨干我的国库。我以朋友的身份恳求您提供我一笔资金支持，这样我就能赢得这场战争！

预先致以我最深的感谢，
你的朋友，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I hope this small sum will help [From.GetHerHim] win the war!
translation: 我希望这一小笔钱能够帮助[From.GetHerHim]赢得这场战争！

original: If the war is going so badly, I better join [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 如果这场战争进行得并不顺利，我最好加入[From.GetHerHim]的战争！

original: My hands are tied, there's nothing I can do for [From.GetHerHim]
translation: 我束手束脚，无法为[From.GetHerHim]做任何事情

original: My letter to [From.GetTitledFirstName] could have gotten lost in any number of ways and, truthfully, sometimes I wished it would. The shame of having to ask a friend for help gnawed at me until I got [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response...
translation: 我写给[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信件可能已经由于各种原因而被遗失，说实话，有时我的确希望如此。不得不请求朋友给予援助的羞耻感一直在折磨着我，直到有一天我得到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的回复……

original: ...[From.GetSheHe] joined my war!
translation: ……[From.GetSheHe]加入了我的战争！

original: ...sent me money for troops!
translation: ……为我的部队提供资金！

original:
Dear [From.GetTitledFirstName], my duties to my family and my vassals disallows me to help you at this moment. I hope the war will turn to your favor and I wish for you to win the war quickly.

With hopes of understanding,
Your friend,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[From.GetTitledFirstName]，为了对我的家庭和封臣们负责，此刻我不能帮助你。我希望胜利的天平将会向你一边倾斜并且祝愿你能很快赢得这场战争。

希望你能理解，
你的朋友，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I'll manage, somehow...
translation: 我会自己想办法的，虽然我也不知道能以何种方式……

original: My friend's friend is also my friend - a motto I try to live by and sometimes that is an easy truth. A friend of a friend was introduced and I immediately felt a kind of connection with this stranger...
translation: 我试图以「我的朋友的朋友就是我的朋友」作为我的人生信条，有时候这并不困难。一位朋友的朋友被引荐给我，我立刻就感觉到我与这位陌生人间存在某种联系……

original: ...so I hope we'll be friends!
translation: ……我希望我们能够成为朋友！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] hopes [Root.GetSheHe] and [friends_friend.GetTitledFirstName] will be friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]希望[Root.GetSheHe]和[friends_friend.GetTitledFirstName]会成为朋友

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s friend [my_friend.GetTitledFirstName] is glad [my_friend.GetHerHis] friends are friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的朋友[my_friend.GetTitledFirstName]乐见[my_friend.GetHerHis]朋友相互之间成为朋友

original: ...but just because we share a friend doesn't mean we can be friends
translation: ……但仅仅因为我们拥有共同的朋友并不意味着我们就能够成为朋友

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s unwillingness to make friends with [This.GetTitledFirstName] upsets [This.GetHerHim]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不愿意与[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为朋友，这令[This.GetHerHim]感到失望

original: When I introduced my friend to [From.GetTitledFirstName] I had high hopes. I hoped they would become fast friends so we could spend time together, the three of us.
translation: 当初我引荐我的朋友给[From.GetTitledFirstName]时我曾抱以极大的希望。我希望他们很快就能成为朋友，这样我们三个人就能够一起玩耍。

original: Too bad [From.GetTitledFirstName] didn't like my friend
translation: 太糟糕了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]并不喜欢我的朋友

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s friend [This.GetTitledFirstName] decided to ignore [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的朋友[This.GetTitledFirstName]下定决心不理会[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and my friend had a great time together!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我的朋友相处十分愉快！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was introduced by a mutual friend and we talked for quite a while. We had our differences and a few arguments, then we found common, safe ground and I began enjoying myself. [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems like a decent person.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]由一位共同的朋友介绍和我认识，我们谈论了很长时间。我们有一些分歧和争论，但是我们达成共识之后，我就开始享受谈话。[From.GetTitledFirstName]看上去是一个相当不错的人呢。

original: I wouldn't mind talking to [From.GetTitledFirstName] some more
translation: 我并不介意有更多机会与[From.GetTitledFirstName]谈话

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] went from strangers to friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]从陌生人变成朋友

original: I don't like [From.GetHerHis] opinions, nor do I like [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我不喜欢[From.GetHerHis]观点，我也不喜欢[From.GetHerHim]！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] went from strangers to rivals
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]从陌生人变成仇敌

original: A nice [From.GetManWoman], but I wouldn't want [From.GetHerHim] as a friend
translation: 虽然这个[From.GetManWoman]是好人，但我并不想与[From.GetHerHim]成为朋友

original: No friendship was born between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] this day
translation: 今天，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]间并没有产生友谊

original: After I talked to [From.GetTitledFirstName] and discovered we had next to nothing in common and that [From.GetSheHe] was a horrible [From.GetManWoman], I wanted nothing to do with [From.GetTitledFirstName] ever again! Our mutual friend wasn't happy, but understood that I wouldn't ever be friends with [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 在我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]交谈后，我发现我们之间几乎毫无共通之处，而且[From.GetSheHe]是一个十分令人讨厌的[From.GetManWoman]，我再也不想与[From.GetTitledFirstName]一起做任何事！虽然我们的共同好友并不高兴，但能够理解我永远也不可能与[From.GetTitledFirstName]成为朋友。

original: Don't introduce me to another of your 'friends' ever again!
translation: 再也不要引荐你的「好朋友」给我了！

original: We had a few disagreements and a few arguments but once we arrived on common, safe ground I really enjoyed talking to [From.GetTitledFirstName]. I should remember to thank my friend for introducing me to [From.GetTitledFirstName], it has been a long time since I've found such an interesting [From.GetManWoman]!
translation: 虽然我们间有些异议、有些争论，但一旦我们达成共识以后，我真的很享受与[From.GetTitledFirstName]间的谈话。我一定不能忘记感谢我的朋友把我引荐给[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我已经很久没有遇到一个这么有趣的[From.GetManWoman]！

original: Friends forever, or what do you say, [From.GetTitledFirstName]?
translation: 朋友一生一齐走，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，你怎么说呢？

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] didn't think we could become friends
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不认为我们可以成为朋友

original: Rejected my friendship
translation: 拒绝我的友谊

original: I don't know when I started disliking [From.GetTitledFirstName], but it must have been when [From.GetSheHe] disagreed with me about how the peasants should be treated. The more we talked, the less I liked [From.GetTitledFirstName] and enough was enough! We would never be friends, only rivals.
translation: 我都不清楚什么时候开始讨厌[From.GetTitledFirstName]，但肯定是从[From.GetSheHe]不同意我对待农民的方式时开始的。我们间交谈越多，我就越不喜欢[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我已经受够了！我们永远都不能成为朋友，只能成为仇敌！

original: I don't like you, I don't like you at all [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我不喜欢你，我一点都不喜欢你，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Accepted My Religion
translation: 接受我的信仰

original: Happy for a converted friend
translation: 为朋友的皈依而高兴

original: Wrong Religion
translation: 错误的宗教

original: It's hard being a good [Root.Religion.GetName] these days, but my friend truly shocked me when I realized we did not share the same religion. My dear friend is a heretic!
translation: 这些日子里，想要做一个好的[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒并不容易，但当我意识到我和朋友的信仰并不相同时，我还是被震惊了。我亲爱的朋友竟然信奉异端！

original: I shall try to convert my friend to the one true faith!
translation: 我应该试图说服我的朋友皈依正统！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to convert [This.GetTitledFirstName] to a God-fearing [Root.Religion.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]试图说服[This.GetTitledFirstName]成为一名虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒

original: Who cares about religion anyway? I don't!
translation: 无论如何，谁又真正在意宗教信仰？至少我不在意！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] accepts that [This.GetTitledFirstName] is a [This.Religion.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]选择接受[This.GetTitledFirstName]是一个[This.Religion.GetName]信徒的事实

original: To be a good friend, I should probably learn more about this religion
translation: 作为好朋友，我应该要更了解这个宗教

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s interest in [This.Religion.GetName] gladdens [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.Religion.GetName]感兴趣而高兴

original: I can't be friends with a heretic!
translation: 我无法与异端成为朋友！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer friends with [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]不再是朋友

original: My friend's religion sounds better than [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 我朋友的宗教听起来比[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的要好！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a devout [From.Religion.GetName], so when I told [From.GetHerHim] that I believed in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] rather than [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] I knew what [From.GetSheHe] was going to say. After a long, heated discussion about religion, considered disadvantages and advantages of our respective religions I decided to...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是一位虔诚的[From.Religion.GetName]信徒，所以当我告诉[From.GetHerHim]：我不信奉[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]而是信仰[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]时，我就知道[From.GetSheHe]准备要说什么了。在一场漫长而激烈的宗教辩论后，考虑到我们各自宗教的优点、缺点，我决定……

original: ...keep my religion but lose my friend
translation: ……就算要与朋友绝交，我也要继续我的信仰

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] cannot be friends with someone who does not respect [Root.GetHerHis] religion
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不能与不尊重[Root.GetHerHis]信仰者成为朋友

original: ...keep my friend and convert to the [From.Religion.GetName] religion
translation: ……为了与朋友的友谊，皈依[From.Religion.GetName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] converts to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s religion
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]皈依[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信仰

original: ...keep both my religion and my friend
translation: ……既要继续我的信仰，也要做朋友

original: I feared what [From.GetTitledFirstName] would say when I told [From.GetHerHim] that I did not believe in [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], that I am a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] and I would not give up my religion for anyone. [From.GetTitledFirstName] was more understanding than I would've thought [From.GetHerHim] to be, and after asking some questions [From.GetSheHe] seemed to accept me and my religion.
translation: 我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我并不信奉[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]、而是一个虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒、并且我将不会为任何人放弃我的信仰。当时，我曾担心[From.GetHerHim]会为此说些什么。但[From.GetTitledFirstName]比我想象中的[From.GetHerHim]更加通情达理，在询问一些问题后，[From.GetSheHe]似乎接受了我和我的信仰。

original: A friend like you is hard to find, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 良朋如[From.GetTitledFirstName]者诚难求！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was very inquisitive and asked a lot of questions about my [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I was happy to talk about my religion with a nonjudgmental [From.GetManWoman], and answered all [From.GetHerHis] questions as good as I could.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是一个有旺盛好奇心的人，他询问了很多关于[Root.Religion.GetName]和[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的问题。我很高兴能够与一位不是带着批判态度的[From.GetManWoman]谈论我的宗教和我的神祇，我将竭尽所能地回答[From.GetHerHis]所有问题。

original: Thank you for not judging my religion, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 感谢你没有对我的信仰指指点点，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: ...[From.GetTitledFirstName] even decided to convert to [Root.Religion.GetName]!
translation: ……[From.GetTitledFirstName]甚至决定要皈依[Root.Religion.GetName]！

original: It went exactly as I had feared - [From.GetTitledFirstName] couldn't accept me being a [Root.Religion.GetName] and condemned me and my religion. I tried to reason with [From.GetTitledFirstName] and told [From.GetHerHim] about all the similarities with [From.GetHerHis] religion and [From.Religion.GetName] but I was talking to deaf ears.
translation: 完全正如我之前所担心的那样——[From.GetTitledFirstName]无法接受我是一名[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒的事实，并决定谴责我和我的信仰。我试图和[From.GetTitledFirstName]动之以理，并向[From.GetHerHim]解释[From.GetHerHis]信仰和[From.Religion.GetName]有多么的相似，可我就像在对牛弹琴。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided [From.GetSheHe] couldn't be friends with a heretic
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为[From.GetSheHe]无法与异端交朋友

original: I tried talking to [From.GetTitledFirstName], discuss, argue, everything! Nothing I said, nothing I did could convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] to abandon [From.GetHerHis] heretical ways and embrace the one true faith, the [Root.Religion.GetName] religion. Our disagreement about religion were never solved and [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me I was no longer [From.GetHerHis] friend...
translation: 我试过与[From.GetTitledFirstName]交流、讨论、争执以及其他一切手段！但无论我说什么、做什么，都无法说服[From.GetTitledFirstName]放弃[From.GetHerHis]异端言行、皈依正统的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰。我们间关于宗教的分歧无法调停，于是[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定不再做[From.GetHerHis]朋友…

original: I agree, we can no longer be friends
translation: 我接受，我们无法再成为朋友

original: The difference between a [Root.Religion.GetName] and a [From.Religion.GetName] is that...'\nI reasoned with [From.GetTitledFirstName] about [From.GetHerHis] religion and tried to explain why being a [From.Religion.GetName] in this day and age was a bad idea.
translation: 「[Root.Religion.GetName]和[From.Religion.GetName]的差异有这些那些……」\n我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]讨论[From.GetHerHis]信仰，并试图解释为何在现在这个时代做一位[From.Religion.GetName]信徒是一个不好的想法。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to convert and become a [Root.Religion.GetName]
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定皈依[Root.Religion.GetName]

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not heed my warning
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不在意我的警告

original: I need help with a delicate private matter I don't want the [Root.GetChancellorName] to take care of. There are those who think me undiplomatic and I fear they are right, and now I really need to be diplomatic or the [Root.GetManWomanOpp] blackmailing me might spread [Root.GetHerHisOpp] lies with me being unable to do anything about it.
translation: 我有一件不希望[Root.GetChancellorName]过问的「小私事」需要帮助。有些人老是认为我缺乏外交能力，我也担心他们说的是确如其事。如今，我真的需要表现出外交手腕，否则那个勒索我的[Root.GetManWomanOpp]将会到处散播[Root.GetHerHisOpp]谣言，说我没有能力处理这种事。

original: My diplomatic friend, could you please help me?
translation: 我亲爱的朋友，你的外交能力备受认可，烦请您帮帮我吧？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] begs [This.GetTitledFirstName] for help with the extortionist
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]恳求[This.GetTitledFirstName]帮忙应对敲诈者

original: No one, not even my friends, can know about this!
translation: 哪怕是我的朋友，也不可以知道这件事！

original: I heard about the mad [From.GetManWomanOpp] who tries to blackmail [From.GetTitledFirstName] before my friend [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and asked for help. [From.GetTitledFirstName] isn't known for [From.GetHerHis] diplomacy and, as desperate as [From.GetSheHe] is, it is even more likely [From.GetTitledFirstName] would handle this situation with less tact than needed.
translation: 在我的朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]来找我帮忙之前，我就早已听说那个疯狂的[From.GetManWomanOpp]人试图勒索[From.GetTitledFirstName]的事了。[From.GetTitledFirstName]并不以[From.GetHerHis]外交能力闻名，由于[From.GetSheHe]现下是如此地绝望，[From.GetTitledFirstName]甚至很可能以不够得体的方法处理这个问题。

original: I'll help you in any way I can!
translation: 我将力所能及地帮助你！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decides to help [This.GetTitledFirstName] deal with the blackmailing [This.GetManWomanOpp]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]处理那个来敲诈的[This.GetManWomanOpp]

original: Don't get me involved with that mad [From.GetManWomanOpp]!
translation: 不要让我跟那个疯狂的[From.GetManWomanOpp]有什么关联！

original: is forced to handle the mad [This.GetManWomanOpp] without [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s help
translation: 得不到[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助，被迫独自处理那个疯狂的[This.GetManWomanOpp]

original: The blackmailer is mad, if you want my help I want to be reimbursed
translation: 那个敲诈者简直就是个疯子，如果你想得到我的帮助，我需要点报酬

original: is grateful for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] help but not happy about having to pay for it
translation: 虽然感激[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助，但对于要为此付出酬劳而感到不快

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I managed to stop the mad [Root.GetManWomanOpp] from blackmailing and spread malevolent rumors about me. It took every effort, all of our combined diplomatic skill and even a small bribe to get the extortionist to promise to stop the rumors, never approach me again and leave me alone.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我设法阻止那个疯狂的[Root.GetManWomanOpp]继续敲诈勒索和散播关于我的恶毒谣言。我们花了一切的努力、集合我们所有的外交手段，甚至花了点小钱贿赂，那个敲诈者答应不再散播谣言、不再试图接近我、远远地离开我。

original: Finally I got rid of that lunatic!
translation: 我终于摆脱了那个疯子！

original: Without the help of [From.GetTitledFirstName], I was unable to stop the extortionist spreading evil rumors about me. Now everyone thinks I really did that awful thing with that lunatic [Root.GetManWomanOpp]! Why [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], why?!
translation: 如果没有[From.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助，我就无法阻止那么敲诈勒索者继续散播关于我的恶毒谣言。可现在所有人都认为我真的对那个疯狂的[Root.GetManWomanOpp]做了什么可怕的事情！为什么啊[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，为什么？！

original: I'm so ashamed I don't know what to do...
translation: 我感觉非常羞耻，我不知道该怎么做才好……

original: I explained the situation for [From.GetTitledFirstName] carefully, not wanting [From.GetHerHim] to know too much about the situation but the fear of the lunatic [Root.GetManWomanOpp] spreading malicious rumors made me quite talkative and I may have told [From.GetTitledFirstName] too much. It was for the best though, [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed to help me but wanted to be reimbursed, in case something would happen...
translation: 我小心翼翼地向[From.GetTitledFirstName]说明情况、不想让[From.GetHerHim]知道得太多，但对那个疯狂的[Root.GetManWomanOpp]散播恶毒谣言的恐惧让我相当地多嘴，所以我很可能已经对[From.GetTitledFirstName]说得太多了。[From.GetTitledFirstName]答应帮助我这真是再好不过了，只是他想要得到报酬、以防万一会发生点什么……

original: Friends help each other without charging for it!
translation: 朋友之间互相帮助是不需要酬劳的！

original: tried to charge [Root.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetHerHis] help
translation: 试图让[Root.GetTitledFirstName]为[This.GetHerHis]帮助付钱

original: I'll give you whatever you want, just please help me!
translation: 我将给予任何你想要的，只要你肯帮我！

original: is paid for [This.GetHerHis] help with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s lunatic extortionist and the problem is solved
translation: 为[This.GetHerHis]帮助处理[Root.GetTitledFirstName]那疯狂的敲诈者的事情而给予报酬，于是问题就解决了

original: I agreed to help [From.GetTitledFirstName] with [From.GetHerHis] lunatic extortionist if I was paid for my help, and I had already figured out a plan when [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me whether or not my help was wanted enough for getting my demands fulfilled.
translation: 只要得到酬劳、我就会同意帮助[From.GetTitledFirstName]处理[From.GetHerHis]那疯狂勒索者的事情。在[From.GetTitledFirstName]答复我我的帮助是否值得要求的报酬前，我早已想到了一个解决的计划。

original: No money, no help
translation: 没钱就休想得到我的帮助

original: I've gotten the money, now here's what we shall do...
translation: 我已经得到了要求的报酬，现在我们应该要这样做……

original: My knowledge of swords extends only so far as to 'long, sharp things you poke people with when you want them to die, especially if you are in a duel or at war', and it's becoming an embarrassment. If someone could ever teach me anything about swords and how to use them, it would be one of my best friends and I can trust him to never mock my lack of skill.
translation: 我对刀剑的了解就只到了「当你想杀死某人，就把这件又长又尖的东西捅进他的身体里，尤其是在决斗中或者战场上」的程度，这正变成一件令人尴尬的事。如果有人能够告诉我任何有关这些刀剑的知识、并且教会我如何使用它们，那个人一定得是我最好的朋友之一，这样我才能信任他永不会嘲笑我缺乏能力。

original: I really should ask him for help
translation: 我真的应该请他帮忙

original: I can probably figure this out by myself... OW!
translation: 我应该能够自己解决……哎呦！

original: I have seen how [From.GetTitledFirstName] handles swords, and it is not a pretty sight. Half of the time [From.GetSheHe] seems to forget which side is the sharp one! Should I laugh or should I cry at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s incompetence with the sword? Now [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to think I could teach [From.GetHerHim] all I know.
translation: 我看过[From.GetTitledFirstName]是怎样使剑的，那可不怎么好看。有一半的时间里[From.GetSheHe]都好像忘记了哪边才是刀锋！看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]毫无剑技，我真不知道应该笑还是哭？现在[From.GetTitledFirstName]好像认为我能够将毕生所学传授给[From.GetHerHim]。

original: I can only try...
translation: 我只能试试……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] reluctantly try to teach [This.GetTitledFirstName] how to use a sword
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]勉为其难尝试去教[This.GetTitledFirstName]如何使剑

original: Give it up. You and swords will never work
translation: 放弃吧，你要舞刀弄剑是行不通的

original: is disappointed but accepts [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s refusal to teach him
translation: 虽然很失望，但还是接受[Root.GetTitledFirstName]回绝教他使剑的建议

original: I'm risking my life, so I'd like to get paid
translation: 如果要我搭上性命冒险来教你，我需要报酬

original: considers [Root.GetTitledFirstName] request
translation: 考虑[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的要求

original: It took a while, but after a couple of days I learned which part of the sword I could touch without getting hurt. Then came the easy part: how to use the sword. After having practiced on a dummy for several weeks I finally managed to impress [From.GetTitledFirstName] enough to get to practice with [From.GetHerHim] instead of hacking at the dummy.
translation: 虽然浪费了一点时间，但几天后，我总算懂得了碰着剑的哪一个部分不会伤到自己。然后就是比较容易的部分了——剑的正确使用方法。在经过几周的模拟练习后，我总算让[From.GetTitledFirstName]刮目相看，[From.GetHerHim]同意与我对练，不用再砍假人了。

original: I'm still no good with swords, but better than before
translation: 我依然不擅长使剑，但总比以前好

original: You are a menace with a sword, don't even know which end you should hold and which one you use to kill people with. It saddens me to tell you this but I believe you to be unteachable.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not mince [From.GetHerHis] words when [From.GetSheHe] told me how utterly unteachable I was and that I should leave the swords to 'real men'!
translation: 「你光拿着把剑就已经很危险了，你甚至连哪头是用来持剑的、哪头是用来杀人的都分不清楚。虽然我对此感到非常遗憾，但我也只能告诉你——你是学不会的了。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]毫不客气地说出[From.GetHerHis]评论，[From.GetSheHe]告诉我，我是绝对不可能学得会的，应该把剑留给「真正的男人」用！

original: I am a man! Give me that sword... OW!
translation: 我是一个男人！把剑拿给我……哎呦！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to teach me unless I paid [From.GetHerHim] and followed [From.GetHerHis] every rule. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that I was a menace with a sword and the gold was meant to pay for any medical attention [From.GetSheHe] might need while teaching me how to use the sharp part of a sword.
translation: 除非我支付[From.GetHerHim]报酬并且遵守[From.GetHerHis]一切规矩，否则[From.GetTitledFirstName]不会教我。[From.GetSheHeCap]告诉我：让我拿剑是非常危险的，给他的金币是作为[From.GetSheHe]教导我使剑期间所有可能需要的医疗费。

original: Aren't you expecting the worst now? I'm sure both of us will be fine...
translation: 你能不能别考虑最坏的情况？我敢肯定我们两个都会没事的……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is not willing to pay [This.GetTitledFirstName] for [This.GetHerHis] help
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不愿意向[This.GetTitledFirstName]支付报酬来获得[This.GetHerHis]帮助。

original: I can see the wisdom of that, just teach me already!
translation: 我能明白这么做的理由，赶快教我吧！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] agrees to [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s demands and precautionary measures
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]接受并遵循[This.GetTitledFirstName]的要求和预防措施

original: Teach [From.GetTitledFirstName] how to use a sword must be the most hazardous job in the whole world, and I told [From.GetHerHim] exactly that. [From.GetTitledFirstName] still insisted and so I told [From.GetHerHim] I wanted some safety for I feared [From.GetTitledFirstName] would injure me, although unintentionally.
translation: 我明确告知[From.GetHerHim]，教[From.GetTitledFirstName]使剑绝对是全世界最危险的工作。可[From.GetTitledFirstName]仍然坚持，所以我只好告诉[From.GetHerHim]，我需要些安全保障以防[From.GetTitledFirstName]会不小心伤了我。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not agree to that, and so I refused to help
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不同意，所以我拒绝教他使剑

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] saw the wisdom in that and agreed
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]明白这么做的原因并且同意这么做

original: Under [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s careful supervision, [This.GetTitledFirstName] learns how to use a sword
translation: 在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的小心督导下，[This.GetTitledFirstName]学会了如何使剑

original: I need to take a look at the buildings in [Root.Location.GetName] and figure out how to reinforce them and make them harder to conquer if the county would be sieged. The buildings did not inspire me in any way, but I have a friend who is excellent at these kind of things.
translation: 我需要看一下在[Root.Location.GetName]的建筑物，找出加强它们并让它们在被围攻时更难被占领的办法。可这些建筑物无论如何都无法赋予我的灵感，但好在我有一位极其擅长这类事情的朋友。

original: What am I waiting for? A siege? Just ask!
translation: 我还在等着什么？等着被围攻？尽管去问吧！

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! is told what [Root.GetTitledFirstName] had in mind about reinforcements in [Root.Location.GetName]
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!被告知[Root.GetTitledFirstName]心中有关强化[Root.Location.GetName]的想法

original: Maybe a new watchtower? Or a defensive wall? I'll think of something...
translation: 可能建个新的瞭望塔？或者一道防御城墙？让我想想……

original: The buildings [From.GetTitledFirstName] was looking to reinforce should be torn down and replaced with sturdier houses and watchtowers, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was insistent something could be done about them. I told [From.GetHerHim] my honest opinion about the buildings.
translation: 我觉得应该推倒那些[From.GetTitledFirstName]希望加强的建筑，建立新的城墙与瞭望塔，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]坚持认为那些建筑还有用。我向[From.GetHerHim]提出关于那些建筑物最诚恳的建议。

original: The materials from the old houses could be used to erect better buildings...
translation: 那些旧房子的材料可以被用来建造更好的建筑物……

original: is grateful [Root.GetTitledFirstName] helps [This.GetHerHim] with the buildings
translation: 感谢[Root.GetTitledFirstName]帮助[This.GetHerHim]处理那些建筑物

original: Nothing can be done! Tear them down before they fall apart
translation: 没什么可做的了！赶紧在它们崩塌以前推倒他们

original: is disappointed [Root.GetTitledFirstName] couldn't give any better advice
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]无法给予更好的建议而感到沮丧

original: The cost to rebuild them will be great, and I want a share of that
translation: 重建它们的费用不是一笔小数目，我需要有人与我共同分担

original: considers [Root.GetTitledFirstName] offer
translation: 考虑[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的提议

original: There's nothing we can do about the buildings except tear them down and use the salvageable material from them to build new houses with better fortifications. This is how I picture it...'\nWith [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s ideas and the material we managed to salvage, the new buildings would really outshine the old ones.
translation: 「我们别无选择，只能够把它们推倒并使用那些还能够挽救的材料去建造新的有更好防御工事的建筑。这就是我的规划……」\n有了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的点子和我们抢救下来的材料，新的建筑物无疑会比旧的那些更加更加出色。

original: This is perfect! Thank you [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 这计划真是完美！谢谢你，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Friendly Innovations
translation: 友好创新

original: I talked and talked about what kind of reinforcements I thought the buildings could benefit from, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was skeptical of all my ideas. [From.GetSheHeCap] called the buildings 'unsalvageable' and 'a threat to anyone'. 'Tear them down and build anew', was [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s advice.
translation: 我一遍又一遍地谈及我认为什么类型的强化是能够从中获益的，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]却对我所有的想法表示怀疑。[From.GetSheHeCap]把那些建筑物称为「不可救药的」或者「所有人安全的威胁」。「把他们推倒重建些新的建筑」是[From.GetTitledFirstName]的建议。

original: But... that'll cost too much!
translation: 可是……那将会耗资过大！

original: It will cost a large sum of money to repair these old buildings and even if they are repaired I wouldn't promise they would stand a siege. Tear them down, salvage as much material as you can, and build anew. It'll cost, and if you want my help, it'll cost a bit more.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] condemned the old buildings and my plans to reinforce them.
translation: 「修复这些古老的建筑物将会将会耗资巨大，即便他们真的能够修好、我也无法保证它们能够挺过一场围攻。应该把他们推倒，尽你全力挽救更多的材料来建造新的建筑。这同样会耗点钱，如果你想得到我的帮助，那还需要更多一点钱。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]数落那些旧建筑和我打算强化它们的计划。

original: Then I can do nothing about them
translation: 那么我就什么都做不了

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rejects [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s suggestion
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]否决[This.GetTitledFirstName]的建议

original: If that's the best idea, I'll have to do it
translation: 如果那是最好的办法，我将不得不照做

original: is paid to help [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tear down and erect new buildings
translation: 收到报酬帮助[Root.GetTitledFirstName]推倒旧的建筑并建造新的建筑

original: After I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] the best way would be to tear the buildings down and what it would cost to erect new buildings, including my share of the money, [From.GetTitledFirstName] was silent for a very long time. I was about to nudge [From.GetTitledFirstName], thinking [From.GetSheHe] might have forgotten that I was standing next to [From.GetHerHim] when [From.GetSheHe] spoke up.
translation: 我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]最好的办法是推倒那些建筑物，以及建造新建筑物的花销，包含了我的佣金，之后[From.GetTitledFirstName]沉默了很久。我刚要轻推一下[From.GetTitledFirstName]提醒[From.GetSheHe]我已经在[From.GetHerHim]身边站了很久的时候，[From.GetSheHe]开口了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] disagreed and rejected my idea
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不同意并且否决我的想法

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed, and accepted that I would get a share
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意并愿意为我提供一笔酬劳

original: My food has tasted strange lately and I have begun to eat less and less for fear of being poisoned. I don't trust the [Root.GetSpymasterName] to find the poisoner, the only one I can rely on is my friend.
translation: 最近我的食物尝起来总有点奇怪，由于担心被下毒、我开始吃得越来越少。我并不相信我的[Root.GetSpymasterName]能够找到那个投毒者，我唯一能够依赖的就只有我的朋友。

original: With my friend, I'll find the poisoner and put a stop to this!
translation: 有了我朋友的帮助，我将能够找出那个投毒者并且结束这场阴谋！

original: is convinced someone is trying to poison [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 确信有人试图毒害[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I'm just being paranoid, the food is fine
translation: 我只是多疑了，食物没问题

original: It all sounded as another of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s paranoid delusions, but I had to agree when [From.GetSheHe] invited me for dinner that the food had an odd taste and a rather strange lingering aftertaste. Someone might be trying to poison [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 这一切听起来就像[From.GetTitledFirstName]的另一场偏执妄想，但我不得不同意在[From.GetSheHe]的宴会上所吃的食物尝起来有一股奇怪的味道，回味更是怪异。有人可能试图毒害[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: You need my help and you'll get it!
translation: 既然你需要我的帮助，我就会鼎力相助！

original: is relieved [Root.GetTitledFirstName] believes someone is trying to poison [This.GetHerHim]
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]相信有人试图毒害[This.GetHerHim]而感到宽慰

original: I feel fine! The food taste funny but it's not poisoned!
translation: 我觉得没问题！那些食物虽然尝起来怪怪的，但并没有被下毒！

original: cannot believe [Root.GetTitledFirstName] does not believe someone is trying to poison [This.GetHerHim]
translation: 对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]不相信有人试图毒害[This.GetHerHim]而感到难以置信

original: Give me some coins and I'll have this figured out in no time!
translation: 给我点钱，我就立刻帮你弄明白！

original: contemplates whether or not it is worth it
translation: 仔细考虑这是否值得

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did agree with me that the food tasted strange, but wasn't entirely certain someone was trying to poison me. I gave [From.GetTitledFirstName] permission to talk to and interrogate whomever [From.GetSheHe] saw fit, and the cook confessed to having used rancid meat in the stews and trying to cover up the taste with a lot of spices, some poisonous unless used in moderation...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的确同意我说的食物尝起来怪异，但无法完全确定有人试图谋害我。我许可[From.GetTitledFirstName]约谈和盘问任何[From.GetSheHe]认为的嫌疑人，最后厨子坦白他曾炖过腐烂的肉并用很多香料掩盖其臭味，其中有些香料不适度使用就会有毒……

original: The cook didn't intend to poison me, but it was close
translation: 这个厨子虽然不是故意想毒害我，但也差不多了

original: What are you talking about? Poison? You must be joking, this stew tastes fine. Maybe it needs a bit more salt but there's nothing wrong with it!'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my concerns, leaving me feeling forlorn and scared for my life.
translation: 「你在说什么？毒药？你一定是在开玩笑，这些炖肉尝试起来没什么问题。可能要多下点盐巴，但这肉一点问题都没有！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]否定了我的忧虑，让我感觉孤立无援而且为自己的生命忧心忡忡。

original: The poisoner is out there, wanting to kill me!
translation: 确实有投毒者想要杀掉我！

original: To be completely sure the food was or was not poisoned, [From.GetTitledFirstName] required certain expensive equipment and I was the one to pay for it. Although the food tastes strange, I do not feel any different than before. The question is if this really is necessary: do I really want to know?
translation: 为了完全确定那些食物是否有毒，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求我为一些昂贵的设备付钱。虽然那些食物尝起来很奇怪，但我并不觉得自己有什么异样。所以问题就在于，我是不是真的想要知道真相？这是否是必要的？

original: No, I don't care. The equipment costs too much!
translation: 不，我不在乎。这些设备要价太高了！

original: accepts [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decision
translation: 接受[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的决定

original: Of course I need to know! Take all my money!
translation: 我当然需要知道！把我所有钱都拿去吧！

original: only takes what [This.GetTitledFirstName] needs to pay for the equipment
translation: 只把[This.GetTitledFirstName]需要的设备钱拿走

original: It was a fine bluff, telling [From.GetTitledFirstName] I needed expensive equipment to determine if the food was poisoned or not. As soon as I had tasted the stew I knew the strange taste was from rancid meat poorly covered up with enough spices to water your eyes. [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to decide if [From.GetSheHe] wanted to take a risk of being poisoned or if it was worth paying what I deemed a fair cost.
translation: 告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]我需要昂贵的设备来检测食物是否有毒，这真是一个不错的吹牛手段。实际上，在尝到那些炖肉的一刻，我就已经知道那个怪异的味道是源于被一定量香料掩盖的腐肉。[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图决定[From.GetSheHe]是要冒被毒害的风险还是要付给我一笔合理的钱。

original: I thought [From.GetTitledFirstName] was paranoid enough...
translation: 我觉得[From.GetTitledFirstName]实在太多疑了……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted the prize
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]接受这个价钱

original: is overjoyed with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s findings
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的发现而感到欣喜若狂

original: With the expensive equipment acquired [From.GetTitledFirstName] did a thorough examination and it did not take long before [From.GetSheHe] presented me with a result: the cook had used rancid meat in the stew and tried covering up the taste with a lot of spices, some poisonous unless used in moderation. Satisfied with the result, I imprisoned the cook without pardon.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]使用那些昂贵的设备做了一个完全的监测，不久[From.GetSheHe]就给了我一个结论：那个厨子用了腐肉来炖肉，并用很多香料掩盖其臭味，其中有些香料不适度使用就会有毒。我对这个结论很满意，并且毫不犹豫地把那个厨子抓了起来。

original: Now how will I find a new cook?
translation: 现在我要去哪里找个新厨子？

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] priests are constantly pestering me about religion, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and money to the church. No matter what I do, promise to pray more or read the holy scripture more thoroughly they won't leave me alone!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]神职人员经常因为宗教、[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]以及教会捐赠等问题纠缠我。无论我做什么，即便我答应更多地祈祷、更完全地阅读宗教经典，他们也不肯轻易放过我！

original: Please, someone help me get them to stop!
translation: 行行好吧，找个人来帮帮我，让那些神职人员消停一下吧！

original: §Y[This.GetFirstName]§! hears [Root.GetTitledFirstName]s plea for help
translation: §Y[This.GetFirstName]§!听到了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的求救

original: Oh [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], help me and I'll be a better [Root.GetReligionAdherent]!
translation: 噢，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，帮助我吧，我将变成一个更好的[Root.Religion.GetName]追随者！

original: I find it curious that the [From.Religion.GetName] priests are constantly pestering [From.GetTitledFirstName] no matter what [From.GetSheHe] promises to do or no matter how much money [From.GetSheHe] bestows to the [From.Religion.GetName] church.
translation: 我觉得很奇怪，无论[From.GetTitledFirstName]答应做什么，无论[From.GetSheHe]捐赠多少钱给[From.Religion.GetName]教会，[From.Religion.GetName]神职人员还是经常纠缠[From.GetSheHe]。

original: I know what [From.GetTitledFirstName] could do!
translation: 我知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]可以怎么做！

original: is relieved [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has a solution to [This.GetHerHis] problem
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]有解决[This.GetHerHis]问题的方法而感到释然

original: I don't want to do anything to make the priests upset
translation: 我不想做任何会令神职人员们不高兴的事情

original: is discouraged that the [This.Religion.GetName] priests frighten [Root.GetTitledFirstName] so
translation: 为那些[This.Religion.GetName]神职人员如此令[Root.GetTitledFirstName]恐惧而感到泄气

original: You want my advice? Then it'll cost you
translation: 你想得到我的建议？你需要给点钱

original: listens to what [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has to say
translation: 去听[Root.GetTitledFirstName]有什么要说的

original: All the [Root.Religion.GetName] priests care about is money. Give them some alms whenever they come visiting and they will leave you alone for weeks, if not months for fear of being sinful: no priest want to admit to the sin of being greedy.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] advised me soundly and I agreed to try it.
translation: 「[Root.Religion.GetName]的神职人员只关心钱，不论他们何时来拜访都给些施舍，他们就会让你安静几个星期甚至几个月，因为他们畏惧犯下罪孽：没有神职人员愿意承认犯下了贪婪的罪行。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]给我明智的建议，我决定一试。

original: So all it took was money? Great!
translation: 所以这个计划所要需要的就只有钱？太好了！

original: It's not only the priests who are greedy...
translation: 并不是只有贪婪的神职人员纠缠我……

original: Money-loving priests
translation: 贪财的神职人员

original: It seems as if no one wants to help me for fear of upsetting the [Root.Religion.GetName] priests, not even my friend [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 看来由于担心令[Root.Religion.GetName]神职人员们不安，好像没人愿意帮助我，连我的朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]也是如此！

original: The pestering priests are getting worse!
translation: 那群缠人的神职人员变本加厉了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] had a great advice for me on how to stop the [Root.Religion.GetName] priests pestering me and [From.GetSheHe] got my undivided attention. The problem, though, was that [From.GetTitledFirstName] wanted payment for [From.GetHerHis] advice!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]有一个好主意，可以帮我摆脱[Root.Religion.GetName]神父们的骚扰，于是我专心听[From.GetSheHe]的话。但是问题在于[From.GetTitledFirstName]想让我为[From.GetHerHis]建议付钱！

original: There's no way I'll pay for advice!
translation: 要我为建议付钱，没门儿！

original: accept [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decision to do without [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s advice
translation: 接受[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的决定，不采纳[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的建议

original: Who cares about money? Here, just tell me!
translation: 谁在乎那几个子儿？钱给你，快跟我说！

original: is glad [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decided to take the safe before the sorry
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]认为安全为重而感到开心

original: My advice to [From.GetTitledFirstName] was very simple: just pay the [From.Religion.GetName] priests and they'll stop pestering you for, oh perhaps a few weeks? Though I could have shared this for free I decided to test how much [From.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to be left alone by the [From.Religion.GetName] priests and demanded money for the advice.
translation: 我对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的建议非常简单：只要付钱给那些[From.Religion.GetName]神职人员，他们就会停止纠缠你，至少几个星期内不纠缠你。虽然我可以免费提供这条建议，但是我决定测试下[From.GetTitledFirstName]到底有多想摆脱那些[From.Religion.GetName]神职人员，并要求用钱来换这条建议。

original: I have underestimated [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s patience
translation: 我低估了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的耐心

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] almost threw the money at me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]几乎就把钱砸到我脸上了！

original: The idea of being celibate is intriguing, especially since I feel I have more than enough children. A friend of mine became celibate not long ago, I wonder what made [Root.GetHerHim] take that decision?
translation: 独身主义的想法很有趣，尤其由于我感觉自己已经有足够多孩子。我的一个朋友在不久之前成为了独身主义者，我很好奇是什么让[Root.GetHerHim]做下这个决定？

original: I'd really like to know more about celibacy
translation: 我真的希望知道更多有关独身主义的事情

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has many questions about celibacy for [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]有很多关于独身主义的问题要向[This.GetTitledFirstName]请教

original: On second thought, what was [Root.GetSheHe] thinking!?
translation: 转念一想，[Root.GetSheHe]到底在想些什么！？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] upsets [This.GetTitledFirstName] when [Root.GetSheHe] denounces [This.GetHerHis] choice of lifestyle
translation: 当[Root.GetTitledFirstName]指责[This.GetHerHis]生活方式时，[Root.GetSheHe]令[This.GetTitledFirstName]感到恼火

original: No, celibacy certainly isn't for me...
translation: 不，独身主义当然不适合我……

original: My decision to become celibate is very private and it felt a bit disturbing to have [From.GetTitledFirstName] asking all these questions about celibacy, what it meant and the reason as to why I felt compelled to choose celibacy. I tried explaining as thoroughly as I felt comfortable and [From.GetTitledFirstName] listened intently to whatever I told [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我要成为禁欲主义者的决定是非常私人的事情，而[From.GetTitledFirstName]问的所有这些有关独身主义的问题——它意味着什么以及为什么我看起来好像是受到胁迫而不得不选择独身主义——令我感到有点烦恼。我试图在我能够接受的范围内尽可能全面地向[From.GetHerHim]说明，[From.GetTitledFirstName]聚精会神地听我说的话。

original: ...but I don't think celibacy is for you
translation: ……但我并不觉得独身主义适合你

original: is disappointed [Root.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetSheHe] lacks the necessary will for celibacy
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]认为[This.GetSheHe]缺乏独身的必要而感到失望

original: Everyone should try celibacy!
translation: 大家都应该试试独身主义！

original: is thankful [Root.GetTitledFirstName] took the time to answer [This.GetHerHis] questions about celibacy
translation: 感激[Root.GetTitledFirstName]百忙之中抽空回答[This.GetHerHis]独身主义问题

original: I thought [From.GetTitledFirstName] had more tact than criticising someone's choice of lifestyle in public, especially a friend's lifestyle. I am celibate and proud of that, I would never denounce anyone's lifestyle no matter my opinion on the matter!
translation: 我觉得[From.GetTitledFirstName]在大庭广众之下批评别人的生活方式毫不得体，尤其那是一个朋友的生活方式。我是一个独身主义者，而且我为之自豪，我永不会指责任何人的生活方式，不管我对这问题是什么看法！

original: Next time, talk to me first before making it a public matter!
translation: 下一次，在把这事情闹成一个公众问题之前，麻烦先跟我谈谈！

original: I have chosen to live my life in celibacy, but the choice was not easily made. No matter what I tell you, I cannot make you chose and to be honest, I don't think celibacy is right for you...'\nThe bitter truth from [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lips made me reconsider celibacy.
translation: 「我选择独身主义的生活方式，但这个决定并不容易。无论我跟你说说些什么，我不能代替你选择，说实话，我并不觉得独身主义适合你……」\n从[From.GetTitledFirstName]口中说出的逆耳之言让我不得不再三考虑是否真的要成为独身主义者。

original: You are right, celibacy is not for me
translation: 你是对的，独身主义并不适合我

original: You must choose celibacy and if you do, you have to fight temptations every day for the rest of your life. You will abstain from more pleasures than you know about now but the reward is greater than any pleasure. The love of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will help you hold your promise...'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] was honest about celibacy and made me realize how important my decision is.
translation: 「你一定要选择独身主义，如果你真是这么做了，在余生的每一天、你都将不得不与诱惑对抗。你将无法获得比你现在已知的更多欢愉，但却将得到比任何欢愉都要宝贵的回报。[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的爱将会帮助你遵守你的承诺……」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于独身主义的问题知无不言，这让我意识到这个决定的重要性。

original: I chose [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s love!
translation: 我要选择[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的爱！

original: On the road to Celibacy
translation: 正走向独身主义

original: I will not take this decision lightly, but... not yet...
translation: 我将不会随随便便做这个决定，只不过……现在还不是时候……

original: I struggle with the pleasures of life or the pleasures of the after-life ever day. Some days I feel celibacy is the right way for me, other days I cannot get enough of the pleasures of life. Today, I am feeling more inclined towards hedonism than celibacy...
translation: 我每天都在纠结：究竟是要此生的欢愉还是来生的欢乐？有些时候我感觉独身主义是我应该走的路、有些时候我又感觉自己还未享受足够此生的欢愉。今天，我感觉自己相比于独身主义、更倾向于享乐主义……

original: Do I want encouragement or discouragement?
translation: 我究竟是想要得到鼓励还是打击？

original: I don't want to become a hedonist like my friend!
translation: 我不想成为像我朋友那样的享乐主义者！

original: I... can't... decide... now!
translation: 我……现在……还无法……决定！

original: I know exactly how [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels right now, trying to decide if [From.GetSheHe] wants a heaven on Earth or in the after-life. Pleasure is everything for me and as I saw [From.GetTitledFirstName] struggle I decided this might be the time, the only time, I could convince [From.GetHerHim] to join our side...
translation: 我完全理解[From.GetTitledFirstName]现在是什么感受——[From.GetSheHe]试图确定自己是想要地上的天堂还是往生的天堂。享乐对我而言就是一切，现在既然看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]在挣扎、我认为这是一个好时机——可能是唯一的时机——去说服[From.GetHerHim]加入我们这一方……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] would never forgive me...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]将永远不会原谅我……

original: decides to let [From.GetTitledFirstName] struggle with this alone
translation: 决定让[From.GetTitledFirstName]独自挣扎

original: Convincing [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be a piece of cake...
translation: 说服[From.GetTitledFirstName]简直是小菜一碟……

original: is easily manipulated by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 很容易就被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]摆布

original: Confused
translation: 迷茫

original: I am perfectly happy knowing my paradise is on Earth, mayhap not in Heaven but I would rather live my life in pleasure than in pain and struggle just for the sake of maybe being allowed into Heaven when I die. Other people's opinion of me and my lifestyle seldom bother me, but when my friend [From.GetTitledFirstName] said [From.GetSheHe] did not want to become a hedonist like me it still hurt.
translation: 我为得知我的乐园是在地上而非天国而感到非常高兴，我宁愿选择此生欢愉而非为死后可能得到的进入天国的应允而挣扎和痛苦。其他人对我的看法和我的生活方式很少困扰我，但当我的朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]并不希望成为一个像我这样的享乐主义者时，我依然感到不快。

original: I don't want to hear your opinion, just leave me alone
translation: 我不想听到你的意见，走开走开

original: I received neither encouragement nor discouragement from [From.GetTitledFirstName] and was left alone to struggle with my confused feelings about celibacy and hedonism.
translation: 我没有从[From.GetTitledFirstName]身上得到鼓舞或打击，我只能不得不继续独自纠结、独自迷茫是要选择独身主义抑或是选择享乐主义。

original: What to do, what to choose...
translation: 该做什么，该选什么……

original: Imagine all the pleasures in the world, good food and wine, the touch of skin on skin... To be celibate is to abstain for nearly all worldly pleasures, all for a chance of going to Heaven when you die. So ask yourself: a lifetime of pleasures or perhaps Heaven when you die?'[From.GetTitledFirstName] was very convincing when [From.GetSheHe] talked about hedonism...
translation: 「想象人世间的种种欢愉——上好的食物和美酒，以及人与人的肌肤之亲……要成为一名独身主义者就必须戒除几乎一切世俗的欢愉，这一切都是为了死后进入天国的机会。所以问问你自己吧，是要一生的欢愉抑或要死后仅仅可能进入的天国？」当[From.GetTitledFirstName]谈及享乐主义时，[From.GetSheHe]十分具有说服力……

original: Pleasures in this life! Heaven can wait, I want it now!
translation: 我要此生的欢愉！天堂可以稍等，但欢愉可是我此时此刻所想要的！

original: Onwards - to Hedonism!
translation: 前进吧——我要走向享乐主义！

original: I'd rather be rewarded in Heaven
translation: 我宁可在天国得到奖赏

original: Books have always fascinated me and when I heard that a friend of mine is a scholar and member of a small group of people dedicated to studying books, discussing them and learning more about our world through philosophy and science I knew I had to know more!
translation: 书本一直深深地吸引着我，所以当我听说我的一位朋友原来是位学者、还是一个小型团体——他们专注于研究和讨论书籍，通过哲学和科学研究、认识世界——成员的时候，我就知道我必须要了解更多！

original: My friend, tell me more about the scholars!
translation: 我的朋友，多跟我说说你们这群学者吧！

original: is glad [Root.GetTitledFirstName] takes an interest to scholarly matters
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对学者的事情很感兴趣而感到开心

original: It sounds incredibly boring
translation: 这听起来无聊得难以置信

original: did not ask for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] opinion about [This.GetHerHis] scholarly lifestyle
translation: 没有征求[Root.GetTitledFirstName]关于[This.GetHerHis]学者生活方式的看法

original: I need more time to study so I can impress the group of scholars!
translation: 为了给这群学者留下深刻印象，我需要更多时间去学习！

original: Being a scholar means you have a great interest in philosophy, science and theology and a willingness to spend hours with dusty old books just to confirm what you already know or discover you were wrong. I was more than happy to talk to [From.GetTitledFirstName] about what being a scholar meant for me and why I choose it...
translation: 成为一名学者意味着你对哲学、科学以及神学拥有浓烈的兴趣，并且乐意在布满尘埃的旧书里泡几个小时，仅仅只是为了确认一些你已经知道的事情或者发现自己有什么错误。我无比乐意与[From.GetTitledFirstName]谈论成为一个学者意味着什么以及为什么我要选择它……

original: Being a scholar requires dedication, and you don't have it
translation: 成为一名学者需要奉献精神，而你却没有

original: can't believe [Root.GetTitledFirstName] don't think [This.GetSheHe] would be dedicated enough to be a scholar
translation: 无法相信[Root.GetTitledFirstName]认为[This.GetSheHe]没有足够的奉献精神去成为一名学者

original: Let me tell you why I became a scholar and then you can decide
translation: 让我告诉你我为何要成为一名学者，然后你就可以下决定了

original: listens intently as [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tells [This.GetHerHim] why [Root.GetSheHe] became a scholar
translation: 专心致志地聆听[Root.GetTitledFirstName]告诉[This.GetHerHim]为什么[Root.GetSheHe]会成为一名学者的原因

original: I never asked for [From.GetTitledFirstName] opinion about me being a scholar, about my love and passion for books, philosophy, science and theology. The choice I made is one I am proud of and no one, not even my friend, shall take away my pride of being a scholar!
translation: 我从未向[From.GetTitledFirstName]征求关于我要成为一名学者、关于我对书籍、哲学、科学和神学的热情的意见。我要做下的这个决定是我为之自豪的，没有人、哪怕是我的朋友可以带走我要成为一名学者的骄傲！

original: So stop bedraggling my lifestyle [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 所以[From.GetFirstName]别再抹黑的我生活方式！

original: I couldn't resist yawning when [From.GetTitledFirstName] talked about philosophy, theology and science which earned me a sharp reprimand from [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to tell me more, I tried blaming the yawn on too little sleep but [From.GetSheHe] did not believe me.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]与我谈论哲学、神学和科学时，我无法制止自己打呵欠，这可让我得到了[From.GetHerHim]的尖锐批评。[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝跟我说更多的东西，我试图把呵欠归咎于缺乏睡眠，但[From.GetSheHe]并不相信我。

original: It was rather boring...
translation: 这真有点无聊……

original: The more [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me about philosophy, science and theology the more I felt like this was a subject I could immerse myself in until I die without having more than brushed upon the vast amount of knowledge found in books and other scholars.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我越多的哲学、科学和神学知识，我就越感觉到这就是我可以毕生沉浸其中的事物，直到死亡让我无法再重温这些从书本和其他学者那里得到的海量知识。

original: I want this! I want the books, the philosophy - everything!
translation: 我要这一切！我要书籍、我要哲学、我要所有这一切！

original: Scholar - or Mystic?
translation: 学者——还是神秘主义者？

original: I am not quite ready yet
translation: 我还没有完全准备好

original: Did Not Abandon Friendship
translation: 没有抛弃友谊

original: I don't recognize my friend anymore, the things we had in common when we first met and became friends have changed and vanished. Whenever I meet my friend I ask myself: 'Is this the person I want to be friends with? Can we really be friends despite all our differences?'
translation: 我好像不再认得我的朋友了，让我们第一次见面并成为朋友的共同点似乎早已改变、甚至消失。每次碰到我的朋友，我都总是扪心自问：「这真的是那个我想与之成为朋友的人吗？即便我们有这么多的差别，我们还真的能够成为朋友吗？」

original: We have drifted apart
translation: 我们已经渐行渐远

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer friends
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]不再是朋友

original: Tell me, do you think we still can be friends?
translation: 告诉我，我们还能够继续做朋友吗？

original: Will [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] still be friends despite their differences?
translation: 即便[Root.GetTitledFirstName]与[This.GetTitledFirstName]有这么多的差别，也能继续做朋友吗？

original: No! You are my friend, that won't ever change!
translation: 不！你是我的朋友，这永远不会改变！

original: I've had a good friend in [From.GetTitledFirstName] and it saddens my heart [From.GetSheHe] thinks we no longer have anything in common and the differences between us is too great an obstacle to get over.\n'I no longer see you as my friend,' [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me.
translation: 我曾经与[From.GetTitledFirstName]是好朋友，但[From.GetSheHe]现在认为我们已经没有任何共同点，我们间的分歧已经太过巨大以至于无法跨越，这可真是伤透我心。\n「我不会再把你当成朋友了。」[From.GetTitledFirstName]这么对我说。

original: I will miss you...
translation: 我会怀念你的……

original: If you don't want me as your friend, then you're my rival!
translation: 如果你不想与我做朋友，那么我们只能成为仇敌！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] declares [This.GetTitledFirstName] to no longer be [Root.GetHerHis] friend
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]声明[This.GetTitledFirstName]与[Root.GetHerHis]不再是朋友

original: I liked having you as my friend, but our differences are too great. We have nothing in common any more and I feel... I feel it would be for the best if we no longer were friends.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s words did not fall lightly from [From.GetHerHis] lips, this was something [From.GetSheHe] had thought long and hard about.
translation: 「我乐意与你做朋友，但我们之间的分歧实在太过巨大。我们之间已经没有任何共同点了，所以我想……我想我们最好还是别做朋友了。」\n从[From.GetHerHis]嘴里出来的话让[From.GetTitledFirstName]也毫不轻松，这一定是[From.GetSheHe]经过长期而沉重思考的……

original: If that is what you feel, then I'll respect that
translation: 如果这就是你所想的，那么我将尊重你的想法

original: I want to be your friend, don't throw our friendship away!
translation: 我想成为你的朋友，别抛弃我们间的友谊！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to give up on their friendship
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝放弃他们的友谊

original: I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I liked having [From.GetHerHim] as my friend, but our differences were too great. We have nothing in common any more and it would be for the best if we no longer were friends.
translation: 我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我乐意与[From.GetHerHim]成为朋友，但我们间的分歧实在太大。我们已经没有任何共同点，所以我们最好还是不要别做朋友了。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] then declared me [From.GetHerHis] rival!
