translation: 然后[From.GetTitledFirstName]声明我成为[From.GetHerHis]仇敌！

original: This friendship is over
translation: 友尽

original: Instead of agreeing that our friendship is doomed, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me that as long as [From.GetSheHe] lived [From.GetSheHe] would consider me a friend. All our differences, the things we no longer had in common [From.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed as us having grown up and it was time for us to find new things to talk about and strengthen our friendship with.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]并不承认我们友谊的失败，而是告诉我，在[From.GetSheHe]有生之年，我将永远是[From.GetSheHe]的朋友。我们间所有的分歧，我们不再拥有任何的共同点，这一切[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为仅仅是因我们成长了，所以这正是一个好时机，让我们继续去寻找新的共同话题，以便让我们的友谊更加坚实。

original: So... We are still friends, I guess
translation: 所以……我猜，我们应该还是朋友

original: The wound was still fresh, oozing blood and I paled when I saw it. My friend just joked about it but became more serious when I, appalled by the sight, asked who had caused the injury.
translation: 这还是一个新伤口，看到血在不断往外渗，我吓得脸都青了。我的朋友刚才还在拿这开玩笑，当我带着震惊的眼光问这是谁造成的，他才开始认真起来。

original: Your rival?! I'll kill him!
translation: 你的仇敌？！我要杀了他！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s friend's rival [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s rival also
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]朋友的仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]也成为了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的仇敌

original: My friend's enemy is my enemy!
translation: 我朋友的敌人就是我的敌人！

original: I won't interfere in this
translation: 我将不会介入到其中

original: reacts to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s refusal to interfere
translation: 对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝介入做出反应

original: Without warning, [From.GetTitledFirstName] jumped me and accused me of having wounded [From.GetHerHis] friend. I defended myself the best I could and tried to calm [From.GetTitledFirstName] down so I could meet [From.GetHerHis] accusations.
translation: 毫无预兆地，[From.GetTitledFirstName]突然就跳了过来，还谴责我伤害了[From.GetHerHis]朋友。我尽我全力自卫，并试图让[From.GetTitledFirstName]冷静下来，好让我正面回应[From.GetHerHis]指责。

original: I barely managed to escape with my life!
translation: 我差点没能活着离开！

original: It was a rather nasty wound but [From.GetTitledFirstName] had it all wrong. Still it was disappointing [From.GetSheHe] thought the matter too inferior for [From.GetHerHis] attention, if it had been my rival who had caused the wound of course I would have wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] help me retaliate!
translation: 这是一道相当严重的伤口，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]完全不这么想。[From.GetSheHe]认为这是件小事，不需要[From.GetHerHis]关注，这让我大感失望，如果真是我的仇敌造成了这个创伤，我当然希望[From.GetTitledFirstName]帮我报仇！

original: I guess our friendship is 'inferior', too...
translation: 我猜我们间的友谊也只是「小事」……

original: Seeks Revenge
translation: 寻仇

original: For too long I have ignored the constant affronts from my rival but my honor demands I ask my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] for permission to challenge my rival to a duel.
translation: 我已经忍耐我的仇敌不断侮辱太久了，我向我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]请求同意与我的仇敌来一场光明正大的决斗！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], do I have permission for this duel?
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]，我能否您请求同意这场决斗？

original: Your rival [This.GetTitledFirstName] hears about your request
translation: 你的仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]听说了你的请求

original: Your liege [This.GetTitledFirstName] considers your request
translation: 你的领主[This.GetTitledFirstName]会考虑你的请求

original: Have I really thought this through? I might be wounded!
translation: 我有没有真的彻底想过这个问题？我可能会受伤的！

original: Though I had thought [From.GetTitledFirstName] to be a more reasonable man, [From.GetHerHis] request to be allowed to duel [From.GetHerHis] rival was slightly... erratic. [From.GetTitledFirstName] claimed to be constantly subject to affronts from [From.GetHerHis] rival and asked for permission to defend [From.GetHerHis] honor.
translation: 虽然我曾认为[From.GetTitledFirstName]是个更加理智的人，可是[From.GetHerHis]请求同意与[From.GetHerHis]仇敌决斗实在是有些……不太理智了。[From.GetTitledFirstName]宣称自己遭到[From.GetHerHis]仇敌不断地侮辱，所以请求同意为[From.GetHerHis]荣誉而战。

original: Allow the duel
translation: 同意这场决斗

original: is very grateful for your permission to duel [This.GetHerHis] rival
translation: 为你同意这场与[This.GetHerHis]仇敌间的决斗而感到非常感激

original: Disallow it, but take no further action
translation: 否决这项要求，但不做其他事情

original: accepts your refusal but is very disappointed
translation: 接受你的否决，但非常沮丧

original: Disallow it and banish the instigator
translation: 否决这项要求，并把煽动者驱逐出境

original: Although I am not entirely certain why you want to duel your rival, you clearly feel you need to defend your honor. You have my permission.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] graciously granted my request.
translation: 「虽然我无法完全确定你想要与你的仇敌决斗的理由，你似乎清楚地感觉到自己必须要为你的荣誉而战。我同意了。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]和蔼地接受我的请求。

original: Too bad I'm only allowed to wound my rival
translation: 太糟糕了，我只被允许打伤我的仇敌

original: is wounded by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] in the duel
translation: 被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]在决斗中所伤

original: I have calmed down and realized the duel is very unnecessary
translation: 我已经冷静下来了，并且意识到这场决斗非常不必要

original: I have decided to disallow you to duel your rival with my blessing. Despite what you feel to be slights to your honor I cannot possibly allow you to duel your rival in hot blood...'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] disregarded the slights to my honor and forbade me to duel my rival!
translation: 「带着我的祝福，我已经决定否决你与仇敌间的决斗。虽然你感觉到自己的荣誉受到损害，但我不可能允许你与你的仇敌在血泊中决斗……」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]不管我名誉受损，并禁止我与仇敌决斗！

original: But... Shall I just accept the affronts?
translation: 可是……难道我就这样接受侮辱吗？

original: I have decided to disallow you to duel your rival and to banish you from my realm. I cannot have vassals like you trying to duel anyone who affronts them - the mayhem caused would be time consuming and wreak havoc in my realm!'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] banished me, for a simple duel request?!
translation: 「我已经决斗否决你要与仇敌决斗的请求，并且把你驱逐出境。我不能允许封臣像你一样试图与任何侮辱自己的人决斗——造成的骚乱将会耗费大量时间解决，并且在我的国土内造成严重破坏！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]仅仅为了一个简单的决斗请求而驱逐我？！

original: This cannot be possible!
translation: 这不可能啊！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] had to ask permission from [From.GetHerHis] liege [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] in order to be able to challenge me to a duel. I accepted, of course, what else could I do?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]请求[From.GetHerHis]领主[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]给予与我决斗的许可。我当然接受，不然还能怎么做？

original: That bastard managed to wound me!
translation: 那个禽兽伤了我！

original: I managed to knock [From.GetHerHim] unconscious before anyone was harmed
translation: 我在任何人受到伤害以前就把[From.GetHerHim]打晕过去

original: I defeated [From.GetHerHim] easily
translation: 我轻松地击败了[From.GetHerHim]

original: Disgraceful
translation: 不名誉的

original: I am absolutely certain my rival is cheating in the tournament! There's no way he could win his fights so easily if he wasn't cheating...
translation: 我绝对可以肯定我的仇敌在骑士比武大会上作弊了！如果他没有作弊，他无法在这张比赛中赢得如此轻松……

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will know what to do with the cheater!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]会知道该对作弊者做什么处理！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tells [This.GetTitledFirstName] about the cheating lord
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]告知[This.GetTitledFirstName]有个作弊的贵族

original: I'll confront him myself!
translation: 我将亲自质问他！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronts [Root.GetHerHis] rival [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]质问[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Everyone must know what a cheater he is!
translation: 每个人都应该知道他是一个怎样的作弊者！

original: dislikes your slander
translation: 不喜欢你的诋毁

original: I will hold my tongue and tell no one
translation: 我将守口如瓶，不跟别人说

original: My liege, I have proof one of the participants in the tournament is cheating!'\nThe rivalry between [From.GetTitledFirstName] and the supposed cheater is well known, but I can't imagine [From.GetTitledFirstName] would lie about something this serious!
translation: 「我的领主，我有证据证明其中一位骑士比武大会的参赛者作弊了！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]和作弊嫌疑者之间的仇敌关系可是众人皆知，但我无法想象[From.GetTitledFirstName]会在如此严重的问题上撒谎！

original: Imprison the cheater!
translation: 囚禁作弊者！

original: is imprisoned for cheating in the tournament
translation: 因为在骑士比武大会中作弊而被囚禁

original: Banish the cheater
translation: 驱逐作弊者

original: is banished for cheating in the tournament
translation: 因为在骑士比武大会中作弊而被驱逐

original: I need more proof than your words, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，我需要比你的言语更充分的证据！

original: The tournament was well on its way when [From.GetTitledFirstName], aggravated by [From.GetHerHis] losses at the list field where we both took part in the jousting, accused me of cheating and presented a ridiculous theory [From.GetSheHe] claimed proved I cheated!
translation: 比武大会本来进行得非常顺利，然而在我们共同参加的马上枪术比赛竞技场上，[From.GetTitledFirstName]因为[From.GetHerHis]失败，怒而指责我作弊，[From.GetSheHe]还提出一种可笑的理论来证明！

original: I won every match fair and square!
translation: 我赢得的每场比赛都是光明正大的！

original: Your 'evidence' is dishonoring, I challenge you to a duel!
translation: 你的「证据」毫无名誉可言，我要与你决斗！

original: is challenged to a duel
translation: 被挑战决斗

original: Everyone at the tournament [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] hosted heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] accusing me of cheating in the tournament. I did not think any one would believe [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s wild accusations, but the suspicious looks and the whispered gossip told me otherwise...
translation: 在[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]举办的骑士比武大会上的每个人都听到了[From.GetTitledFirstName]指责我在比赛中作弊。我不认为有人会相信[From.GetTitledFirstName]的胡乱指控，但那些看起来怀疑的面孔和窃窃私语却似乎在告诉我恰恰相反……

original: Gold will stop their gossiping!
translation: 金子能够制止这些流言！

original: Why should I care what they think?
translation: 为什么我要在乎他们的想法？

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] accused me of cheating in the tournament and [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. I was thrown in jail based on unwarranted accusations from a rival of mine - [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]指责我在骑士比武大会上作弊了，而且[From.GetTitledFirstName]相信[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的话。我因为仇敌[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]无正当理由的指责而被投进大牢里！

original: I will kill you for this, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]，我将为此杀了你！

original: The false accusations from [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] about me cheating in the tournament was groundless but [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed every poisonous word that idiot told [From.GetHerHim]. Despite my protests and demands of a fair trial where [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] could present [FromFrom.GetHerHis] so-called 'evidence' [From.GetTitledFirstName] chose to banish me!
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]错误地指控我在比赛中作弊是完全莫须有的，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]相信那个蠢货告诉[From.GetHerHim]的每一个字。尽管我大声抗议并要求举办一场公平的审判，到那时[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]可以呈上[FromFrom.GetHerHis]所谓「证据」，然而[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是选择了放逐我！

original: When I get back, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will never be safe again...
translation: 当我回来，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]将不会再有任何安宁……

original: After I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] about my rival cheating in the tournament I eagerly waited for [From.GetHerHis] reaction...
translation: 在我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]我的仇敌在骑士比武大会上作弊以后，我满怀渴望之情等待[From.GetHerHis]回应……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to do nothing!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]决定什么都不做！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] imprisoned the cheater!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]把那个作弊者抓起来了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] banished the cheater!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]把那个作弊者驱逐出境！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s face turned red and [From.GetSheHe] started sputtering swearwords when I accused [From.GetHerHim] of cheating in the tournament. I had made sure I made the accusations where as many people as possible could hear it, something I came to regret quickly when [From.GetTitledFirstName] challenged me to a duel!
translation: 当我指责[From.GetHerHim]在骑士比武大会上作弊时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的脸红了起来，[From.GetSheHe]还开始吐沫横飞地乱说脏话。我已经确保在我公开指责时能有尽可能多的人能够听到，但我很快就为此后悔了——[From.GetTitledFirstName]竟然要求与我进行决斗！

original: I accept, but don't you cheat this time!
translation: 我接受，但这次你可别再作弊了！

original: defends [This.GetHerHis] honor against [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s accusations
translation: 由于[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的指责，为捍卫[This.GetHerHis]荣誉而战

original: I jest, I jest! Please don't hit me...
translation: 开个玩笑，开个玩笑嘛！你可不要伤到我了……

original: have never seen a more spineless creature than [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 没见过有什么生物比[Root.GetTitledFirstName]更加没骨气

original: I defended my honor in the only way possible: I challenged [From.GetTitledFirstName] to a duel in front of all the tournament participants, the spectators and our host, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. No one calls me a cheater and gets away with it!
translation: 我唯一有可能捍卫自己荣誉的方式就只有：在所有骑士比武大会的参赛者、围观者和比赛的举办者[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]面前挑战[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求决斗。没有人能够诬告我为一名作弊者还能逍遥法外！

original: I fear... I lost...
translation: 我担心……我会输……

original: I proved my innocence when [From.GetSheHe] lay unconscious on the ground by my feet
translation: 当[From.GetSheHe]躺在我脚边失去意识，我就证明了我的清白

original: I defeated [From.GetTitledFirstName] and thus proved I am not a cheater
translation: 我击败了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，所以我证明了自己不是一个作弊者

original: It was as I thought, [From.GetTitledFirstName] was all talk and no spine. Coward! [From.GetTitledFirstName] hastily withdrew [From.GetHerHis] unwarranted accusations when I threatened to punch [From.GetHerHis] teeth down [From.GetHerHis] throat in a duel.
translation: 正如我所料，[From.GetTitledFirstName]敢说不敢当，是十足的懦夫！当我威胁要在决斗中把[From.GetHerHis]牙都打到[From.GetHerHis]肚子里时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]匆匆撤回了[From.GetHerHis]无根无据的指控。

original: I should have done it anyway...
translation: 无论如何，我当时就应该这么做……

original: I have great faith in [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] but you wonder where the world is going when heretics are trying to overturn all we ever believed in and bring us false gods! Among many others, my rival has embraced a heretical version of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 我对[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]充满虔诚之心，但你却在异端试图颠覆我们所有的信仰并带给我们虚假的神灵时动摇了！就好像很多其他人一样，我的仇敌接受了异端[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰。

original: Surely [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] needs defenders against men like him!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]肯定需要坚定的捍卫者与他那样的人斗争！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] offers [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerHis] help against heretics like [Root.GetHerHis] rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]向[Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]寻求[Root.GetHerHis]帮助以对抗像[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌那样的异端

original: My enmity to him is quite secular, thanks
translation: 我对他的怨恨是完全与宗教无关的世俗之事

original: There might be something truthful in his views
translation: 在他的看法中也可能存在某些真实的东西

original: It is with sorrow in my heart that I must tell you that an errant subject has chosen to become a heretic. I trust that Your Holiness will see to it that no one else is tempted to follow the same heretical way...'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] warned us of a subject lead astray.
translation: 「我必须怀着悲痛之心向您报告：有个迷途羔羊选择信奉异端。我相信圣父教宗陛下不希望看到其他人被这种异端所诱惑。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]向我们警告有人走向了堕落之道。

original: We have no choice but to excommunicate this poor soul
translation: 对这个可怜的灵魂，我们除了绝罚已经没有什么可以做的了

original: is sent a letter telling [This.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] has been excommunicated by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 收到一封来信告知[This.GetTitledFirstName]：[From.GetSheHe]已经被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]绝罚

original: is sent a letter promising [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will take care of the heretic
translation: 收到一封来信：[Root.GetTitledFirstName]保证会收拾你们这群异端信众

original: We do not find this important at the moment
translation: 在此时此刻，我们不认为这有什么重要的

original: is sent a polite rejection letter thanking [This.GetHerHim] for the warning
translation: 收到一封感谢[This.GetHerHim]警告的婉拒信

original: Forgive me, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] for I have sinned! The heretical ways of my rival has ensnared me and I find myself being of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]，请原谅我的罪孽吧！我仇敌的异端行径已经蛊惑了我，我发现自己已经成为了[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰者。

original: Maybe this isn't so bad...
translation: 这可能并没有那么糟糕……

original: On the behest of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] we, [From.GetTitledFirstName], agree that you should be denied communion and be excommunicated! May God have mercy on your soul.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 应[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的要求，本座[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定你将被禁止领受圣体圣事并被绝罚！愿主垂怜你的灵魂。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: What!?
translation: 你说什么？！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName], we would like to thank you for your warning about the heretical [From.GetTitledFirstName] among our subjects.\n\n[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们很感谢你关于在我们之中出了那个异端者[From.GetTitledFirstName]的警告。\n\n[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I only did what any [Root.Religion.GetName] should do
translation: 我只是做了任何一个[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒都会做的事而已

original: After some consideration we have decided not to excommunicate the supposed heretic you warned us about as we cannot find any incriminating evidence against the your rival. [From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] be with you.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 在经过一番考虑以后，我们决定暂不绝罚你警告我们的那个异端嫌疑者，由于我们暂时无法找到任何关于你仇敌可以被定罪的证据。愿[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]与你同在。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Oh well, it was worth a try...
translation: 那好吧，这依然是个有价值的尝试……

original: My liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has no idea what a treacherous and despicable person that [Root.GetManWoman] is! My rival fawns over our liege and [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] seems to like the flattery my rival pours over [Root.Liege.GetHerHim]...
translation: 我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]完全没有认识到那个[Root.GetManWoman]是多么不可信任和卑鄙！我的仇敌不断奉承我们的领主，而且[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]看起来还挺喜欢对[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]倾诉的甜言蜜语……

original: I shall expose my rival as the snake [Root.GetSheHe] is!
translation: 我应当把我的仇敌[Root.GetSheHe]如蛇蝎一般恶毒的真相揭露出来！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tells [This.GetTitledFirstName] what a despicable person [Root.GetHerHis] rival is
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]告诉[This.GetTitledFirstName]：[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌是个多么卑鄙的小人

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will soon know how treacherous that [Root.GetManWoman] can be...
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]很快就会知道那个[Root.GetManWoman]是个多么不可信任的小人……

original: 'My liege, please listen to me! That [From.GetManWoman] you are so fond of is no more than a treacherous, despicable snake!'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to convince me to be more careful about my friends.
translation: 「我的领主，请听我一言！您喜欢的那个[From.GetManWoman]是一条奸诈卑鄙的毒蛇！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图说服我多加留心我的朋友们。

original: I did not know!
translation: 我毫不知情！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] shuns [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] former friend [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]避开[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]旧友[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I don't believe you! You are just jealous...
translation: 我不相信你！你只是嫉妒罢了……

original: qualms are ignored by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 令人担忧的信息被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]无视

original: The more I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] about the misdeeds my rival had done, the treachery and the despicable things I had seen with my own eyes, the more silent and brooding [From.GetTitledFirstName] became. I feared I may had overdone it, that my liege wouldn't believe me...
translation: 我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]越多我曾亲眼目睹仇敌干过的恶劣行径以及其他奸诈卑鄙的事情，[From.GetTitledFirstName]就越是沉默和不安。我担心自己做得太过火了，以致于我的领主将不会相信我……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] believed every word I said!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]相信我说的每字每句！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] called me a liar!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]称呼我为骗子！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me about the misdeeds you have done, the treachery and the despicable things [From.GetSheHe] has seen with [From.GetHerHis] own eyes! I thought we were friends, but now I know better...'\nI couldn't convince [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to believe me rather than [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lies.
translation: 「[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]曾用[From.GetHerHis]双眼目睹你干过的恶劣行径以及其他奸诈卑鄙的事情！我曾认为我们是朋友，但现在我终于知道你是个怎样的人了……」\n我无法说服[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]去相信我而不是相信[From.GetTitledFirstName]的谎言。

original: Curse you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我诅咒你，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Would you know it, I heard your rival fancies a [Root.GetManWoman]!'\nIt came as quite a shock to hear the rumors that my rival is a sodomite!
translation: 「你知道吗，我听说你的仇敌正迷恋一个[Root.GetManWoman]！」\n我听到流言说我的仇敌是个鸡奸者，那一刻我简直惊了！

original: Finally, something I can use to slander my rival's reputation!
translation: 我总算找到些可以用来中伤我仇敌名誉的事情了！

original: has nothing but contempt for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 什么都不做，只是对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]感到鄙视

original: This could destroy my rival's life and reputation! I won't be a part of that
translation: 这可能会摧毁我仇敌的名誉乃至生命！我不会参与到其中

original: I will protect this secret as I have mine
translation: 我将像保守自己的秘密一样保守这个秘密

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] no longer sees [This.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.GetHerHis] rival
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不再把[This.GetTitledFirstName]视为[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌

original: It was only rumors at first, then people started talking, then gossiping. The secret I tried to keep hidden, tried to deny and tried to shun caught up to me and blared its, to some, ugly truth: I did not desire the other sex, I wanted a [Root.GetManWoman], not a [Root.GetManWomanOpp] in my bed...
translation: 一开始只是一些流言蜚语，然后人们开始窃窃私语，再然后他们把这作为八卦传遍四处。我一直试图掩盖的、否认的、回避的秘密一下子就缠住了我并高声揭露出其背后的——对某些人而言甚至是丑陋的——真相：我并不渴望异性的胴体，我在床上想要的只是[Root.GetManWoman]，而非[Root.GetManWomanOpp]……

original: I have good reason to believe [From.GetTitledFirstName] is behind this!
translation: 我有充分理由相信[From.GetTitledFirstName]是幕后黑手！

original: It has been a secret I have guarded with my life, every gossip, every rumor about me not desiring the other sex has been uprooted as soon as I could. Then my rival [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me, telling me [From.GetSheHe] knew my secret and I braced myself against [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s glee that [From.GetSheHe] finally had something [From.GetSheHe] could use to ruin my reputation with.
translation: 这曾是一个我用生命保护的秘密，有关我对异性不敢兴趣的一切八卦、一切流言都被我尽快拔出。然后，我的仇敌[From.GetTitledFirstName]走到我跟前，告诉我[From.GetSheHe]知道我的秘密。[From.GetTitledFirstName]为[From.GetSheHe]终于找到[From.GetSheHe]能够用来损害我名誉的东西而幸灾乐祸，而我只能努力支撑住自己。

original: My secret is safe, [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，我的秘密还是安全的……

original: The more I think about it, the more ridiculous it seems. A [Root.GetTitle] having a rival  so much beneath me, it seems a bit silly of me to hold [Root.GetHerHim] as my rival.
translation: 我对此想得越多，这就越发显得滑稽——一个[Root.GetTitle]竟然有个地位如此卑微的仇敌，我坚持认为[Root.GetHerHim]是我仇敌的想法看起来真有点愚蠢。

original: Indeed, there is little point in this rivalry
translation: 确实，这种较劲没有多大意义

original: I never forget my enemies
translation: 我永不会忘记我的敌人

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I have been rivals for a very long time, but now when [From.GetSheHe] is a [From.GetTitle] and I am a lowly [Root.GetTitle] [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels it is beneath [From.GetHerHim] to have a rival so much beneath [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我已经做了很长时间仇敌了，但现在[From.GetSheHe]可是一个[From.GetTitle]，而我还只是一个地位卑微的[Root.GetTitle]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为有个地位和[From.GetHerHim]比起来如此卑微的仇敌是件降低[From.GetHerHim]身价的事。

original: Finally!
translation: 总算！

original: [From.GetTitle] or not, the rivalry between us is still strong!
translation: 是不是[From.GetTitle]，我们之前的对立关系依然强烈！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to let go of the rivalry between [Root.GetHerHim] and [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝让[Root.GetHerHim]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]间的对立关系释然

original: I was willing to bury our rivalries and the petty deeds, the stabs at our reputations our rivalry had caused in the past where it belongs, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not as magnanimous as I.\n'[Root.GetTitle] or [From.GetTitle], our rivalry will continue, forever!'
translation: 我很乐意去终结我们之间的对立关系，并把过往的种种小事、仇敌之间互相损害对方名誉的事情统统埋葬在属于它们的地方，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]并不像我一样大度。\n「无论[Root.GetTitle]还是[From.GetTitle]，我们间的对立将一直持续下去，直到永远！」

original: Oh dear...
translation: 天啊……

original: My rivalry to my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is straining my commitment to my feudal duties. To know that my hard work enables my rival to live a safer, better life annoys me to no end!
translation: 我与我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]之间的对立关系让我履行封建义务变得异常纠结。我认识到自己的辛勤努力只是在确保我的仇敌过上更安全、更好的生活，这没完没了地困扰着我！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is my rival until death do us part!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]永远是我的仇敌，直到死亡把我们分开！

original: I should try to live with this
translation: 我应该试着接受这一切

original: I should make up for the sake of order
translation: 为了秩序，我们应该要和好

original: Stubborn Rival
translation: 顽固的仇敌

original: Respects Liege
translation: 尊重领主

original: My liege, I fear our rivalry is straining my commitment to my feudal duties. To know that my hard work enables a rival of mine to live a safer, better life is putting a strain on me I would gladly have removed. I want us to bury our rivalry and differences so that I may serve you better.\nYour loyal subject,\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我的领主，我担忧我们之间的对立关系将会让我履行封建义务变得异常困难。我认识到自己的辛勤努力只是在确保我的仇敌过上更安全、更好的生活，这没完没了地让我倍感压力，我希望能够去掉这种压力感，我希望我们能够终结我们之间的对立和差别，好让我尽我所能地为您效劳。\n您忠诚的仆人，\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Yes, it would be for the best...
translation: 好的，这再好不过了……

original: My fierce rival is planning rebellious acts against our liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我凶残的仇敌正准备一场针对我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的叛乱！

original: I will not let my rivalry interfere with my cause
translation: 我将不会让我的仇敌介入到我的事业中

original: Maybe united hatred allows us to make up?
translation: 也许同仇敌忾能够让我们和好？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] joins [This.GetTitledFirstName] plot against their liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]加入到[This.GetTitledFirstName]针对他们领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋中

original: I was in the middle of planning the next step of the plot when [From.GetTitledFirstName] burst into the room and asked to join my plot against [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我正在谋划阴谋的下一步，这时[From.GetTitledFirstName]突然闯进房间并要求加入我针对[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋！

original: I don't need your help!
translation: 我不需要你的帮助！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] needs no help from [This.GetTitledFirstName] with [Root.GetHerHis] plot against [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]在[Root.GetHerHis]对[This.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋中不需要[This.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助

original: I could use any help I can get!
translation: 我会用上任何我能够得到的帮助！

original: I had looked forward to joining [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [From.GetHerHis] plot against our liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], but instead of showing some gratitude and welcome me with open arms, [From.GetTitledFirstName] shouted at me and refused to let me join [From.GetHerHis] plot!
translation: 我曾十分期待和[From.GetTitledFirstName]一道，加入[From.GetHerHis]针对我们的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋中去，但[From.GetTitledFirstName]并没有对此表示感激和欢迎，反而对我大喊大叫并且拒绝让我加入到[From.GetHerHis]阴谋中去！

original: Now what should I do?
translation: 那么现在我该干什么？

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! My fierce rival has also become a follower of the new way of Christ! Hallelujah!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！我凶恶的仇敌也成为了基督新教派的追随者！哈利路亚！

original: I need to re-evaluate our relations!
translation: 我需要重新审视我们的关系！

original: Love thy rival does not apply in this situation
translation: 与仇敌和好不适用在这种情况下

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith teaches us to love thy rival, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] still took me with surprise when [From.GetSheHe] proposed that we should end our rivalry in honor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s teachings...
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]信仰教导我们要爱你的仇敌，但当[From.GetTitledFirstName]提议为向[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的教导表示敬意结束敌对关系时，[From.GetSheHe]依然让我感到十分意外……

original: For [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s sake!
translation: 看在[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的份儿上！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ends [Root.GetHerHis] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] rivalry
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]结束[Root.GetHerHis]和[This.GetTitledFirstName]之间的敌对关系

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] would condone our rivalry!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]会宽恕我们的敌对关系！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rejects [This.GetTitledFirstName] suggestion to end their rivalry
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝接受[This.GetTitledFirstName]关于结束敌对关系的提议

original: Continued Rivalry
translation: 继续敌对

original: For the love of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I agree! Let us not fight nor argue anymore, let us respect [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s teachings about loving thy rival!'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed to end our petty rivalry!
translation: 「为了[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的爱，我接受！让我们不再斗争或者争吵，让我们遵循[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]要爱你的仇敌的教导！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]统一结束我们间那琐碎的敌对关系！

original: Tis a joyous day!
translation: 这是个欢乐的日子！

original: What has [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to do with our rivalry? Was [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] there when we became rivals? No! I see no reason why our [Root.Religion.GetName] faith would make us friends.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] did not want to let go of our rivalry.
translation: 「[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]会对我们间的敌对关系做些什么？难道我们成为仇敌之时，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]也在场？不！我看不出我们的[Root.Religion.GetName]有任何理由让我们成为朋友。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]并不愿放下我们间的敌对关系。

original: I thought our common faith would make us friends...
translation: 我以为我们的共同信仰会让我们成为朋友……

original: Kick the kitty
translation: 踢飞那只小猫

original: Killed my father
translation: 杀父仇人

original: It is a perfect opportunity - my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has invited both me and my rival to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] hunt in the forests of [Root.Liege.Location.GetName]. A small mistake can have devastating consequences, an arrow released at the wrong time might pierce through my rival's heart...
translation: 这真是一个完美的机会——我的领主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]邀请我和我的仇敌一起去[Root.Liege.Location.GetName]的森林参加[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]狩猎。一个小小的失误就能造成破坏性的后果，一支误射的箭就有可能穿透我的仇敌的心脏……

original: It's now or never!
translation: 机不可失！

original: Peasant, fire at my command!
translation: 农民，听我的命令射击！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] bribes [This.GetTitledFirstName] to shoot [Root.GetHerHis] rival with an arrow
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]贿赂[This.GetTitledFirstName]用箭射杀[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌

original: Let's just enjoy the hunt
translation: 让我们享受狩猎就好了

original: The White Stag
translation: 白色的雄鹿

original: I heard the arrow the second before it hit. The whirring noise its feather made as it sang its way through the forest should have made it easier to avoid it...
translation: 在被那箭射中的一秒以前我就听到了它的声音。它的箭羽嗡嗡作响听起来就好像在穿越森林的路上一直唱着歌，这声音本该让我更容易避开它……

original: The arrow hit my arm!
translation: 那箭射中了我的手臂！

original: The arrow pierced my leg!
translation: 那箭刺进了我的大腿！

original: The arrow... pierced my heart...
translation: 那箭……刺穿了我的心脏……

original: The arrow only grazed me
translation: 那箭只是跟我擦肩而过

original: I held my breath as the arrow left the bow, willed my eyes to stay open and follow its path. It was aimed directly at [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I was sure the arrow would hit true...
translation: 当箭射出的一刻，我屏住了呼吸，不敢眨一下眼睛，目光跟随着它的轨迹。他直直地射向了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，我敢肯定它一定射中了……

original: ...it hit [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s arm, wounding [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: ……射中了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的手臂，让[From.GetHerHim]受伤！

original: ...it hit [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s leg, maiming [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: ……射中了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的大腿，让他[From.GetHerHim]残废！

original: ...the arrow missed [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: ……箭矢没有击中[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: The arrow struck true, piercing [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart and [From.GetSheHe] was dead before [From.GetSheHe] fell off the horse. No one wanted to admit whose arrow killed [From.GetTitledFirstName] and so [From.GetTitledFirstName] death became a sad hunting accident.
translation: 那箭真的射中了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的心脏，我敢肯定[From.GetSheHe]在掉下马之前[From.GetSheHe]就已经死了。没有人想要指证是谁的箭射中了[From.GetTitledFirstName]，所以[From.GetTitledFirstName]的死仅仅只是一场令人悲伤的狩猎事故。

original: A perfect shot!
translation: 完美一击！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] swears vengeance on [This.GetHerHis] father [This.Father.GetTitledFirstName]'s murderer [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]发誓会找杀害[This.GetHerHis]父亲[This.Father.GetTitledFirstName]的凶手[Root.GetTitledFirstName]报仇

original: My father [Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]'s hunting accident was no accident. [From.GetTitledFirstName], my father's rival, held the bow with the arrow that pierced my father's heart!
translation: 导致我的父亲[Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]死亡的「狩猎事故」一定不是一场简单的事故。一定是[From.GetTitledFirstName]——我父亲的仇敌——朝我父亲的心脏射出了那支箭！

original: I will get my revenge, sooner than later!
translation: 总有一天，我将会为此复仇！

original: The Contented One
translation: 安于现状者

original: Failed Poisoner
translation: 投毒未遂者

original: Poisoner
translation: 投毒者

original: Master Poisoner
translation: 投毒大师

original: No one would notice if I poisoned my rival's wine at [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast, the guests would be too preoccupied with gossip, plots and schemes.
translation: 没有人会留意到我在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]举办的宴会上往仇敌的酒里投毒，宾客们只会全神贯注在八卦、阴谋和图谋之中。

original: I will take the risk and poison the wine!
translation: 我将会冒险在酒里投毒！

original: The poisoned wine intended for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s rival finds [This.GetTitledFirstName] lips instead
translation: 为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的仇敌准备的毒酒却被[This.GetTitledFirstName]喝下了

original: I dare not, what if I was to be discovered?
translation: 恐怕还是不要了，如果我被发现了怎么办？

original: I poured the poison into the wine and made sure no one saw me switching the poisoned goblet with my rival's. My rival did not notice anything, too busy talking with [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and I was mentally congratulating myself when I heard someone swear and the clatter when the goblet hit the floor.
translation: 我往酒里投毒，确保没有人看到的情况下换了我仇敌的酒杯。我的仇敌忙于与[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]交谈，对此毫不知情。我的内心正为自己庆祝，这时我听到咒骂声以及酒杯被扔地上的铿锵声。

original: The poisoned wine... wasted!
translation: 那杯毒酒……浪费了！

original: The wine tasted strange, it almost tingled on my tongue but it was quite passable. It wasn't until several hours later, when I started vomiting blood, that I realized the wine must have been poisoned!
translation: 这酒尝起来真奇怪，它几乎灼痛了我的舌头，可它还凑合能够下咽。不到几个小时以后，当我开始吐出鲜血时，我才意识到这酒一定是被下毒了！
……杀了……我吧……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was poisoned by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]被[This.GetTitledFirstName]下毒了

original: The poison did not kill me, but it made me infirm
translation: 那毒药不能杀害我，但却足以让我变得身残体弱

original: The poison... it buuurns...
translation: 这毒药……它在灼……烧……

original: The feast was exactly as I had planned it, plenty of food and wine, great entertainment and interesting guests. Too bad someone decided to ruin it for everyone by poisoning the wine!
translation: 宴会完全如我所计划的一样，许多佳肴和美酒、精彩的娱乐活动和有趣的宾客。可有人却打算通过往酒里下毒搞砸它，这可真是太糟糕了！

original: If I find out who did it, they'll be more than sorry!
translation: 如果让我找到是谁干的，他一定会为此后悔的！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was accidentally poisoned by [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]被[From.GetTitledFirstName]意外地毒害了

original: I watched as [From.GetTitledFirstName] downed the goblet with poisoned wine in a swallowing, burped and called for more. Satisfied, I sat down and enjoyed the food while waiting for the poison to work.
translation: 我看着[From.GetTitledFirstName]一边下咽，一边放下那个装着毒酒的酒杯，然后打嗝，还喊着要更多美酒。这可是让人舒心，我坐下享受佳肴，等待着毒药发作。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] died a slow and painful death from the poison
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]由于毒药缓慢而痛苦地死去

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] will avenge [This.GetHerHis] father [This.Father.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]会为[This.GetHerHis]父亲[This.Father.GetTitledFirstName]报仇

original: The poison did not kill [From.GetTitledFirstName], only made [From.GetHerHim] infirm
translation: 毒药没有杀死[From.GetTitledFirstName]，仅仅让[From.GetHerHim]变得身残体弱

original: The poison made [From.GetTitledFirstName] sick as a pig
translation: 毒药让[From.GetTitledFirstName]肿得像猪头

original: Several witnesses claimed they had seen [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] pouring something into the wine and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] confessed soon enough when I confronted [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. Several guests became sick but thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] no one died, the poison in the wine was too diluted to cause anyone permanent damage.
translation: 一些证人宣称他们看到[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]往酒里投毒，当我当面质问[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]时，[FromFrom.GetHerHim]很快就认罪了。一些宾客开始觉得不舒服，但感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，没人死亡，酒里的毒药被彻底稀释以至于没人受到永久的伤害。

original: Throw the poisoner into the dungeon!
translation: 把投毒者扔进大牢里！

original: Banish the poisoner, as far away as possible!
translation: 驱逐这个投毒者，越远越好！

original: No one died, so I'll be merciful
translation: 既然没人因此死亡，我将宽恕这个投毒者

original: My father died from the wine [From.GetTitledFirstName] poisoned at [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s feast! I will avenge my father's death!
translation: 我的父亲因[From.GetTitledFirstName]的毒酒而死于[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]举办的宴会上！我将会为父亲的死而复仇！

original: I swear that I won't rest until [From.GetTitledFirstName] is dead!
translation: 我保证我将不休不眠直到[From.GetTitledFirstName]死去！

original: Forgives poisoner
translation: 宽恕投毒者

original: I confessed almost as soon as [From.GetTitledFirstName] started question me about the poisoned wine. My rival did not suffer at all from the poisoning but many guest had fallen ill after they had drunk the poisoned wine.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]开始为毒酒而质问我时，我很快认罪了。我的仇敌一点也没有受到毒药的影响，反而许多宾客都由于喝了毒酒而开始病倒。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] threw me into the dungeon for poisoning the guests
translation: 因为毒害宾客，[From.GetTitledFirstName]把我扔进大牢里

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] banished me for poisoning the guests
translation: 因为毒害宾客，[From.GetTitledFirstName]把我驱逐出境

original: I hear [From.GetTitledFirstName] challenge one of my other guests to a duel and before I have any chance to interfere, the two duellers go outside...
translation: 我听说[From.GetTitledFirstName]挑战我的其中一位宾客进行决斗，但在我有机会出面干涉时，那两个决斗者早已走到外面……

original: I try to get to them before it is too late...
translation: 我要试着在为时已晚之前赶上他们……

original: Revoked job title Court Chaplain
translation: 收回宫廷司祭职位

original: Send your [GetMyLordSpiritualName] to tend to the lost souls in a county, converting heretics and infidels.
translation: 将你的[GetMyLordSpiritualName]派到那群迷失的羔羊所在的省份，转化异端和异教徒。

original: Send your [GetMyLordSpiritualName] to work for the advancement of Culture in a county.
translation: 将你的[GetMyLordSpiritualName]派到一个省份工作以发展文化科技。

original: Have your [GetMyLordSpiritualName] lead a religious delegation to discuss matters of the faith with the local clergy (especially useful towards the official head of a religion).
translation: 让你的[GetMyLordSpiritualName]带领一个修士代表团去与当地的神职人员（尤其对宗教领袖有用）进行宗教辩论。

original: Court Chaplain
translation: 宫廷司祭

original: The Mastermind Theologian is recognized as one of the top scholars of the Faith.
translation: 神学大师被认为是最顶尖的宗教方面的学者之一。

original: §GClick to Choose an Ambition§!
translation: §G点击以选择一个野心§!

original: §YChoose a Plot§!
translation: §Y选择一项阴谋§!

original: No Valid Plots
translation: 没有可选的阴谋

original: With a score of $SCORE$ you$FAILED$ beat House af Bjälbo, who arguably created the modern state of Sweden. Prior to their accession the Swedish state was highly decentralised, where the writ of royal authority barely ran. The Bjälbo Kings regulated things more clearly, conquered Finland and by 1337 had entered a personal union with Norway, leading Sweden to the height of its medieval power.
translation: 最终分数：$SCORE$。你$FAILED$超过比耶博家族。比耶博家族是现代瑞典国家的缔造者。在比耶博家族掌权前，瑞典是一个高度分权的国家，国王政令不行。比耶博家族制定了规章制度，征服了芬兰，并在 1337 年联合统治和挪威，将瑞典推上了她在中世纪的巅峰。

original: Entertaining Entertainment
translation: 有趣的娱乐节目

original: Fabulous Feast
translation: 绝妙的宴会

original: Poor Revenge Seeker
translation: 可怜的复仇者

original: Revenge served cold
translation: 冷血的复仇者

original: It is time to take my revenge! I have so many deliciously vicious things planned, but I should keep it simple to make sure nothing goes wrong.
translation: 是时候要复仇了！我已经筹划了如此众多的「美妙的」恶毒点子，但我必须要让计划保持简单以确保一切都在计划之内。

original: I shall slander my rival's good reputation!
translation: 我应该要诋毁我仇敌的好名声！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] denigrates [Root.GetHerHis] rival [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s reputation
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]抹黑[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]的名声

original: No one believes [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 没有人相信[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I shall send my ruffians to kill my rival!
translation: 我应该派一群打手去杀死我的仇敌！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] sends ruffians to kill [Root.GetHerHis] rival [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]派了一群打手试图杀害[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My ruffians will roughen up my rival!
translation: 我收买的打手将会把我的仇敌揍出翔！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s ruffians will roughen [Root.GetHerHis] rival [This.GetTitledFirstName] up
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]收买的打手将会把[Root.GetHerHis]仇敌[This.GetTitledFirstName]揍出翔

original: What am I thinking? I do not want revenge!
translation: 我在想些什么？我压根儿不想什么复仇！

original: I have heard the gossip about me, the rumors that are slowly damaging my good reputation. It has gone so far no one dares meet my gaze, the children are pulled away from me by concerned parents and the silence that arises when the gossipers sees me is deafening.
translation: 我曾听过过有关我的八卦，那些流言蜚语正在破坏我的好名声。它们已经传播甚广，以致于无人敢与我四目相交，孩子们被忧心忡忡的父母从我身边带走，长舌妇看到我立刻就安静下来，这安静令我感觉烦扰。

original: What have I done? Who has spread these vile rumors?
translation: 我干了什么？究竟是谁散播这恶毒的流言？

original: The vile rumors are spread by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 这恶毒的流言由[This.GetTitledFirstName]散播开来

original: I tried everything! My rival is too loved by his vassals so no matter what lies I told them, no matter what ridiculously strange or disgusting things I could think up they did not believe me!
translation: 我什么都试过了！我的仇敌受到他的封臣爱戴，以至于无论我告诉他们什么谎言、无论我想到什么滑稽奇怪或者令人作呕的事情，他们都不相信我！

original: Then how will I get my revenge?
translation: 那么我能怎样复仇呢？

original: The ambush came from nowhere, the ruffians swinging cudgels, swords and their clenched fists at me obviously tried to kill me! I fought them desperately but no matter what I tried they still managed to hurt me more seriously than I could them...
translation: 伏兵突然间就杀了出来，那群暴徒挥舞着粗棍、利剑和他们的紧握着的拳头朝我跑来，这显然就是想杀了我的节奏！我绝望地跟他们搏斗，但无论我如何努力、他们伤害我的始终要比我能够伤害他们的要严重……

original: Bleeding badly, I tried to get away from them...
translation: 我流了很多血，试图从他们这里逃走……

original: I escaped with my life
translation: 我活着逃出生天

original: The ruffians sent to kill [Root.GetTitledFirstName] came from [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 被派来杀害[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的暴徒听命于[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Before I could draw my sword the ruffians were upon me. I fought them bravely, even managed to injure some of them, but I was outnumbered and overpowered...
translation: 我还没来得及拔剑，那群暴徒就跑到了我的跟前。我与他们英勇搏斗，甚至还试图打伤他们中的几个，但我们的人数和力量依然不如他们……

original: I cannot fight them, I must flee!
translation: 我无法与他们搏斗了，我必须逃跑！

original: I sent my ruffians out to kill my rival [From.GetTitledFirstName] to try and get revenge on [From.GetHerHim]. The stress, the worry, the anguish tormenting me until I got word from the leader was nerve-racking...
translation: 我派出了我的打手去杀害我的仇敌[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图向[From.GetHerHim]寻仇。压力、担忧和苦恼一直在折磨着我，让我十分伤脑筋，直到我从那群打手的首领那里听说了……

original: The ruffians killed [From.GetTitledFirstName]! Oh, joyous day!
translation: 那群打手杀害了[From.GetTitledFirstName]！这真是一个令人高兴的日子！

original: The ruffians didn't even manage to harm [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 那群打手甚至没有办法伤害[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: The ruffians only managed to wound [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 那群打手勉强打伤了[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The ruffians maimed [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 那群打手把[From.GetTitledFirstName]打残了！

original: I gave the leader of my gang of ruffians strict order: only hurt [From.GetTitledFirstName], maim [From.GetHerHim] if you like, but try to avoid killing [From.GetHerHim]! Hopefully, they have learnt to obey orders by now...
translation: 我向那群打手的首领下达了严格的命令：只是打伤[From.GetTitledFirstName]，如果你喜欢的话、还可以把[From.GetHerHim]打残，但绝对不能杀害[From.GetHerHim]！希望这次他们能够学会遵守我的命令……

original: Dead!? But I ordered you to wound, at the most maim [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 死了！？但我只是命令你打伤、最多只能打残[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: How did [From.GetTitledFirstName] manage to defeat ALL of you?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]究竟是如何能够把你们统统打倒的？

original: You wounded [From.GetTitledFirstName]? Excellent!
translation: 你伤了[From.GetTitledFirstName]？妙极了！

original: You maimed [From.GetTitledFirstName]? Perfect!
translation: 你打残了[From.GetTitledFirstName]？太完美了！

original: My heart rejoiced in all the deliciously malicious, false rumors about [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I managed to spread and I could almost see [From.GetHerHis] good reputation in the gutter by my feet, getting more soiled and impossible to repair for every new gossiper...
translation: 我的内心为所有美妙的邪恶点子、我设法传播的关于[From.GetTitledFirstName]的谣言而高兴，我几乎能够看到[From.GetHerHis]好名声因为一个个新鲜的八卦而被我踢到沟里，变得更加污秽甚至无法修复。

original: Revenge - a dish best served cold!
translation: 君子报仇十年不晚！

original: I don't even care that [From.GetTitledFirstName] realized I was the source behind the rumors
translation: 我甚至不在乎[From.GetTitledFirstName]是否知道是我散播的谣言

original: I ran for my life and the ruffians, burdened by their weapons and armor, couldn't keep up with me for long. Not even when I couldn't see them behind me any more did I stop, I continued until I was safe in my own home again.
translation: 我疯狂逃命，那些暴徒则因为他们武器和装甲的拖累，所以无法一直跟上我。哪怕我已经看不到他们在身后了，我还是没有停下奔跑，直到我再次平安地回到自己的家里。

original: Who would want to kill me?
translation: 谁会想要杀害我？

original: I will have my revenge on my father [Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]'s murderer! There's so many deliciously vicious things I want to do to my father's murderer, but I need to make sure nothing goes wrong...
translation: 我将会向杀害我父亲[Root.Father.GetTitledFirstName]的凶手寻仇！我有那么多的绝妙的狠毒事情想要对杀父仇人做，但我要确保没有任何一个环节失误……

original: I shall slander my father's murderer's reputation!
translation: 我应该中伤杀父仇人的名声！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] denigrates [Root.GetHerHis] father's murderer [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s reputation
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]诋毁[Root.GetHerHis]杀父仇人[This.GetTitledFirstName]的名声

original: I shall send my ruffians to kill my father's murderer!
translation: 我应该派出我的打手去杀害我的杀父仇人！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] sends ruffians to kill [Root.GetHerHis] father's murderer [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]派出打手去杀害[Root.GetHerHis]杀父仇人[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My ruffians will roughen up my father's murderer!
translation: 我的打手将会把我的杀父仇人揍出翔！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s ruffians will roughen [Root.GetHerHis] father's murderer [This.GetTitledFirstName] up
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的打手将会去把[Root.GetHerHis]杀父仇人[This.GetTitledFirstName]揍出翔

original: I cannot go through with this!
translation: 我无法这么做！

original: I dare not leave my home anymore, since the rumors about me being a cold-blooded murderer began people are not satisfied with just screaming words of abuse, they try to pelt me with rotten fruits and potatoes too!
translation: 我不敢再离开家，因为有关我是一个冷血杀手的谣言开始散播，人们不仅仅满足于用脏话侮辱我，还试图朝我扔腐烂的水果和土豆！

original: What have I done to deserve this?
translation: 我究竟是干了什么让我沦落到这种境地？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s reputation was soiled by the malicious rumors spread by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的名声被[This.GetTitledFirstName]散播的恶意谣言所抹黑

original: No one listens to me when I try to tell them who murdered my father! I tried every lie, every ridiculously strange or disgusting things I could think up to soil my father's murderer's reputation but no one believed me!
translation: 当我告诉人们是谁谋害了我的父亲时，没有人愿意听我说！我试过用所有谎言以及我所能够想到的所有恶毒的、怪异的或者令人作呕的事情去抹黑我杀父仇人的名声，但却无人愿意相信我！

original: Curses! How will I get my revenge now?
translation: 诅咒他们！我现在能怎样复仇？

original: The ruffians was after my life, no matter what I offered them: land, money, anything they would ever want they just ignored me! I was overpowered and outnumbered one to five but I had one advantage: I wore no armor and my slender sword would not hinder me in any way...
translation: 那群暴徒想要我的性命，无论我保证提供给他们什么好处——土地、金钱、任何他们想要的东西——可他们就是无视我的提议！以一敌五，我无论是数量上还是力量上都不如他们，但我有唯一的优势：那就是我没有装备任何护甲，而且我的利剑在任何情况下都不会妨碍到我……

original: Run! Run for my life!
translation: 跑啊！为了我的性命跑吧！

original: Five ruffians stood before me but they did not try to kill me, no, they tried to hurt me as badly as possible without killing me. Despite being one to five I tried to defend myself until I saw no other option but to run for my life!
translation: 五个暴徒站在我跟前，但他们却并不在试图杀害我，不，他们只是在试图在不会打死我的情况下、尽可能地把我打成重伤。尽管我是以一敌五，但我还是在试图自卫，直到我发现除了逃走、没有其他选项可供选择！

original: Who hired you? Why do they want to hurt me?!
translation: 究竟是谁雇佣你们？为什么他们想要伤害我？！

original: The ruffians were hired by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 这群暴徒听命于[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Finally I will have my revenge on my father's murderer [From.GetTitledFirstName]! My ruffians will kill [From.GetHerHim] for me and no one will suspect a thing!
translation: 最终，我将向我的杀父仇人[From.GetTitledFirstName]寻仇！我的打手将会为我杀害[From.GetHerHim]，没有人会怀疑到我身上！

original: Dead? Good, that's what I wanted...
translation: 死了？太好了，这就是我想要的结果……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] got away!? How?!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]逃了？！这是怎么做到的？！

original: Only wounded? But I wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] dead!
translation: 只是打伤了？但我可是想要[From.GetTitledFirstName]死啊！

original: Maimed!? Fine, that's good enough...
translation: 残废了？好吧，这就够了……

original: Wound, even maim [From.GetTitledFirstName] if you must, but do not kill [From.GetHerHim]! I want [From.GetTitledFirstName] to suffer...'\nThe ruffians had clear order what to do with [From.GetTitledFirstName], hopefully they will remember exactly what I hired them to do...
translation: 「打伤[From.GetTitledFirstName]，如果你们觉得需要甚至可以打残，但不能杀害[From.GetHerHim]！我希望看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]活着受苦……」\n那群打手得到了我的清晰指示，他们知道应该怎么对付[From.GetTitledFirstName]，希望他们确切记得我为什么雇佣他们……

original: I said I wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] wounded, maimed at the most, not DEAD!
translation: 我说了，我想要[From.GetTitledFirstName]受伤，最多也就残废，而不是死亡！

original: You did not even manage to wound [From.GetTitledFirstName]!? Worthless!
translation: 你们甚至无法伤到[From.GetTitledFirstName]？！没用的家伙！

original: Excellent work! [From.GetTitledFirstName] will suffer enough from [From.GetHerHis] wounds...
translation: 干得好！[From.GetTitledFirstName]将会从[From.GetHerHis]创伤中吃到足够的苦……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] lost a leg? Perfect!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]断了一条腿？简直完美！

original: People pelt [From.GetTitledFirstName] with rotten fruit and scream 'Murderer! Beast! Fiend!' after [From.GetHerHim] wherever [From.GetSheHe] goes. The rumors and the truth I spread has reached the gossipers, soon the whole country will know of [From.GetTitledFirstName] misdeeds!
translation: 无论[From.GetSheHe]往哪里逃，人们总是朝[From.GetTitledFirstName]扔腐烂的水果，并且追着[From.GetHerHim]喊道「凶手！禽兽！恶魔！」。我散播的流言和真相到了那些爱说闲话的人耳朵里，很快，整个国家都将知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]的罪行！

original: Such a deliciously rotten revenge!
translation: 真是一个美妙的复仇！

original: Not even [From.GetTitledFirstName] discovering I was behind the rumors can dampen my mood!
translation: 甚至连[From.GetTitledFirstName]也不知道是我散播的流言，我得抑制抑制情绪！

original: Unready
translation: 未准备好
